description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy‘s room.
When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped in it for decades - and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game.
John and Max resolve to save their beloved bait shop from turning into an Italian restaurant, just as its new female owner catches Max's attention.
Based on Terry McMillan's novel, this film follows four very different African-American women and their relationships with men.
George Banks must deal not only with the pregnancy of his daughter, but also with the unexpected pregnancy of his wife.
A group of high-end professional thieves start to feel the heat from the LAPD when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.
An ugly duckling having undergone a remarkable change, still harbors feelings for her crush: a carefree playboy, but not before his business-focused brother has something to say about it.
Two best friends witness a murder and embark on a series of adventures in order to prove the innocence of the man wrongly accused of the crime.
A former fireman takes on a group of terrorists holding the Vice President and others hostage during the seventh game of the NHL Stanley Cup finals.

Years after a friend and fellow 00 agent is killed on a joint mission, a secret space based weapons program known as "GoldenEye" is stolen. James Bond sets out to stop a Russian crime syndicate from using the weapon.
A widowed U.S. President running for reelection and an environmental lobbyist fall in love. It's all above-board, but "politics is perception," and sparks fly anyway.
Mel Brooks ' parody of the classic vampire story and its famous film adaptations.
An outcast Husky risks his life with other sled dogs to prevent a deadly epidemic from ravaging Nome, Alaska.
A biographical story of former U.S. President Richard Nixon, from his days as a young boy, to his eventual Presidency, which ended in shame.
A female pirate and her companion race against their rivals to find a hidden island that contains a fabulous treasure.

A tale of greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends: a mafia enforcer and a casino executive compete against each other over a gambling empire, and over a fast-living and fast-loving socialite.
Rich Mr. Dashwood dies, leaving his second wife and her three daughters poor by the rules of inheritance. The two eldest daughters are the title opposites.
Four interlocking tales that take place in a fading hotel on New Year's Eve.
Ace Ventura, Pet Detective, returns from a spiritual quest to investigate the disappearance of a rare white bat, the sacred animal of a tribe in Africa.
A vengeful New York City transit cop decides to steal a trainload of subway fares. His foster brother, a fellow cop, tries to protect him.
A mobster travels to Hollywood to collect a debt, and discovers that the movie business is much the same as his current job.
An agoraphobic psychologist and a female detective must work together to take down a serial killer who copies serial killers from the past.
Professional hit-man Robert Rath wants to fulfill a few more contracts before retiring but unscrupulous ambitious newcomer hit-man Miguel Bain keeps killing Rath's targets.
An off the charts genius who is home schooled and shunned after his last relative dies shows the unconscious residents of his town about connection awareness and the generosity of the spirit.

Ben Sanderson, a Hollywood screenwriter who lost everything because of his alcoholism, arrives in Las Vegas to drink himself to death. There, he meets and forms an uneasy friendship and non-interference pact with prostitute Sera.

The Moorish General Othello is manipulated into thinking that his new wife Desdemona has been carrying on an affair with his Lieutenant Michael Cassio, when in reality, it is all part of the scheme of a bitter Ensign named Iago.
Four 12-year-old girls grow up together during an eventful small-town summer in 1970.

Eight years ago, Anne Elliot rejected Frederick Wentworth, the man she loved, out of a sense of duty and obedience. Now an ignored and faded spinster, she follows her financially stricken family from their home, only to be reintroduc
A scientist in a surrealist society kidnaps children to steal their dreams, hoping that they slow his aging process.
A provincial boy related to a Shanghai crime family is recruited by his uncle into cosmopolitan Shanghai in the 1930s to be a servant to a ganglord's mistress.
An ex-Marine turned teacher struggles to connect with her students in an inner city school.
In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.
While flying mail across the Andean mountains, Henri Guillaumet's plane has to crash-land, he must trek back to civilizatin on foot.
Babe, a pig raised by sheepdogs, learns to herd sheep with a little help from Farmer Hoggett.
The platonic relationship between artist Dora Carrington (Dame Emma Thompson) and writer Lytton Strachey (Jonathan Pryce) in the early twentieth century.
A nun, while comforting a convicted killer on death row, empathizes with both the killer and his victim's families.

A young Russian boy, Thomas Minton, travels to New York as a passenger on a Russian freighter. Close to Ellis Island he gets off and thus starts his journey to America the same way as all immigrants in former times. Thomas is searchi
Alyssa and Amanda are two little girls who are identical, but complete strangers, that accidentally meet one day.
Shallow, rich and socially successful Cher is at the top of her Beverly Hills high school's pecking scale. Seeing herself as a matchmaker, Cher first coaxes two teachers into dating each other.
A South African preacher goes to search for his wayward son, who has committed a crime in the big city.
The classic Shakespearean play about the murderously scheming 15th-century king is reimagined in an alternative setting of 1930s England as clouds of fascism gather.
A Vietnam vet adjusts to life after the war while trying to support his family, but the chance of a better life may involve crime and bloodshed.
The exiled royal physician to King Charles II devotes himself to helping Londoners suffering from the plague, and in the process falls in love with an equally poor woman.
Three unknowing martial artists are summoned to a mysterious island to compete in a tournament whose outcome will decide the fate of the world.
A beautiful but naïve aspiring television personality films a documentary on teenagers with a darker ulterior motive.
Bride-to-be Finn Dodd hears tales of romance and sorrow from her elders as they construct a quilt.
Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

The story takes place shortly after the discovery of the new world. A group of brave British pioneers, led by governor Raleigh and captain Zhuang Mais, went to the new world of America and met the beautiful native Princess baojiakangdi. Zhuang Maisi was deeply attracted by the beautiful Baojia Kangdi. Zhuang Maisi explained to her that the governor came here for gold, but he was happy to help the local aborigines build their homes; Baojia Kangdi said that people here have never seen gold. At this time, Zhuang Maisi learned that governor Raleigh could not dig gold, and had begun to attack the local tribes with the intention of seizing gold from them. He decided to stop all this and resolve the hatred between whites and locals.

An uptight and conservative woman, working on tenure as a literacy professor at a large urban university, finds herself strangely attracted to a free-spirited, liberal woman who works at a local carnival that comes to town.
A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.
A wealthy playboy hires an attractive woman detective, turned bodyguard, to protect him from a psychotic seductress; the same woman who killed the detective's lover just months before.
When he discovers his adopted son is a genius, a New York sportswriter seeks out the boy's birth mother: a ditzy porn star and prostitute.

Immediately after the fall of communism in Albania, two Italians go there to embezzle investment money by creating a fake company. As the chairman/fall guy, they pick a former political prisoner who turns out to be more than meets th
A teacher on exchange from England is placed in an underachieving Texan school, where she coaches the children in soccer, improving their self esteem and leading to unexpected success.
Sadie is desperately looking up to her older sister Georgia who is a famous C&W artist. Her desperate need to be accepted by her sister is constantly complicated by her drug and alcohol problems.

Eleven-year-old Alex and his fellow homemade heroes are having a backyard blast. Battles rage, knights fight and damsels distress in a cardboard Camelot of dirt-bike steeds, aluminum foil sabres and plastic armor. The summer fun and

After losing her job, making out with her soon-to-be former boss, and finding out that her daughter plans to spend Thanksgiving with her boyfriend, Claudia Larson faces spending the holiday with her family.
A simple Italian postman learns to love poetry while delivering mail to a famous poet, and then uses this to woo local beauty Beatrice.

The year is 1952, in Québec City, Québec. Rachel (Suzanne Clément), sixteen, unmarried, and pregnant, works in the church. Filled with shame, she unburdens her guilt to a young Priest under the confidentiality of the confessional. In

Omri, a young boy growing up in Brooklyn, receives an odd variety of presents for his birthday: a wooden cabinet from his older brother, a set of antique keys from his mother and a tiny plastic model of an Indian from his best friend
When the courts fail to keep behind bars the man who raped and murdered her daughter, a woman seeks her own form of justice.
A frustrated composer finds fulfillment as a high school music teacher.
A parody of several U.S. films about being in the 'Hood', for instance Boyz n the Hood (1991), South Central (1992), Menace II Society (1993), Higher Learning (1995) and Juice (1992).
A couple steals a Matisse painting on contract. They manage to escape the police. The sale takes place 4 days later on an island. Things don't go as planned.
Moronic best friends get themselves locked inside the Bio-Dome, a science experiment, along with a group of environmental scientists for one year.

After the destruction of Virtual Space Industries at the end of the first film, Jobe is discovered in the rubble and is brought to the facilities of Jonathan Walker (Kevin Conway), a powerful corporate tycoon, where his face is recon

Gennaro lives with his ailing grandpa, who sits outside holding tight to his last quarter. But grandpa's not ready to die, he has some unfinished business with a woman from his past and he enlists Gennaro to act as his emissary.
After learning of her husband's infidelities, a housewife invites an itinerant lesbian to move in with them. None of their lives will ever be the same again.
It's Friday, and Craig and Smokey must come up with $200 they owe a local bully or there won't be a Saturday.
Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop populated by vampires, with chaotic results.
Max Kirkpatrick is a cop who protects Kate McQuean, a civil law attorney, from a renegade KGB team out to terminate her.
A bunch of guys hang around their college for months after graduation, continuing a life much like the one before graduation.
A variation on Victor Hugo's classic novel by means of the story of a man whose life is affected by and somewhat duplicated by the Hugo story of the beleaguered Jean Valjean.
Romantic drama about a young career girl who is swept off her feet by a shy florist, who fell in love with her after one glimpse through a shadowy window.
A writer returns to his hometown where he faces the childhood nemesis whose life he ultimately ruined, only the bully wants to relive their painful past by torturing him once again.

A military commander stationed off planet during an interplanetary war travels through the devastated landscape to negotiate a peace treaty, but discovers that the primitive robots they built to kill enemy combatants have gained sent

A look into the many lives of Christa Päffgen, otherwise known as Nico; from cutie German mädchen to the first of the supermodels, to glamorous diva of the Velvet Underground, to cult item, junkie and hag. Many faces for the same wom
Freddy Gale is a seedy jeweller who has sworn to kill the drunk driver who killed his little girl.
A juror in a Mafia trial is forced to convince the other jurors to vote not guilty by an obsessive mob enforcer.
Several people try to help a little girl to find the money her mom gave her to buy a goldfish with.
Five different criminals face imminent death after botching a job quite badly.
A Dutch matron establishes and, for several generations, oversees a close-knit, matriarchal community where feminism and liberalism thrive.
A narrator tells the story of his childhood years in a tightly knit Afro-American community in the deep south under racial segregation.

This moving story was the swan song of actress Viveca Lindfors, who died unexpectedly soon after completing it. It's a fitting tribute, as the film explores the last performance in the ancestral home of a large family of actors.
In the 1800s a naturalist marries into a family of British country gentry.
Teenage boys discover discipline and camaraderie on an ill-fated sailing voyage.
A young boy befriends a larcenous orangutan in a luxury hotel.
A gubernatorial candidate hires a wormy special assistant whose only job is to make sure the candidate's well-meaning but incompetent brother doesn't ruin the election.
An unimpressive, everyday man is forced into a situation where he is told to kill a politician to save his kidnapped daughter.

The Journey of August King is a multi-dimensional drama about a North Carolina farmer in April 1815. August King, a widower, is on his way home as he does every year after selling his produce and purchasing the stock and goods he wil
A housemaid falls in love with Dr. Henry Jekyll and his darkly mysterious counterpart, Mr. Edward Hyde.

A ship docks in Brooklyn with all its crew dead, but someone gets off and the killing continues on land. A Caribbean vampire is searching for a specific woman, half-human half-vampire. Rita is the detective investigating the many kil
A piano player at a crossroads in his life returns home to his friends and their own problems with life and love.
Terrorists steal nuclear warheads from the U.S. military but don't count on a pilot and park ranger spoiling their plans.
A group of theater actors plays "Hamlet" in a provincial village, faced with their own temptations, disappointments, and joys.

The film is set in a real incident of police violence in the 18th District of Paris in 1993: a policeman shot and killed makom é m'bowol é, a 17-year-old Zaire teenager, while on patrol. In the film, a group of anti-government youth are on the streets of Paris. The dispute arose from one of them being beaten and seriously injured by the police, and everyone held a grudge. Wenz (Vincent Cassel) gets a real gun and is determined to return the color. Their hatred and anger can be seen everywhere, and this large-scale conflict with the police is imminent. In the scuffle, Wenz was shot and killed by the police. His accomplices trembled and aimed at the police's head. The gunfire rang out... Everyone lost control, whether the police or street gangsters. The restlessness and agitation in adolescence are like uncontrollable anger, and no one is spared.

You've run out of options, no school, no job. Steal a car, smash a shop with a heavy car and reap the proceeds! This movie is about underground England. The causes, the benefits, and the result of a life of 'crash and carry.'

A documentary crew from the BBC arrives in L.A. intent on interviewing Heidi Fleiss, a year after her arrest for running a brothel but before her trial. Several months elapse before the interview, so the crew searches for anyone who'
The accidental shooting of a boy in New York leads to an investigation by the Deputy Mayor, and unexpectedly far-reaching consequences.
Three friends plan to pull off a simple robbery and go on the run.

A lonely single woman finds the seemingly-perfect man to date, but soon regrets it when his deranged, possessive other personality emerges and she cannot convince anyone else of his Jekyll-and-Hyde true nature.

A medical examiner, who was suspected of murdering his wife, is trying an experimental drug to retrieve his wife's and others' memory and maybe find the killer and the mass murderer in a related present case.
A rejected hockey player puts his skills to the golf course to save his grandmother's house.
Photographer Robert Kincaid wanders into the life of housewife Francesca Johnson for four days in the 1960s.

On the brink of her 30th birthday, Fanny feels the door to marital happiness closing up on her. She is obsessed with death, even visits evening classes on dying and so it seems fitting, that she encounters a skeleton in the malfuncti
The Muppets' twist on the classic tale.

A camera follows model Christy Turlington through the spring fashion shows in Milan, Paris, and New York one year in the early 1990s, probably 1992. She and others dash from one designer's unveilings to another. Extended footage look

Late one night, in a seedy topless bar, a group of men watch a stripper dance over their malted beverages. But, one of them is an ex-con who's about to put the group on a collision course with death. Inspired by the events that spawn
Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action by attempting to liberate a presidential campaign worker and an underage prosti
A young man visiting and helping his uncle in New York City finds himself forced to fight a street gang and the mob with his martial art skills.
Two parents deal with the effects when their son is accused of murdering his girlfriend.

Margaret MacNiel, a girl living in a Cape Breton coal mining town, finds her life changing when she meets Neil Currie, a cheerful bagpipe-playing dishwasher. Unfortunately, neither of them are able to escape the industry around them.

Francis, the boss of a small plumbing supply company, is harassed by tax collectors, striking employees, and an impossible wife and daughter. His only joy is sharing lunch with his friend Gerard. Then a TV show called "where are you?

Using previously unreleased archival material in addition to contemporary interviews, this academy award-winning documentary tells the story of the Frank family and presents the first fully-rounded portrait of their brash and free-sp

This film is based on a true story about a British teenager who allegedly poisoned family, friends, and co-workers. Graham is highly intelligent, but completely amoral. He becomes interested in science, especially chemistry, and begi
Two NYC roomies have a pact to jump off Brooklyn Bridge, if they haven't found life partners before she's 30. That's less than a month away.

Ruben and Robby are twin brothers, adopted by Mona, one of the wealthiest - and most eccentric - women in Santa Barbara. Ruben is devoted to Mona, but Robby is more devoted to her money. So when Mona leaves her fortune and estate to

A bunch of high school misfits in Hawaii, introduced by their new teacher, attend a science fair in which they draw up inspiration to build their own solar car and win a trip to compete in the 1990 World Solar Challenge in Australia.
The true story of boys being sexually abused at their orphanage ran by a religious community in Newfoundland.
A successful executive and womanizer finds his lifestyle choices have turned back on him when his new female boss turns out to be an even bigger deviant than he is.
Two melancholy Hong Kong policemen fall in love: one with a mysterious female underworld figure, the other with a beautiful and ethereal waitress at a late-night restaurant he frequents.
A photographer and the types of people he encounters.
A young man, his wife, and his incompetent case worker travel across country to find his birth parents.
A young boy must restore order when a group of bullies steal the magical book that acts as a portal between Earth and the imaginary world of Fantasia.
As she grows up, Alia (the daughter of housemaid Khedija) learns the secrets of the peaceful palace where she and her mother live.

Michel Negroponte, a documentary filmmaker, meets Maggie one day in Central Park. Maggie claims to be married to the god Jupiter and the daughter of actor Robert Ryan. Michel gets to know Maggie over the next couple of years, and att
A whimsical saga of a young man whose two life-consuming passions are unraveling traffic gridlock and an avant-garde dancer. A romantic comedy.
Rebecca Miller's riveting drama examines how two sisters cope with their mother's mental illness.
A writer with dwarfism shares the story of his unconventional, though not altogether bad, upbringing as his mother struggled to raise him in the mid 20th century, with the help of a surrogate father.

A bright assistant D.A. investigates a gruesome hatchet murder and hides a clue he found at the crime scene. Under professional threats and an attempt on his life, he goes on heartbroken because evidence point to the woman he still l

The humble and hardworking Orodoto Balbuena finally gets an opportunity of realizing his lifelong dream of reaching New York and living the "American Dream", but soon finds out that things aren't as pretty as he thought.

Within days after the release of Negativland's clever parody of U2 and Casey Kasem, recording industry giant Island Records descended upon the band with a battery of lawyers intent on erasing the piece from the history of rock music.
Lt. Cmdr. Tom Dodge is assigned as Captain to the USS Stingray, an old diesel driven submarine that has seen better days.

Mark Rappaport's creative bio-pic about actress Jean Seberg is presented in a first-person, autobiographical format (with Seberg played by Mary Beth Hurt). He seamlessly interweaves cinema, politics, American society and culture, and

Mockumentary look at Playgirl Magazine centerfold and 1992 Man of the Year, Dirk Shafer, who kept it a secret from the magazine that he is gay. Most of the film is a fictionalized retelling of Dirk's decision to send a photograph to

While on a train, a teenage boy thinks about his life and the flamboyant aunt whose friendship acted as an emotional shield from his troubled family. This film evokes the haunting quality of memory while creating a heartfelt portrait
A cynical woman (Champa) leads exploited workers in a revolt against a cruel landowner (Mohan Agashe) in India

Tali (Michelle Pfeiffer) is an ordinary waitress, but she has always had a dream of being an announcer in her heart. How she wanted her dream to come true, so she sent the video of her cheerleading performance to the TV station. She thought the other party would not be interested in her, but she was still willing to try.Things went beyond her imagination. She was not only hired by the TV station, but also guided by veteran reporter Warren (Robert Redford). When she first broadcast the weather news, Tali didn't perform well, but she was encouraged by Warren and learned from Warren very hard. Finally, they fell in love with each other in the long time. Tali began to work as a reporter slowly. She got Warren's help and her career developed very smoothly. But things are unpredictable. Warren, who got married, went to Panama and was unfortunately shot in the interview
A gay cabaret owner and his drag queen companion agree to put up a false straight front so that their son can introduce them to his fiancée's right-wing moralistic parents.

Liz and Benny were both born into a colored family. At a literary party, Liz met Tony, a handsome white intellectual youth. With a frivolous enthusiasm, Liz abandoned her original suitor, threw herself into Tony's arms and had sex with Tony. However, Tony felt disgusted when he found that Liz was not white, especially when he saw Liz's big brother with dark skin and thick lips. Liz suffered for some time. Finally, the pursuit of a black youth pulled her out of the abyss. Benny, Liz's second brother, is rebellious by nature and always wanders the streets with three or two friends. Although he is not white, he sometimes hates the vulgarity of blacks. He seems to be just walking and watching on the street, detached, but inevitably decadent.

In 1981 in Medjugorje (BA), a group of kids claim that Virgin Mary appeared to them on a hill. The local priest believes them and spreads the word. Religious tourism blossoms. The communist government is concerned and arrests the pri
Three Irish Catholic brothers from Long Island struggle to deal with love, marriage, and infidelity.
Two hip detectives protect a witness to a murder while investigating a case of stolen heroin from the evidence storage room from their police precinct.
A young American boy visiting in China helps his zoologist father rescue a panda cub from unscrupulous poachers while his panda reserve is threatened with closure from officious bureaucrats.
A teenager finds his dreams of becoming a basketball star threatened after he free falls into the harrowing world of drug addiction.

Set right after World War II, a naive teenage girl joins a shabby theatre troupe in Liverpool. During a winter production of Peter Pan, the play quickly turns into a dark metaphor for youth as she becomes drawn into a web of sexual p
An amnesiac wakes up on an NYC alley. He meets Isabelle, an ex nun now erotic writer, at a diner and follows her home. She helps him find his identity. Then there's Sofia, the porn star.
NASA must devise a strategy to return Apollo 13 to Earth safely after the spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage putting the lives of the three astronauts on board in jeopardy.
In 1713 Scotland, Rob Roy MacGregor is wronged by a nobleman and his nephew, becomes an outlaw in search of revenge while fleeing the Redcoats, and faces charges of being a Jacobite.
A New York philosophy grad student turns into a vampire after getting bitten by one, and then tries to come to terms with her new lifestyle and frequent craving for human blood.

Batman must battle former district attorney Harvey Dent, who is now Two-Face and Edward Nygma, The Riddler with help from an amorous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes his sidekick, Robin.
A frigid young housewife decides to spend her midweek afternoons as a prostitute.

Laura is trying to pick up the pieces of her life after the murder of her husband and son, and goes on vacation with her sister to Burma. After losing her passport at a political rally, she is left on her own for a few days, during w
Brooklyn Cigar Store is a neighborhood hangout in Brooklyn with Auggie Wren/H.Keitel as center. Some people are interviewed about Brooklyn, spiced up with statistics on Brooklyn.
The U.S. President, low in the opinion polls, gets talked into raising his popularity by trying to start a cold war against Canada.
An afterlife therapist and his daughter meet a friendly young ghost when they move into a crumbling mansion in order to rid the premises of wicked spirits.
Young drug pushers in the projects of Brooklyn live hard dangerous lives, trapped between their drug bosses and the detectives out to stop them.
When an expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team is assembled to find out what went wrong.
On a U.S. nuclear missile sub, a young First Officer stages a mutiny to prevent his trigger happy Captain from launching his missiles before confirming his orders to do so.
An intimate portrait of controversial cartoonist Robert Crumb and his traumatized family.

Former musician and gunslinger El Mariachi arrives at a small Mexican border town after being away for a long time. His past quickly catches up with him and he soon gets entangled with the local drug kingpin Bucho and his gang.
An African-American man is hired to find a woman, and gets mixed up in a murderous political scandal.
John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.

Jordan White and Amy Blue, two troubled teens, pick up an adolescent drifter, Xavier Red. Together, the threesome embark on a sex-and-violence-filled journey through an America of psychos and quickie marts.
After an abandoned young woman in late 19th Century England is taken in by a rural couple with three handsome sons, tragic consequences result.
Lancelot falls in love with Guinevere, who is due to be married to King Arthur. Meanwhile, a violent warlord tries to seize power from Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table.
Teenager Jesse becomes reunited with Willy two years after the whale's jump to freedom as the teenager tries to rescue the killer whale and other orcas from an oil spill.
Hackers are blamed for making a virus that will capsize five oil tankers.

A poignant romantic comedy about the quest for love and intimacy in the age of AIDS. A story of a thirtyish gay actor/waiter who decides to become celibate...the risk of AIDS has taken all the joy from sex.
A data courier, literally carrying a data package inside his head, must deliver it before he dies from the burden or is killed by the Yakuza.
In a dystopian future, Joseph Dredd, the most famous Judge (a police officer with instant field judiciary powers), is convicted for a crime he did not commit and must face his murderous counterpart.

Jobless loser Tommy Collins is sequestered to be a juror in a serial killer trial. He does everything he can to prolong the trial and deliberations to take full advantage of the free lodging and food.
A day in the life of a group of teens as they travel around New York City skating, drinking, smoking and deflowering virgins.
This ultimate tribute to all independent filmmakers takes place during one day on the set of a non-budget movie.
A private detective gets more than he bargains for when he encounters Philip Swan, a performer whose amazing illusions captivate the world, but they are not really what everyone thinks.

This film is a black comedy about a group of young people in their early twenties in the 1990s looking for love and value. The plot focuses on David and Kaidi. David is a gay waiter who gave up his acting career; Kadi is a book critic and David's former lover. Their lives are tangled with David's friends and Kadi's close friends. At the same time, a serial killer caused inexplicable panic near their house
The wild and sexy story of two passionate young people who take to the road for the incredible adventure of their lives.
Both dumped by their girlfriends, two best friends seek refuge in the local mall.

A giant egg is unearthed at a construction site and soon opened, releasing the terrible Ivan Ooze, who wreaks vengeance on Zordon for imprisoning him millennia ago. With Zordon dying and their powers lost, the Rangers head to a dista
A young widow still grieving over the death of her husband finds herself being comforted by a local housepainter.
A mute make-up artist working on a slasher movie being shot in Moscow, is locked in the studio after hours. While there, she witnesses a brutal murder, and must escape capture.

This ultra-hip, post-modern vampire tale is set in contemporary New York City. Members of a dysfunctional family of vampires are trying to come to terms with each other, in the wake of their father's death. Meanwhile, they are being

Angela (Sandra Bullock) is an isolated programmer. The computer is her good helper and friend. Most of her life revolves around the computer in an orderly manner. By chance, Angela received a disk from her colleague, and soon after, the colleague died. Later, on a vacation, Angela met a handsome man, but soon the smart Angela found out what was wrong in the man's heart.

Baby pig lives on hoggett farm Pigs are rarely respected. They spend their lives in a cold and silent world. Pigs believe that if they grow fatter and faster, they can quickly go to heaven. Heaven is so beautiful, but they never return.So when the mother pig was sent to the slaughterhouse, the other piglets didn't feel sad, only babe was very sad. Fortunately, the dog mother fly gave the piglet warmth.Animals on the farm perform their respective duties. Sheep produce wool, roosters announce the dawn, cats catch mice, shepherds herd sheep... Only pigs and ducks are used to eat. It seems that babe's fate has long been doomed. A duck named Ferdinand learned to play and hoped to change his fate through his skills. Ferdinand hoped that the piglet could help him steal and throw away the alarm clock in the house, so that his alarm ability would be valued by his owner.

Angela vaguely felt that she was involved in big trouble, and everything was inseparable from the mysterious disk. In an accident, Angela fell into a coma. When she woke up, she lost all the documents that could prove her identity. When she completed the loss reporting and re handling procedure, a strange name was written on the document in her hand. What happened to this? In the process of escaping assassination again and again, Angela is also gradually approaching the truth.

At the scene of a bizarre murder, L.A. homicide detective Thomas Dagget discovers a lethal heavenly prophecy now being fulfilled on earth. In his fight to stop the forces of evil, he finds an unlikely ally in an elementary school tea

On Christmas Eve, a regretful husband admits to his high-spirited wife that he has hired a contract killer to take her out. She immediately flees. A nice couple offers her shelter, but everyone have dark secrets in this wacky movie.
An affluent and unexceptional homemaker in the suburbs develops multiple chemical sensitivity.
An affair between a young woman and a pastor has disastrous consequences.
A documentary about the culture of hip-hop. Through interviews with some of hip-hops biggest names, the film makers attempt to find out why it has become so popular.
Nomi, a young drifter, arrives in Las Vegas to become a dancer and soon sets about clawing and pushing her way to become the top of the Vegas showgirls.
A Brooklyn smoke shop is the center of neighborhood activity, and the stories of its customers.
A woman's world is rocked when she discovers her husband is cheating on her.
A group of scientists try to track down and trap a killer alien seductress before she successfully mates with a human.
A story of desperate search for oil.
A former cop turned street-hustler accidentally uncovers a conspiracy in Los Angeles in 1999.
A young woman separated from her lover by war faces a life-altering decision.

John Netherwood and his wife Leann are fugitives who are both wanted for murder. They have a young daughter named Janie. John and Leann are in the process of robbing a house when the two residents of the house show up. John kills the

In an unexplained act of charity, Jeanne Holman, picks up an injured, apparent tramp and takes him home to care for him little realizing who he was, or the effect he would have on her life and those of her family.
Young, wild poet Arthur Rimbaud and his mentor Paul Verlaine engage in a fierce, forbidden romance while feeling the effects of a hellish artistic lifestyle.
Three drag queens travel cross-country until their car breaks down, leaving them stranded in a small town.

Casey Ryback hops on a Colorado to LA train to start a vacation with his niece. Early into the trip, terrorists board the train and use it as a mobile HQ to hijack a top secret destructive US satellite.
When a youngster needs a break from the pressures of his parents' household, he moves in with his offbeat uncles and learns some invaluable life lessons.
One of the most successful designers in high fashion plans his fall 1994 collection. Follow the behind-the-scenes look at the creative side of fashion.
A married soldier returning from World War II poses as a pregnant woman's husband to save her from her father's anger and honor.

In a future where the polar ice-caps have melted and Earth is almost entirely submerged, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw "smokers," and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land.
In an alternative America where African-Americans and White Americans have reversed cultural roles, a white factory worker kidnaps a black factory owner for dismissing him over perceived disdain.
The early career of legendary lawman Wild Bill Hickock is telescoped and culminates in his relocation in Deadwood and a reunion with Calamity Jane.
On the verge of forced resignation, a strict old-fashioned teacher rethinks his life.
On the run from authorities, a sleazy courier poses as a Scout leader on a camping trip. But he has no idea what he's in for when he must actually take charge of a group of kids.

In the Soviet Union in 1936, shadow of Stalin's repressions lie on a famous revolution hero. The accusations of being him a foreign spy are nonsense, and all known that, but a slow process of his life's downfall is already running.
Three interconnected stories of love under the threat of civil war in Macedonia and London.
A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.
In order to inherit his fed up father's hotel empire, an immature and lazy man must repeat grades 1-12 all over again.
A teenage babysitter is the focus of two boys and a man's separate obsessions.

Robin shares a ride in her car with Jane from New York to Los Angeles. They stop at Jane's friend Holly's place in Pittsburgh and take her with them west, making a long stop in Tucson. The three very different women become close frie
Erik, a loner, finds a friend in Dexter, an eleven-year-old boy with AIDS. They vow to find a cure for AIDS together and save Dexter's life in an eventful summer.
A man travels to Italy with his family to live in the castle they have recently inherited. But he soon begins to suspect that they are not the only occupants.
3 women, who've been friends since childhood, meet at university in Dublin in 1957. Student and boyfriend life begins.
A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.
A psychiatrist must cure a young patient that presents himself as Don Juan, the greatest lover in the world.
A computer specialist is sued for sexual harassment by a former lover turned boss who initiated the act forcefully, which threatens both his career and his personal life.

Kris is a homicide cop with psychic abilities. She works to prove that the prime suspect in her latest case (the much younger husband of the millionaire victim) is innocent. But are her visions true, or planned by someone who knows w
A tough cop teams up with a professional skydiver to capture a renegade computer hacker on the run from the law.
After 3 years in prison, Julian breaks out and returns to Vegas to get his half from the bank robbery and see Lucille again. The Devil took the loot and Tuerto took Lucille.
A political activist is convinced that her guest is a man who once tortured her for the government.
A big city reporter travels to a small town where her mother has been arrested for the murder of an elderly woman for whom she worked as a housekeeper.
A frustrated actress with a strong character, Shiri is 30 but seems much younger as everyone seems to be constantly reminding her in both her personal and professional lives.
A senior chef lives with his three grown daughters; the middle one finds her future plans affected by unexpected events and the life changes of the other household members.
A man plagued by neuroses frequents the club Exotica in an attempt to find solace, but even there his past is never far away.
Elliot heads for the sexual fantasy island, Eden. He takes some photos of diamond smugglers. They and undercover cops want the photos and follow him to Eden.
Ambitious but troubled movie director Edward D. Wood Jr. tries his best to fulfill his dreams, despite his lack of talent.
A woman flying to France to confront her straying fiance gets into trouble when the charming crook seated next to her uses her for smuggling.
Mickey, an NBA referee, meets Ellen, an American airline official, in Paris. It develops into a relationship of ups and downs.

Angus McCormick adopts a stray dog and names him Yellow. Several days later, while traveling along the coast of British Columbia with his father, John, he and Yellow become stranded when turbulent waters capsize their boat. John and
When Max makes a preposterous promise to a girl he has a crush on, his chances to fulfilling it seem hopeless when he is dragged onto a cross-country trip with his embarrassing father, Goofy.
Hatch gets a special resuscitative medicine after "dying" in a car accident. His wife and daughter only get minor injuries. He gets strange nightmares such as killing a teen girl. Is it just dreams?
After a man dies in a car crash, he is reincarnated as a dog and attempts to reconnect with his family.
The story of castrato opera singer Carlo Broschi, who enthralled 18th century European audiences under his stage name Farinelli.

Baby pig lives on hoggett farmPigs are rarely respected. They spend their lives in a cold and silent world. Pigs believe that if they grow fatter and faster, they can quickly go to heaven. Heaven is so beautiful, but they never return.So when the mother pig was sent to the slaughterhouse, the other piglets didn't feel sad, only babe was very sad. Fortunately, the dog mother fly gave the piglet warmth.Animals on the farm perform their respective duties. Sheep produce wool, roosters announce the dawn, cats catch mice, shepherds herd sheep... Only pigs and ducks are used to eat. It seems that babe's fate has long been doomed. A duck named Ferdinand learned to play and hoped to change his fate through his skills. Ferdinand hoped that the piglet could help him steal and throw away the alarm clock in the house, so that his alarm ability would be valued by his owner.
In this offshoot of the 1950s "claymation" cartoon series, the crazy Blockheads threaten to ruin Gumby's benefit concert by replacing the entire city of Clokeytown with robots.
Two cops become compelled to act against corruption and discrimination within their police precinct.
A film following the lives of two inner-city Chicago boys who struggle to become college basketball players on the road to going professional.
Two teenage girls share a unique bond; their parents, concerned that the friendship is too intense, separate them, and the girls take revenge.

The unrealistic dreamer Kevin owes a lot of debt and is blocked by the creditor at the airport when he wants to leave. After a chaotic chase, Kevin pretended to be Derek, an old friend of Gary, the boss of the advertising agency, who had not seen him for many years. He was picked up by the person who came to pick him up. Unexpectedly, Kevin pretended to be a famous dentist, a wine taster and a famous golf player. Gary's family pestered him with questions. Kevin dealt with them one by one with his cleverness and was respected as a guest of honor. Just when Kevin thought he had escaped, the debt collection gangs had chased the door, and new troubles came one after another. Comedy star Sinbad tried his best to play the ruffian protagonist, and his performance was good, but the plot development was trivial, and the joy of other co actors was insufficient, so he could not give full play to the interest of the absurd situation.

The life and death of the legendary Ludwig van Beethoven. Besides all the work he is known for, the composer once wrote a famous love letter to a nameless beloved, and the movie tries to find out who this beloved was--not easy, as Be
Plump kids are lured into joining a posh fat camp with the promise of quick weight loss and good times, only to find that the facility is a woodland hellhole run by a psycho ex-fitness instructor.

An American businessman visiting Nagoya, Japan, meets a woman in a hotel bar. Returning to her room, 3 ninjas kill her and wound him, but he sees the ninja boss' face. Now, he's the prime target of a dangerous ninja cult.
A mechanic romances the mathematician niece of physicist Albert Einstein, with help from him and his friends.

Baby pig lives on hoggett farm Pigs are rarely respected. They spend their lives in a cold and silent world. Pigs believe that if they grow fatter and faster, they can quickly go to heaven. Heaven is so beautiful, but they never return.So when the mother pig was sent to the slaughterhouse, the other piglets didn't feel sad, only babe was very sad. Fortunately, the dog mother fly gave the piglet warmth.Animals on the farm perform their respective duties. Sheep produce wool, roosters announce the dawn, cats catch mice, shepherds herd sheep... Only pigs and ducks are used to eat. It seems that babe's fate has long been doomed. A duck named Ferdinand learned to play and hoped to change his fate through his skills. Ferdinand hoped that the piglet could help him steal and throw away the alarm clock in the house, so that his alarm ability would be valued by his owner

Widower Thomas Jefferson (3rd US president 1801-09) lives in Paris 1785-90 with his daughter. He has a pretty slave girl accompany his other daughter to France. He has an alleged affair with her resulting in kids.
A hilarious prank phone call pushes the buttons of an angry mob boss.
As part of a fertility research project, a male scientist agrees to carry a pregnancy in his own body.
A Harvard professor is lured back into the courtroom after twenty-five years to take the case of a young black man condemned to death for the horrific murder of a child.
A Little League player is sent back into medieval times where he is given the task of saving Camelot.
A reformed convict goes undercover with the help of an angry detective to ensnare a psychotic mobster.

Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vad
The March sisters live and grow in post-Civil War America.
A young girl is relegated to servitude at a boarding school when her father goes missing and is presumed dead.

This Ken Loach docu-drama relates the story of a British woman's fight with Social Services over the care of her children. Maggie has a history of bouncing from one abusive relationship to another. She has four children, of four diff

The sensitive man Paul was happy, had his own house, opened a hotel and had a beautiful wife, but since the day he saw his wife with other men, he fell into endless suspicion and jealousy and almost collapsed. Later, he followed his wife, beat her, imprisoned her, and finally caused an irreparable tragedy.
When tradition prevents her from marrying the man she loves, a young woman discovers she has a unique talent for cooking.
In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.

Benson (Damon Wayans) was once a member of the special forces of the U.S. Marine Corps. He has experienced inhuman training and cruel war times. In the army, Benson is a notorious cold-blooded killing machine, but after the war, he had to come to the army junior military academy to become a training officer there. What Benson has to face is a group of pampered and pampered hairy boys. Their weakness and childishness make Benson feel very angry. He decided to move out of what he learned in the special forces and practice these ignorant boys. However, Emily's appearance disrupted Benson's plan, and this troublesome woman will become Benson's only stumbling block in school.
Early 1990s drama about a family of Soviet Jews living in Brooklyn's Brighton Beach ocean-side neighborhood nicknamed Little Odessa.

Mousie and Sad Girl are childhood best friends in a contemporary Los Angeles poor Hispanic neighborhood. But when Sad Girl becomes pregnant by Mousie's boyfriend, a drug dealer named Ernesto, the two become bitter enemies. While thei

Two people meet on a flight to Sydney. Although both are engaged to others, they fall in love during their evacuation after a forced landing, and agree to meet in New York City three months later if the attraction lasts.
The biological and adoptive mothers of a young boy are involved in a bitter, controversial custody battle.
When King George III goes mad, his Lieutenants try to adjust the rules to run the country without his participation.

The dying Victor Frankenstein (Kenneth Branagh) was rescued by the Arctic exploration ship. He told captain Walton (Aidan Quinn) an incredible story. Young Victor lives with his adopted sister Elizabeth (Helena Bonham Carter, Helena Bonham Carter). Once he stole a medical note of the resurrection experiment of the dead and created a new life "creation" with the stolen body (Robert De Niro, Robert De Niro). But the "creation" was not willing to live like this. He ran away and tried to start a new life, but he failed. After all kinds of humiliation, he hated victor. When Victor was ready to marry Elizabeth, the "creation" came back, and he brutally killed the bride. The grieving Victor repeated his old technique and created a reborn man with Elizabeth's body. The "creation" thought that the reborn bride was the same as herself and tried to occupy her. The reborn bride fought with death and finally set herself on fire. Victor, who lost everything, left everything and pursued "creation" all the way to the Arctic Circle
A young boy refuses to accept his mother's new boyfriend, a lawyer, despite the man's attempts to win his respect. Meanwhile, disgruntled relative of a criminal he prosecuted seek revenge.
The events focus around a crisis hotline business on one crazy night during the Christmas holidays.
A group of young boys befriend a prostitute named, V.
A lawyer and a little girl must prove that a man claiming to be Santa Claus is the real thing.
Gwyn begins doubting her "yes" to Matt's wedding proposal, when she hears about her parents' and brother's adultery.

A man makes his way from Mexico to Los Angeles in the 1920s and gets married and raises a big family there. The movie follows the children until they get married and start their families in the 1960s.

An eager and idealistic young attorney defends an Alcatraz prisoner accused of murdering a fellow inmate. The extenuating circumstances: his client had just spent over three years in solitary confinement.
A stubborn man past his prime reflects on his life of strict independence and seeks more from himself.
In a remote woodland cabin, a small-town doctor discovers Nell - a beautiful young hermit-woman with many secrets.

Jason and Midget are two young, black teenagers living in Newark,New Jersey, the unofficial car theft capital of the world. Their favourite pastime is that of everybody in their neighbourhood: stealing cars and joyriding. The trouble

This action-adventure follows the journey of a Japanese martial artist Toshi, who goes undercover for the NYPD. He is assigned to bring down a gang of gun-runners called The Brotherhood, which services both Colombian drug lords and the Japanese Yakuza. But after Toshi is betrayed by fellow gang members, he knows only one way to get his revenge--by embarking on a violent, bloody killing spree, leaving no live bodies in his wake. NEW YORK COP also features a standout performance from Oscar winner Mira Sorvino

Dr. Stephanie Lyell works for Neurological Research, and is testing a seemingly safe personality-altering drug on Marc Gilmour a notorious Serial Killer. But when a pair of bizarre suicides occur at Dr. Lyell's apartment complex, Hom

It has been 73 years since Alex failed and the Humans lost the Cyborg Wars. Since then, the Humans have been enslaved. Scientists have developed a new DNA strain, which could signal the end of the Cyborgs, and they inject it into a v

When Ninas husband goes off for a few weeks to work, she meets and starts seeing a photographer. This story is told as an interview by a journalist writing about adultery who is talking with both Nina and the photographer in separate
Two victims of traumatized childhoods become lovers and psychopathic serial murderers irresponsibly glorified by the mass media.

As a teen, Faith was told that her destiny is a man named Damon Bradley. Years later - Faith is about to marry another man - a Damon Bradley calls to wish them all the best. Faith blows off the wedding and follows Damon to Italy.
A family descended from Maori warriors is bedeviled by a violent father and the societal problems of being treated as outcasts.
First time out of Michigan, Lily starts art school in LA and shares a house with other young artistic people. Both her teacher and a roomie/classmate show interest in her.
Army doctors struggle to find a cure for a deadly virus spreading throughout a California town that was brought to America by an African monkey.

Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.
In 1980, USA opens to Cuban refugees. Once in Miami, Dorita tries to create a Perez "family" of 3 to get a sponsor. She wants Juan to be her "husband" - plus a "son" or "dad".

A pastry boy and the son of a hair-piece mogul become involved in an arson scandal. Sergio (John Leguizamo) is offered a bribe in exchange for taking the blame for the fire that destroyed his workplace. Garet (William Baldwin), the r
The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
A dramatized account of the story of The Black Panther Party of Self-Defense.
All the while, Master Chu tries to find his place in the foreign American world.
A homosexual Catholic priest finds out during confessional that a young girl is being sexually abused by her father, and has to decide how to deal with both that secret and his own.
A young lawyer, Richard Goodwin, investigates a potentially fixed game show. Charles Van Doren, a big time show winner, is under Goodwin's investigation.
Riyo marries a man more than twice her age. She is devastated and labors in the sugar cane field. At the end she is able to love her husband.

Young Queen Margot finds herself trapped in an arranged marriage amidst a religious war between Catholics and Protestants. She hopes to escape with a new lover, but finds herself imprisoned by her powerful and ruthless family.
A female gunfighter returns to a frontier town where a dueling tournament is being held, which she enters in an effort to avenge her father's death.
An elderly yet young-at-heart man moves in with his grandson and both their lives turn upside-down.
A chronicle of the interconnected lives of a group of people in the lead up to Paris Fashion Week.
A model discovers a retired judge is keen on invading people's privacy.
A woman struggles to find a way to live her life after the death of her husband and child.
After his wife divorces him, a Polish immigrant plots to get even with her.

A woman inherits her father's fireworks factory, as he had no son. The business does well and everything works in an orderly fashion until one day, an itinerant painter is hired to decorate the doors and vases at the factory. The wom
Harry Habert, owner of a rent office has an original idea: To rent babies from a nearby orphanage to the local families. He rents the Ward brothers to his first customers.
Just why are people surrounding Adam Pratman dropping down dead? Is this five year old really a murderous sociopath?
A self-help advocate struggles to put his dysfunctional family in its place.
A power-hungry sorcerer curses a princess to live as a swan by day in this tale of everlasting love.
Young Fiona lives with her grandparents in a small fishing village where she takes an active role to unravel the mysterious secrets.
A woman entices a bomb expert she's involved with into destroying the mafia that killed her family.
An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.
When a man inadvertently makes Santa fall off of his roof on Christmas Eve, he finds himself magically recruited to take his place.
Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
Three friends discover their new flatmate dead but loaded with cash.
After his brother tries to kill him, a man survives only to find himself in another man's body.

This Oscar nominated film is the story of two men who are opposites, one gay, the other straight, one a fierce communist, the other a fierce individualist, one suspicious, the other accepting, and how they come to love each other.
De Fran, an administrative assistant on a Hollywood set, has been bullied and treated unreasonably by his boss qiyunde, so Fran kidnapped Qiyun to fight back.
A widowed father has to deal with two complex issues: while he is searching for "Miss Right," his son, who is in his 20s and gay, is searching for "Mr. Right."
To embarrass his rival, a scheming senator uses nitwit Ohio teens who are invited to a Washington gathering on educational failure.
After Fugui and Jiazhen lose their personal fortunes, they raise a family and survive difficult cultural changes during 1940s to 1970s China.
A girl is among the few survivors of a dystopian Earth. Riding a war tank, she fights against the tyranny of a mega-corporation that dominates the remaining potable water supply of the planet.
A man on the run is hunted by a demon known as the Collector.
With the help of long presumed dead Captain Kirk, Captain Picard must stop a deranged scientist willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter a space matrix.
A funeral director tells four strange tales of horror with an African American focus to three drug dealers he traps in his place of business.

The story takes place in Britain in 1914. VIV (Miranda Richardson) meets a man named Eliot (Willem Dafoe). At this time, Eliot is only a young student studying modernist poetry at Morton University in Oxford. They fell in love at first sight and soon entered the palace of marriage together. After marriage, Eliot showed great enthusiasm for writing. VIV supported her husband 100% and even acted as a female secretary. With the passage of time, Eliot's reputation in the literary world gradually increased, but there was a rift between him and VIV. The publication of the wasteland made Eliot reach the first peak of his life, but it also brought a fatal blow to Eliot's marriage with VIV. VIV was diagnosed with neurological disorder and imprisoned.
A small town's women give birth to unfriendly alien children posing as humans.
After his auto-parts tycoon father dies, the overweight, underachieving son teams up with a snide accountant to try and save the family business.
New York actors rehearse Chekhov's "Uncle Vanya" in a dilapidated theatre.
A recovering gambling addict attempts to reconcile with his family and friends but finds trouble and temptation when caught between feelings for his ex-wife and her dangerous hoodlum boyfriend.
1972 Vietnam, a small group of United States Marines relive flashbacks of their contrite lives prior to serving in the military while being left to survive behind enemy lines.
A young man in a small Midwestern town struggles to care for his mentally-disabled younger brother and morbidly obese mother while attempting to pursue his own happiness.
When a virtual reality simulation created using the personalities of multiple serial killers manages to escape into the real world, an ex-cop is tasked with stopping its reign of terror.
A hopelessly romantic Chicago Transit Authority token collector is mistaken for the fiancée of a coma patient.
A Vietnam veteran helps his kids battle over a tree house while recovering from his traumatic war experience.
Story of a young Chinese-Canadian woman caught between traditional and modern societies.
A young social outcast in Australia steals money from her parents to finance a vacation where she hopes to find happiness, and perhaps love.
Seven junior-high-school girls organize a daycare camp for children while at the same time experiencing classic adolescent growing pains.
A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of the missing mascot of the Miami Dolphins.
Two drag performers and a transgender woman travel across the desert to perform their unique style of cabaret.

John Lennon and the rest of his new rock-and-roll group - Paul McCartney, Pete Best, George Harrison and Stuart Sutcliffe - travel to Hamburg to try their luck. Word soon gets out and they become increasingly popular, especially with the girls. But Stuart still thinks he is a better painter than bass guitarist, and he has fallen seriously in love with a German girl. He and the rest of the group have to make some decisions.
After hearing stories of her, a passenger on a cruise ship develops an irresistible infatuation with an eccentric paraplegic's wife.
In New York in 1928, a struggling playwright is forced to cast a mobster's talentless girlfriend in his latest drama in order to get it produced.
CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.
A young boy who witnessed the suicide of a mafia lawyer hires an attorney to protect him when the District Attorney tries to use him to take down a mob family.
In 1959, a widower hires a kindly housekeeper/nanny to care for his seven-year-old daughter.
Spike Lee's vibrant semi-autobiographical portrait of a school teacher, her stubborn jazz musician husband and their five kids living in Brooklyn in 1973.
A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancée's murder.
A reporter hired to write the 'official' biography of Ty Cobb discovers just how dark the baseball legend's real story is.
In a parallel modern-day Stone Age world, a working-class family, the Flintstones, are set up for an executive job. But they learn that money can't buy happiness.

The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweeth
Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.
People from all different walks of life, encounter racial tension, rape, responsibility, and the meaning of an education on a university campus.

Lisette and husband Chino face marital difficulties. She is fed up with the kids, while he has job troubles. His mother Rosaria hates Lisette and the neighborhood tramp has designs on Chino. Things get even worse when Chino goes to j
Peter Brackett and Sabrina Peterson are two competing Chicago newspaper reporters who join forces to unravel the mystery behind a train derailment.
A police officer promises to share his lottery ticket with a waitress in lieu of a tip.
Rudyard Kipling's classic tale of Mowgli, the orphaned jungle boy raised by wild animals, and how he becomes king of the jungle.
A documentary about the life and work of Leni Riefenstahl, a German film director most notorious for making the most effective propaganda films for the Nazis.
Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.
After the death of Lama Dorje, Tibetan Buddhist monks find three children - one American and two Nepalese - who may be the rebirth of their great teacher.

In the first episode of ghost street ten years ago, heather (Heather langenkamp) became a successful actor. Ten years later, Heather has a happy family. However, recently, between frequent earthquakes and telephone harassment by strangers, Heather was quite disturbed by nightmares. Heather and her husband will cooperate in the film, and the film company is going to invite Heather to play the latest episode of ghost street in response to the expectations of the fans of ghost street. Heather's husband died unexpectedly on his way home, while his son Dylan's recent behavior has become more and more strange, and the image of the devil Freddy (Robert Englund) in her dream has become more and more clear. Heather feels that Dylan is under the threat of Freddy, and the murderer on the screen seems to have gained strong strength from the support of the audience, So he jumped out of the film and became a real murderer
Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.
Bret Maverick, needing money for a poker tournament, faces various comic mishaps and challenges, including a charming woman thief.
Dorothy Parker remembers the heyday of the Algonquin Round Table, a circle of friends whose barbed wit, like hers, was fueled by alcohol and flirted with despair.
Frank Drebin (Leslie Nielsen) comes out of retirement to help Police Squad infiltrate a gang of terrorists planning to detonate a bomb at the Academy Awards.
New York City tabloid editor Henry's faced with tough decisions while he faces several serious life challenges, and a tempting job offer.
A documentary filmmaker and her fellow Generation X graduates face life after college, looking for work and love in Houston.
Upon arriving to a small town, a drifter is mistaken for a hitman, but when the real hitman arrives, complications ensue.
A rich young boy finds his family targeted in an inside job and must use his cunning to save them.

A mother with seven sons feels like she's losing control of her life and her family. But personal pain and a troubled marriage fade into the background as news comes that one of her sons might have died in an accident.
Rafting expert Gail takes on a pair of armed killers while navigating a spectacularly violent river.
A young police officer must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.
Two political speechwriters fall in love before they find out they are working for candidates on opposite sides.
Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.

A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used-car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United Stat
The seemingly perfect relationship between a man and his wife is tested as a result of her alcoholism.
Publisher Will Randall becomes a demon wolf and has to fight to keep his job.
From Wichita to Dodge City to the O.K. Corral in Tombstone, a man becomes a myth in this thrilling journey of romance, adventure and desperate, heroic action.

Nelson Crowe is a CIA operative under the thumb of the Company for a disputed delivery of $50,000 in gold. They blackmail him into working for the Grimes Organization, which is set up as a private company for hire, to blackmail promi

Alfred Byrne (Albert Finney) is a middle-aged bus conductor in Dublin, Ireland in 1963. He would appear to live a life of quiet desperation: he's gay, but firmly closeted, and his sister is always trying to find him "the right girl".
An alienated and misanthropic teenager gains sudden and unwanted celebrity status after he's taken hostage by terrorists where his indifference to their threats to kill him makes news headlines.
An ex-cop, now a private detective, takes on the search for the millions stolen by a drug lord.
With the loss of Patroclus (his undeclared male lover), Greek warrior Achilles returns to the Trojan War.

Colonel Chabert has been severely wounded in the French-Russian Napoleonic war to the point that the medical examiner has signed his death certificate. When he regains his health and memory, he goes back to Paris, where his "widow",

It tells the adventures of three a-go-go-dancers on the road and wilderness. The female leader is a Japanese woman with a grim face and a karate black belt. The other two are Latin Americans and blondes. The important thing is that the chest of the three little wild cats is unprecedented. In other words, the three little wild cats drove a sports car on the road and met a couple in the desert. The female leader disagreed with the man. At the beginning, they quarreled and then used force. The female leader beat the man and broke his arm with her bare hands. The three little wild cats robbed the poor little woman left. The four arrived at a village house on the wasteland. There were three men living in the house. The old one was his father. He was bad at doing things, but he was old and crafty. He had developed limbs and a simple mind, and big boy was a normal countryman. Three men invited four women as guests... In the subsequent plot, it is unclear whether the man covets the beauty of the woman, or the woman covets the man, whether the female leader is greedy for the money of the old traitor, or whether the old traitor saw through that the little wild cat had killed and robbed. In short, in the end, Da Zi helped the little woman escape. The female leader rushed to a scuffle with him. Finally, the female leader was killed by the little woman

Two brothers, survivors of family tragedy, take different life paths: one falls for a high-spirited waitress and dreams of success, the other follows a life of petty crime. Their lives reconnect in shattering fashion.

A boy born the size of a small doll is kidnapped by a genetic lab and must find a way back to his father in this inventive adventure filmed using stop motion animation techniques. Tom meets a variety of strange creatures and eventual
Col. Guile and various other martial arts heroes fight against the tyranny of Dictator M. Bison and his cohorts.
A bookie is promoted to Hitman and seemingly excels at his new found job.

Jackie and Eugene are joined by a mystical wind tunnel which enables them to speak across a 500-mile desert. Believed by the Indians to be an omen of good luck, the wind inspires both characters to face their fears and follow their h
Three young men decide to plan a mock kidnapping, but everything goes wrong because a real bank robbery was already planned by two other guys.

A group of college seniors spending a weekend at a cottage for a psychological experiment called "fear therapy" find a human-sized wooden figure called Morty, which triggers everyone's deepest and darkest secrets and emotions.
A documentary about two famed Disney animators, Frank and Ollie.

A runaway meets up with a young man in the bus station who leads her to a rendezvous with two others who are planning a bank robbery. She is convinced to drive the getaway car for $5,000 and assured that everything will go smoothly.

In New Mexico, the widow and former teacher Katherine Samuel reluctantly hires the lonely mathematician and genius Archie Landrum to be her gardener and soon they become good friends. When her estranged daughter Lucille "Lucy" Samuel
Matteo Juarez is a retired detective hired by a local businessman to follow his wife Jennifer. She has a split personality and seems to be putting herself in danger without knowing it.

The film won a special award at the Lauderdale Film Festival. Stu Sean is a strong viewer in the television circle. He suddenly became popular overnight and became a big star in the television circle. Although he is now in a high position, he is still afraid of coming down, especially when he is over inflated. On the eve of the new season of television, Rachel, the director of national radio, was attracted by Stuart. Rachel hired Stuart To take over the network of Gan radio station, there is an endless farce under the competition of ratings between PBT and GPN. This film focuses on satirizing famous people

Amir is a sad... Literally. As an expert in relationship termination, his dissatisfied friends provide dumping services and flower days, provide comprehensive bad news, and unknown lovers in Los Angeles. Although Amir claims that he is just a messenger, which makes him cynical about his work, and as a result, he is a bachelor in his group of friends. This becomes very obvious, His best friend recently told him that he could no longer be his best because of bad relations and karma. When Amir returned home for Thanksgiving, he was his long lost cousin, Zara, who decided to catch a ride back to Los Angeles with him. As a joke, The two cousins pretended to be in front of Amir's friends, the couple and their tricks came dangerously close too far

Brother Minister reveals the mystery surrounding the assassination of Malcolm X at the Audubon Ballroom in New York City on February 21, 1965. It probes the innocence of two of the convicted assassins, reveals the true identity of th
Deceived that he had won the Prize, Connor MacLeod awakens from a peaceful life when an entombed immortal magician comes seeking the Highlander.

On the mean streets of Providence, five friends struggle for a future in the mob-infested neighborhood known as Federal hill. Petty burglar Ralph and his drug-dealing friend Nicky are inseparable until Nicky meets a beautiful….

The best-selling horror writer Sartre Kane (Jurgen plosno, J ü rgen Prochnow) is mysteriously missing. Some of the novel manuscripts written by him and to be published and printed disappeared mysteriously. Kane's immersive description and bold and forward-looking prediction make the book famous before it is published. Many fans are infatuated with his works and can't extricate themselves, and even make irrational violence. In order not to delay the publication, the publisher asked private detective John Trent (Sam Neill) and female editor Linda stiles (Julie Carmen) to track down Kane's whereabouts. John didn't believe in the magic of the book at first, but when he and Linda arrived at Kane's Town, they were both shocked. The town was really what Kane described, and the terrible and strange things in the novel happened immediately.
This movie chronicles the life of Lane Frost, 1987 PRCA Bull Riding World Champion, his marriage and his friendships with Tuff Hedeman (three-time World Champion) and Cody Lambert.

Story of a promising high school basketball star and his relationships with two brothers, one a drug dealer and the other a former basketball star fallen on hard times and now employed as a security guard.
The Addams Family try to rescue their beloved Uncle Fester from his gold-digging new love, a black widow named Debbie.
Stand up comedy by Martin Lawrence, filmed in the Majestic Theater in New York City. Martin Lawrence talks about everything from racism, to relationships, to his childhood.
A tale of nineteenth-century New York high society in which a young lawyer falls in love with a woman separated from her husband, while he is engaged to the woman's cousin.
Three band members hoping for a big break head to a radio station to play their demo tape and wind up holding everyone hostage with plastic guns when the head D.J. refuses to play them.
A basketball coach travels to Africa to recruit a new star.
Two immature detectives are joined by a pesky assistant district attorney in staking out a lakeside home where a Mafia trial witness is believed to be heading.
Four prostitutes join together to travel the Old West.
An American working in Barcelona, having sworn off beautiful women, is forced to be host to his playboy cousin in this witty comedy of good intentions and mixed signals.
One man must learn the meaning of courage across four lifetimes centuries apart.
A feature adaptation of the classic television show, when nice guy redneck Jed Clampett strikes it rich when he finds black oil, and moves him and his kin to posh Beverly Hills.

Axel Foley, while investigating a car theft ring, comes across something much bigger than that: the same men who killed his boss are running a counterfeit money ring out of a theme park in Los Angeles.
The fates of horses, and the people who own and command them, are revealed as Black Beauty narrates the circle of his life.

Emma, the blind violinist, recovered her eyesight after receiving a cornea, but the first thing she saw was a murder. Because she could only see some distorted images, the police doubted her testimony and even thought it was an illusion caused by her mother's abuse in her childhood. However, the young criminal policeman John persevered in tracking down the clues provided by Emma and made unexpected discoveries.
An Irish bomber escapes from prison and targets a member of the Boston bomb squad.
A college basketball coach is forced to break the rules in order to get the players he needs to stay competitive.
Jessica Lange stars in a period drama about a family moving to a military base, and she quickly becomes part of a cover-up involving nuclear bomb tests.
A teenage girl and her father discover alien clones are replacing humans on a remote U.S. military base in Alabama.
A surgeon becomes obsessed with the seductive woman he once was in an affair with. Refusing to accept that she has moved on, he amputates her limbs and holds her captive in his mansion.
A father becomes worried when a local gangster befriends his son in the Bronx in the 1960s.
A foul-mouthed finishing school graduate mistakenly winds up on an ill-fated fishing boat and faces the wrath of a crew that considers him bad luck.
Three young men go on an end of the summer trip to Hollywood, California. Their quest: to fulfill the fantasy of meeting Marilyn Monroe.
A Puerto Rican former convict, just released from prison, pledges to stay away from drugs and violence despite the pressure around him and lead on to a better life outside of N.Y.C.
One year after their first adventure, Mitch Robbins and his friends discover a treasure map that belonged to their late trail guide Curly and they set out to discover its secrets.
A private eye who suffers total amnesia every twenty-four hours is deeply entangled in a complicated murder and theft case.
A botched mid-air heist results in suitcases full of cash being searched for by various groups throughout the Rocky Mountains.
Aliens with conical crania crash-land on Earth.

A color-blind psychiatrist Bill Capa is stalked by an unknown killer after taking over his murdered friend's therapy group, all of whom have a connection to a mysterious young woman that Capa begins having intense sexual encounters w
