George and Lucy soon fell in love. However, George from the lower class had many "bad habits" that Lucy couldn't stand. Charlotte didn't like George very much. They made a lot of "jokes" in their communication. Once, George "deviant" kissed Lucy. Lucy thought George was too "impolite", so she went back to England alone. George soon returned to his country, but Lucy was engaged

An uptight teenage prodigy enters a top engineering college, but feels awkward among the freewheeling students. When a professor aims to turn their laser project into a military weapon, he and his offbeat roommate plot to ruin the pl
A confined but troubled rock star descends into madness in the midst of his physical and social isolation from everyone.
A journalist is trapped in Cambodia during tyrant Pol Pot's bloody 'Year Zero' cleansing campaign, which claimed the lives of two million 'undesirable' civilians.
A boy and his brother don't get along well. In order to let their ill mother rest, they're separated and sent each one with their relatives.
A starship crew in the 23rd century goes to investigate the silence of a distant planet's colony, only to find just two survivors, a powerful robot, and the deadly secret of a lost civilization.

Iowa farmer Ray Kinsella is inspired by a voice he can't ignore to pursue a dream he can hardly believe. Supported by his wife, Ray begins the quest by turning his ordinary cornfield into a place where dreams can come true.
Two former British soldiers in 1880s India decide to set themselves up as Kings in Kafiristan, a land where no white man has set foot since Alexander the Great.

Wyoming, early 1900s. Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid are the leaders of a band of outlaws. After a train robbery goes wrong they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels. Their solution - escape to Bolivia.
Travis Henderson, an aimless drifter who has been missing for four years, wanders out of the desert and must reconnect with society, himself, his life, and his family.

In 1999, Claire's life is forever changed after she survives a car crash. She rescues Sam and starts traveling around the world with him. Writer Eugene follows them and writes their story, as a way of recording dreams is being invent
Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.

Some friends meet each other at a bar in Vegas. After many drinks someone gets shot by his "friend". They decide to hide the body in the trunk of their car and drive to L.A. where they can get help disposing of the body. Each person

Seth is a youth with artistic leanings, a fascination with Black pop culture, and a dead-end life in an Adirondack village. He's alternatively sensitive and brutal with Kristen, who wants a sexual relationship that he explosively rej
Documentary covering the growth and subsequent overexposure of the Seattle "grunge" music scene in the early 90s
An evil millionaire believes he is Santa Claus after an accident renders him amnesiac.
An ambitious female attorney wallows in excess and meaningless sex with both male and female partners, while dealing with her personal life problems including helping her kleptomaniac sister.
With his boss in the madhouse, a mobster is temporary boss of the criminal empire just as vicious rivals threaten the control of the empire.

She's Kathy, a comix cartoonist; he's David, teaching English to new immigrants. It's New York City, with 29 shopping days left until Christmas, and they're in love. Or are they? Their romance has been on-again, off-again because Dav
Female artists, writers, photographers, designers, and adventurers are settled in Paris between the wars.
The film tells of faithful devotion to spiritual ideals. It is based on Riga St. Anna Stocken's Life Story of the Cistercian Monastery of Mary Magdalene.

Two old men - a white former radical, and a black retired janitor - strike up an unusual and funny friendship on a park bench in New York, where they deal with family, drug dealers, and the pitfalls of age.
JC thinks surfing is everything. His girlfriend Chloe wants him to settle down. When he decides to go surfing one night with friends from London, she throws JC out. Surfing or Chloe?

Nanlinwu (Yoshida Liang) is a weak willed boy who loves small animals and is a kind-hearted boy. One day, ah Wu found Yicun mage drifting in the river and took him home. Their relationship eventually made them good friends. Yicun mage told ah Wu: my hometown is a water source, which is a beautiful water town. During this time, The seemingly weak Yicun mage showed great courage in front of ah Wu, and taught ah Wu to accept challenges and gain ah Wu's respect. However, when the AWU family returned home to visit the tomb, Yicun mage fell ill because of drinking polluted water. In order to treat him, AWU set out to the water source to find clean water

After a long flight, Ripley (Sigourney Weaver) didn't fly back to earth! An accident occurred on the return of the spacecraft. Before the mother ship exploded, the low-temperature dormant module broke away from the main ship and fell into a dark and cold planet. Except for the remaining bishop, only Ripley survived. This is an abandoned alien mine on earth. It has now become a prison for dangerous prisoners. Ripley recovered from the doctor's help. With the arrival of Ripley, the prisoners here began to be mysteriously killed one by one. The authorities thought it was an internal crime, but Ripley knew it was not so simple. When she found the Bishop's body and connected it to the computer to check the flight records, she confirmed her idea: the alien came.
Two American college students on a walking tour of Britain are attacked by a werewolf that none of the locals will admit exists.

An architect brings home a mysterious old clock, not knowing that it's haunted by the demonic presence of the Amityville house. Soon, the clock begins to alter time and space and starts to possess members of the household.

A reporter moves into the Amityville house in defiance of the supernatural events connected to it, and finds everyone around him besieged by the evil manifestations which are connected to a demonic presence in the basement.
A children's doll house, which is a miniature of the infamous haunted Long Island house, is given to a young girl where the demonic evil soon comes out to cause more terror.
An old mirror from the Amityville house finds its way into a young photographer's home, where the demonic presence soon manifests itself to cause more death and mayhem.
A dysfunctional family moves into a new house, which proves to be satanic, resulting in the demonic possession of their teenage son.

Newlyweds and their three children move into a large house where a mass murder was committed. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations which have strong effects on everyone living in or visiting the house.
Five people spend the night in an abandoned house, the Amityville haunted house, and soon find themselves terrorized by assorted ghosts, venomous insects and ghostly apparitions.
An ailing vampire count travels to Italy with his servant to find a bride.
Nine college students staying at a friend's remote island mansion begin to fall victim to an unseen murderer over the April Fool's Day weekend, but nothing is as it seems.
A stranger attempts to convince a happily married couple that their daughter is actually his daughter reincarnated.
A New York psychiatrist finds that a brujería-inspired cult, which believes in child sacrifice, has a keen interest in his own son.
A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people.
An alien lifeform consumes everything in its path as it grows and grows.

A young woman walks on the deserted beach in the morning. Suddenly, the beach drags her into the sand as if she were alive. She struggles and screams in despair... Detective Harry Calder (David Huffman) is ordered to investigate this rare case. The only evidence left on the beach is the eye of a victim. Soon, an old woman Mariana was killed on the beach. The mysterious and terrible beach attacked people one after another. Most of the victims were sucked into the sand and disappeared without a trace, and a few survivors were left with permanent disability. Hidden under the beach sand
After losing his arm in a car accident, a criminal psychologist has it replaced with a limb that belonged to a serial killer.
A ruthless doctor and his young prize student find themselves continually harassed by their murderous supplier of illegal cadavers.

This is a spooky vampire legend, but also a sad and sad love story. In 1462, the Turks invaded Constantinople and threatened the whole Christianity. Count Dracula (Gary Alderman), a Romanian general, was ordered to levy when he was in danger. Unexpectedly, when he won, there were rumors in the city that he had died in the battle. His wife Elizabeth (Winona Ryder) threw herself into a river because of grief. Dracula, who returned to his class, saw only his wife's body. Therefore, he became angry with God and incarnated into evil forces, continued his life by sucking blood, and became an immortal vampire zombie. Four hundred years later, the story goes to London in 1897. The young lawyer Qiang Nasheng (Keanu Reeves) was ordered to go to the Dracula family castle in transvania, Romania to handle the real estate formalities of the noble descendant in London. To this end, he will be separated from his fiancee, the beautiful Meina (Winona Ryder). The owner of Dracula castle is the Count Dracula who has become a vampire. He finds that Meina is strikingly similar to Elizabeth and thinks that Meina is the reincarnation of Lisa. He decided to find Meina and find the true love that had been lost for 400 years. He imprisoned Jonah in the castle and brought boxes of native soil: This was the source of his strength. He sailed all the way to London. His arrival revived the dark forces in London. London is in a mysterious terror. But Meina always hears a mysterious call of the soul in the dark, with a strong longing in fear······
Mary Shelley reveals the main characters of her novel survived: Dr. Frankenstein, goaded by an even madder scientist, builds his monster a mate.
A family moves into a large old mansion in the countryside which seems to have a mysterious and sinister power over its new residents.
The Candyman, a murderous soul with a hook for a hand, is accidentally summoned to reality by a skeptic grad student researching the monster's myth.
A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a fourteen-year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him.
A lawyer's family is stalked by a man he once helped put in jail.
Carrie White, a shy, friendless teenage girl who is sheltered by her domineering, religious mother, unleashes her telekinetic powers after being humiliated by her classmates at her senior prom.
A young woman's sexual awakening brings horror when she discovers her urges transform her into a monstrous black leopard.
The monstrous spirit of a slain child murderer seeks revenge by invading the dreams of teenagers whose parents were responsible for his untimely death.
Vampire Count Orlok expresses interest in a new residence and real estate agent Hutter's wife.
Professor Paris Catalano visits Venice, to investigate the last known appearance of the famous vampire Nosferatu during the carnival of 1786.
Mysterious deaths surround an American ambassador. Could the child that he is raising actually be the Antichrist? The Devil's own son?

Cat Hogan returns to West Meath upon her mother's sudden death - she has an accident at home and died (or was it an accident?). Blood is about old secrets, older betrayals, mind games and the lies family tell each other.
While escaping from a foiled robbery attempt, three thieves find themselves surrounded by police at a New Orleans bar--only they're not the people the police are searching for.
A shy, middle-aged professor enters into a romantic but non-physical relationship with an unlucky-in-love colleague.
Oilman Jan is paralyzed in an accident. His wife, who prayed for his return, feels guilty; even more, when Jan urges her to have sex with another.
A law student, who takes a job as a night watchman at a morgue, begins to discover clues that implicate him as the suspect of a series of murders.

The Borg travel back in time intent on preventing Earth's first contact with an alien species. Captain Picard and his crew pursue them to ensure that Zefram Cochrane makes his maiden flight reaching warp speed.
Pianist David Helfgott, driven by his father and teachers, has a breakdown. Years later he returns to the piano, to popular if not critical acclaim.
Karl Childers, a simple man hospitalized since his childhood murder of his mother and her lover, is released to start a new life in a small town.
A father vows to get his son a Turbo Man action figure for Christmas. However, every store is sold out of them, and he must travel all over town and compete with everybody else in order to find one.

Movie director Niccolo has just been left by his wife. He goes after another girl, who also leaves him. This gives him the idea of making a movie about women's relationships. He starts to search for a woman who can play the leading p
A horrific triple child murder leads to an indictment and trial of three nonconformist boys based on questionable evidence.
The story of the Finzi-Continis, a noble family of Ferrara, during the Jewish persecution in Italy's 1930s.
An angel comes to Earth to help a preacher save his church and his family.

A young writer whose proposal was recently rejected goes to Greenland to spend a year at an outpost for hunting and trapping animals for furs. At the outpost he meets two men who are none too keen to spend the winter with the newcome
To get royal backing on a needed drainage project, a poor French lord must learn to play the delicate games of wit at court at Versailles.
A Salem resident attempts to frame her ex-lover's wife for being a witch in the middle of the 1692 witchcraft trials.
An evil high-fashion designer plots to steal Dalmatian puppies in order to make an extravagant fur coat, but instead creates an extravagant mess.

Back in his village, former war prisoner Bruno Baldi is dead set on avenging his brother who has been shot by a German firing squad after being given away by a villager. But nobody wants to give him the name of the culprit. At long l
A serial killer terrorizes Paris at night, but that doesn't stop Daïga and Théo from meeting up, and falling in love.
John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.
When an alien spacecraft of enormous power is spotted approaching Earth, Admiral James T. Kirk resumes command of the overhauled USS Enterprise in order to intercept it.

On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.
Captain Kirk and his crew must deal with Mr. Spock's long-lost half-brother who hijacks the Enterprise for an obsessive search for God at the center of the galaxy.
With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.
Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned U.S.S. Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis Planet to recover Spock's body.
To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral James T. Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to San Francisco in 1986 to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it: humpback whales.

While Batman deals with a deformed man calling himself the Penguin wreaking havoc across Gotham with the help of a cruel businessman, a female employee of the latter becomes the Catwoman with her own vendetta.
A group of young gunmen, led by Billy the Kid, become deputies to avenge the murder of the rancher who became their benefactor. But when Billy takes their authority too far, they become the hunted.
In 1881, cattle baron John Chisum pays a bounty to Patrick Floyd Garrett to kill outlaw Billy the Kid.
Good girl Sandy Olsson and greaser Danny Zuko fell in love over the summer. When they unexpectedly discover they're now in the same high school, will they be able to rekindle their romance?
A British student at a 1960s American high school must prove himself to the leader of a girls' gang whose members can only date greasers.
A retired DEA agent is out to hunt down and take out a Jamaican drug posse that has targeted he and his family for murder.
A bioweapon leaks in Eastern Europe and spreads west. It mutates in a quarantine area, creating a killer monster. Can a group of cops stop it and the new virus?
Publishing magnate refuses to publish a book by his son's male lover so the kids buy out their father and run it themselves!
An ex-Navy Seal turned cook is the only person who can stop a group of terrorists when they seize control of a U.S. battleship.
A Swedish whaler is out for revenge when he finds out that a greedy oil man murdered his father for their land.
When a killer shark unleashes chaos on beach community off Long Island, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.
Police chief Brody must protect the citizens of Amity after a second monstrous shark begins terrorizing the waters.
A giant thirty-five-foot shark becomes trapped in a SeaWorld theme park and it's up to the sons of police chief Brody to rescue everyone.
Two former U. S. Presidents, hated rivals, join forces to expose the current, corrupt President at the risk of their lives.
Earth is invaded by Martians with unbeatable weapons and a cruel sense of humor.
An irresponsible, drug-addicted, recently impregnated woman finds herself in the middle of an abortion debate when both parties attempt to sway her to their respective sides.

When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent agent with the only athlete who stays with him and his former colleague.
When a childless couple of an ex-con and an ex-cop decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives become more complicated than they anticipated.
A minor car accident drives two rival aluminum-siding salesmen to the ridiculous extremes of man versus man in 1963 Baltimore.
A security pro finds his past coming back to haunt him, when he and his unique team are tasked with retrieving a particularly important item.
A mother and daughter find their lives adversely affected when a new man enters the picture. Will their family ever be what they expect?
A bitter love story between a talented writer and a gentle nurse.
After seventeen years, a fiercely independent woman and her rebellious son return home and together they turn the family she left behind upside down.

Charlotte Ellis is a devoted mother, caring for her five children alone, following the departure of her cruel, alcoholic husband Roger To make her situation worse, her son Leon is going off the rails.
A Mississippi district attorney and the widow of Medgar Evers struggle to finally bring a white racist to justice for the 1963 murder of the civil rights leader.
A newly elected District Attorney finds himself in the middle of a police corruption investigation that may involve his father and his partner.
Our intrepid adolescent heroes wake up to find their beloved television stolen, and embark on an epic journey across America to recover it, and, who knows, maybe even score.

The Prince of Salerno, Don Ramiro, changes places with his valet, Dandini, and then meets the girl of his dreams - Cenerentola. Meanwhile, Cenerentola's stepsisters, Clorinda and Tisbe, fawn over the fake prince (Dandini). When Cenerentola is left alone, weeping, the Philosopher, Alidoro, takes her (dressed in beautiful clothing) to the palace, where she is an immediate hit with everyone - including Dandini. Confusion reigns when the identity of the real Prince is revealed. Written by David McAnally
A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a new killer, who targets the girl and her friends by using horror films as part of a deadly game.
Three trappers protect the daughters of a British Colonel in the midst of the French and Indian War.
Two tabloid reporters checking out a report of the Archangel Michael living with an old woman find that it's true. But that's not the only surprise.

Continuing the story of Aurora Greenway in her latter years. After the death of her daughter, Aurora struggled to keep her family together, but has one grandson in jail, a rebellious granddaughter, and another grandson living just ab
Hamlet, Prince of Denmark, returns home to find his father murdered and his mother remarrying the murderer, his uncle. Meanwhile, war is brewing.

The 1981 hunger strike in an Irish prison, in which I.R.A. prisoner Bobby Sands led a protest against their treatment as criminals rather than as prisoners of war. It focuses on the mothers of two of the strikers, and their struggle.

In 1933 Texas, a schoolteacher and aspiring writer meets a pulp fiction writer, and a relationship soon develops between the two, but it is doomed by his slavishly devotion to his ailing mother and insistence on his freedom.
A neurotic, twice-divorced sci-fi writer moves back in with his mother to solve his personal problems.
The fates of four different people - a thief, a cop, a female professor of philosophy, a suicidal girl - unexpectedly collide.

The hit musical based on the life of Eva Perón (Evita Duarte), a B-picture Argentinian actress who eventually became the wife of Argentinian president Juan Domingo Perón, and the most beloved and hated woman in Argentina.

An American girl inherits a fortune and falls into a misguided relationship with a gentleman confidence artist whose true nature, including a barbed and covetous disposition, turns her life into a nightmare.
Two city-bred siblings are stranded in the Australian Outback, where they learn to survive with the aid of an Aboriginal boy on his "walkabout": a ritual separation from his tribe.

In August 1970 600,000 fans flocked to the Isle of Wight to witness the third and final festival to be held on the island. Besides the music, they also got a look at the greed, cynicism and corruption that would plague the music indu

A series of still photographs taken by 'Linda McCartney' of the Grateful Dead at the Dead's house in Haight-Ashbury and at a concert in Central Park, both in the early days of the band. Panning, morphing, and other techniques are used to impart some motion. Excerpts from three Dead songs are played in the background.

A young woman is murdered in the White House. Homicide detective Regis (Wesley Snipes) investigates while Secret Service works against him. He's assigned agent Chance (Diane Lane). She eventually cooperates after a man's framed.

A documentary about why the United States launched the war against Vietnam from 1959 to 1975, the tragic experience of the Vietnamese people, and the change of the American people's attitude towards the Vietnam War.

A South African political prisoner is tortured to obtain information on apartheid conspirators. Ten years later, the head officer in charge of the questioning is similarly held as prisoner and questioned about his past offenses.
Zookeepers struggle to deal with the policies of changing directors.
A touching friendship story between a dog and a dolphin.
After a shootout on a flight transporting prisoners, a flight attendant must outwit a smooth-talking serial killer and land the plane herself.
Two schizophrenics meet during therapy and fall passionately in love. Ahead of them lies the inevitable road to disaster - one they share to the end.
This fourth installment of Chan's Police Story film franchise has our hero trying to locate a missing nuclear warhead.

William Smith, a middle-class school teacher from a suburb in London, returns home one day to find his wife Gilda has run off with her boyfriend and taken all his possessions with her. With the help of his sister, Susan, they begin a
A man tries to rescue a woman with a little help from his half brother.
A Hostage Negotiator teams up with a Sharpshooter to bring down a dangerous jewel thief.

In 2003, the future world was ruled by a ruthless leader using advanced weapons. He had a huge group specializing in the production of advanced weapons. The president of the group, Nicholson, suddenly died. The cause of death was unknown and the death was terrible, so the mysterious woman Carly took over the post of president. Soon after taking office, Carly immediately confronted the leader and launched a dragon fight against the murderous weapon designed by the leader - Shashen 10.
A cynical tattooed loser first loses his job as a janitor in a bar run by a dwarf, then loses his mind.
While struggling with his midlife crisis, Harry receives an invitation for his high school's reunion back so he takes Sue and their teenage kids on a cross-country car trip back to the Big Apple.

Four children live with their terminally ill mother. After she dies, they try to hold things together. In their isolated house, they begin to deteriorate mentally, whilst they hide their mom's decomposing corpse in a makeshift concre
A vulcanologist arrives at a countryside town recently named the second most desirable place to live in America, and discovers that the long dormant volcano, Dante's Peak, may wake up at any moment.
Wally Sparks is a tabloid television show reporter, who's trying to boost ratings on his show. He goes to the Governor's mansion to uncover a sex scandal.

Amos Lasher loses his wife and home in an accident, finding himself in the care of the state, or specifically speaking, the Sunset Nursing Home. Here he finds the head nurse, Daisy Daws, ruling the cowed patients with an iron hand, b

Aaron and psychiatrist Bix Konstadt plan to operate on a young boy with obsessive compulsive disorder in an attempt to cure him. Aaron worries when Bix admits she's a manic depressive off her medication. Watters, Nyland and Kronk have their hands full with a woman who may have been abducted by aliens. Heart transplant recipient Henry Alden is brought in complaining of pain. Alden insists on speaking to Robert Malzone, the husband of the woman who donated the heart.
Based on the life of Olympic hopeful Steve Prefontaine, a long distance runner who lived in Oregon and died young.
Captures the past, present, and future of the remarkable Epstein brothers - Max, Julie and Willie - Klezmer music legends on a joyous international comeback tour.

It is a satire about life in Cuba. The members of a funeral procession and some truckdrivers who have to take the same route begin to talk about god and the world ending up in discovering that life for both groups has many similariti
A retired Navy officer returns to active duty, along with a group of misfit sailors, to battle his former nemesis.
A confirmed bachelor is in for the surprise of his life when a get-rich-quick scheme backfires and leaves him with a pint-sized new roommate.
Two friends try to kick their drug addiction after a friend dies from an overdose, when they try to enroll in a detox program, things quickly go wrong.

The documentary tells about the first mountain force in the United States, which was established around 1938. It gathered outdoor enthusiasts from all over the country at that time. After many years of training in a valley in Colorado, it went to the European battlefield at the end of 1944, sneaked into the German army from the southern foothills of the Italian Alps, and finally tore through the German defense line. More than 10000 troops were killed and 900 wounded, and they returned home with honor.
An aspiring director and the marginally talented amateur cast of a hokey small-town Missouri musical production go overboard when they learn that someone from Broadway will be in attendance.

Two Russian soldiers, one battle-seasoned and the other barely into his boots and uniform, are taken prisoner by an anxious Islamic father from a remote village hoping to trade them for his captured son.
A New York City cosmetologist, mistakenly thought to be a science teacher, is offered a job to teach the children of an Eastern European dictator.

In a small town in Texas, five young people who dream but don't take action spend all day fooling around in the street, hoping that they can make something famous one day. One day, Bonnie, an old high school acquaintance, returned home to visit them. Everything has been different since then
Twin brothers meet a childhood sweetheart at a tacky hotel and rediscover their love as they renew their competition for her affection.
A Miami con man agrees to be the human target for a Neo-Nazi manhunter in order to collect $50,000 if he survives.
After a one night stand with Alex, Isabel realizes that she is pregnant and they decide to get married. However, along with the marriage comes compromise of one's own cultural traditions.
At the discovery of his ability to work miracles, Juvenal becomes a media sensation, but now he's prone to those who want to exploit him.
Career thief Luther Whitney (Clint Eastwood) witnesses a horrific crime involving U.S. President Alan Richmond (Gene Hackman).
A maid is kidnapped and scratches a message onto D.C. the cat's collar and when his owner Patti discovers this, she plays amateur detective with the help of D.C. to try to find the culprits.
In the fourth outing for the vacation franchise, the Griswolds have to survive Vegas fever when they go to Las Vegas for a fun family vacation.

It was a nightmare that shocked not only New York, but all of America. The public outcry about the Willowbrook State School for people with developmental disabilities resulted from Geraldo Rivera's expose on WABC after he had entered
A bride's divorced parents find their old feelings for each other during the wedding reception and over the course of the next few days upsetting the newlywed's honeymoon.
Anonymous videotapes presage a musician's murder conviction, and a gangster's girlfriend leads a mechanic astray.
A dramatization of a 1923 horrific racist lynch mob attack on an African-American community.
An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the mafia life, at the expense of his regular one.
Salut Cousin! is the tale of two Algerian cousins and their mishaps in the racially volatile environment of Paris.
Two friends who have gone too long without sex set out to get some.
A study in the world of hip-hop, done mostly with interviews, in order to see why it is as popular as it is today and what the future holds.

Compilation of four short films about homoerotic situations involving young men. Tom DeCerchio directed "Nunzio's Second Cousin", telling the story of a gay cop who forces a gay-basher to come to his house and have dinner with his fa
A retired thief swears revenge on the lunatic who murdered his brother and partner, while going on the run with the loot they stole.
Four best men pick up their friend, the groom, outside prison. On the way to the chapel, they stop at a bank and get involved in a robbery. The bank's surrounded. FBI takes over.

When Michael Jiahua (Tim Allen), a successful broker, went to Amazon forest to find his wife to sign the marriage letter, he found a surprise - he had a 13-year-old son raised by aborigines! Michael finally agreed to take his son back to his stone dung forest, New York City, and soon realized his son's tenacious mischievous talent! At the same time, it is not easy for his son to adapt to Migao's fiancee and prominent business partners. The process of mutual adaptation is absolutely funny and wonderful!
Two female friends become sexual rivals at maturity.
The autobiographical story of Howard Stern, the radio rebel who is now also a TV personality, an author and a movie star.

Darius Lovehall is a young black poet in Chicago who starts dating Nina Mosley, a beautiful and talented photographer. While trying to figure out if they've got a "love thing" or are just "kicking it," they hang out with their friend

Simon Templar (The Saint), is a thief for hire, whose latest job to steal the secret process for cold fusion puts him at odds with a traitor bent on toppling the Russian government, as well as the woman who holds its secret.

A 6 y.o. Inuit boy runs off a snowy roof in Copenhagen and dies. Smilla, a half Inuit who lives in the building and knows the boy, looks into it. What makes an acrophobic boy run up on the roof? The clues take her to Greenland.

Set in the fictional Dublin suburb of Barrytown, Bimbo is a baker who loses his job after being made redundant. Bimbo then acquires the help of his best friend, Larry, to set up a successful burger van.

After getting into a serious car accident, a TV director discovers an underground sub-culture of scarred, omnisexual car-crash victims who use car accidents and the raw sexual energy they produce to try to rejuvenate his sex life wit
When she discovers a love letter written to her husband by an unknown paramour, the distraught Eliza turns to her tight-knit Long Island family for advice.
A fast-track lawyer can't lie for 24 hours due to his son's birthday wish after he disappoints his son for the last time.
A seven-year-old girl adopts a vow of silence in protest when her quarrelsome parents grow increasingly hostile to one another.
The true story of Selena, a Texas-born Tejano singer who rose from cult status to performing at the Astrodome, as well as having chart topping albums on the Latin music charts.
A police officer uncovers the real identity of his house-guest, an I.R.A. terrorist in hiding.
Danny, an ambitious singing and dancing cat, goes to Hollywood and overcomes several obstacles to fulfill his dream of becoming a movie star.
Two tacky homegirls move to L.A. to become dancers; instead they scam a dying millionaire but eventually become B*A*P*S (Black American Princesses).
A day in the life of two film-school students trying to find love and another house-mate.
A college athlete returns from the dead to help his brother's basketball team win the NCAA title.
A space alien is threatening to bring destruction on Earth, and the Power Rangers are enhanced with turbo powers in order to prevent his plan.
Anna (Marceau) is a wife and mother who has an affair with the handsome Count Vronsky (Bean). Based on the novel by Tolstoy.
An international spy teams up with an arms dealer to escape from a penal colony and rescue his family from a terrorist.
Two working class brothers court three wealthy and beautiful sisters in a small Illinois town.
A "National Geographic" film crew is taken hostage by an insane hunter, who forces them along on his quest to capture the world's largest - and deadliest - snake.

Martin Blank is a professional assassin. He is sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb, Grosse Pointe, and, by coincidence, his ten-year high school reunion party is taking place there at the same time.

Richter is a lazy son of a wealthy woman, who's put up with too much so no more money. He's about to lose his local newspaper job arranged by his mom. Richter owes money to a violent drug dealer/blackmailer but sees his wife. Death w
Over the years, a child's romantic ideals about death blossom into necrophilia, the study of embalming and the most profound relationship of her life.
A mob bagman finds that his luggage, containing the proof of his gang's latest hit, has been switched.

Following the break-up of his marriage after revealing his homosexuality, GP Martin Wyatt loses custody of his son Oliver to his now ex-wife Hannah and her new partner Frank. It is not long, however, until Oliver appears at the house
A group of women who are imprisoned on the island of Sumatra by the Japanese during World War II use music to relieve their misery.
A man joins a group of nomadic con artists in rural North Carolina.

Claude and Ellen are best friends who live in a not-so-nice area of New York. They're involved in the subculture of 90s youth, complete with drugs, live music, and homophobia. All is changed one night when a violent and meaningless d

Two brothers, Lex and younger Mick, are living in Harlem. Mick is a policeman, and Lex, who spent youth years in reformatory because of injustice after he confronted the cop who tried to sodomize Mick on the street, is living with hi

The story of Pascal Ichak, a larger-than-life French traveller, bon vivant, and chef, who falls in love with Georgia and a Georgian princess in the early 1920s. All is well until the arrival of the Red Army of the Caucasus, as the So
Two dim-witted, inseparable friends hit the road for their ten-year high school reunion and concoct an elaborate lie about their lives in order to impress their classmates.

Not far from Shanghai, in a country town stands the palatial home of the Pang family. Old Master Pang is an addict who brings up his beautiful daughter Ruyi on opium smoke. Her older brother, Zhengda, is addicted as well, and then pa
A volcano erupts in downtown Los Angeles and a city official and a seismologist try to stop its inevitable flow through the city.
Few knew that Stalin spent his last night in the arms of a young Australian woman. Few still knew that their "love-child" brought Australia to the brink of civil war. Until now.
A world-class playboy and part-time secret agent from the 1960s emerges after thirty years in a cryogenic state to battle with his nemesis Dr. Evil.

Jeff (Kurt Russell) and Amy (Kathleen Quinlan) are a couple. During a long trip, their vehicle broke down in the wilderness. Just as they were worried, a strange man named Red (j.t. Walsh, j.t. Walsh) appeared in front of them. Rhett kindly tells Jeff and Amy that a trailer can be called nearby. Jeff asks Amy to follow Rhett. Soon, Jeff pays the price for this wrong decision. While waiting for the trailer, Jeff repaired the car himself, so he decided to drive to the place Rhett said to look for Rhett and Amy. Unexpectedly, when Jeff arrived, no one in the local claimed to have seen Amy. Jeff found Rhett and questioned him. Rhett said he didn't know Jeff, let alone Amy. Sensitive Jeff noticed that there was fraud. He wanted to ask the police for help, but he didn't have any evidence. For a time, Jeff fell into despair.

Ivan is the fierce patriarch of a family of Croatian refugees in Auckland. Nina is his daughter, ready to live on her own, despite his angry objections. Eddie is the Maori she takes as her lover. Nina works at a restaurant where Eddi

His wife dies, his house destroyed, gets fired and his dog struck by lightning, when he shouts "Why?" at God. He decides to break all ten commandments. He moves in with his sister-in-law and cheating reporter husband.

When their abusive parents are killed in a car crash, twin sisters Rosie and Violet vow to run away to Kentucky in search of a better life. While on the road, the girls meet up with Pete, a drifter working as a grounds keeper on a de
A group of crooks, an ex con, his friend and a gun crazy gangster plan a drug heist, but not everything goes as planned.
A white supremacist returns to his hometown for the first time in years to try and save his parents' relationship.
A young boy is whisked away to the mythical land of Tao where he becomes the center of a conflict between an evil lord and a group of animal warriors.
A woman cons two old boyfriends into searching for her runaway son by convincing both that they are the boy's father.
In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

Harold Guppy (Rupert Graves) moves into the Beasley household as a lodger. Before long Mrs. Marjorie Beasley (Dame Julie Walters) falls for him and eventually ends up in his bed. Her thirteen-year old daughter Joyce (Laura Sadler) is
Follows a day in the lives of a group of Los Angeles high school students and the strange lives they lead.

Chase Phillips (Dame Helen Mirren), a lifetime resident of Martha's Vineyard, married Richard (Beau Bridges), and like the area, grew into the upper middle class. Her distaste for artificiality leads her to a wild breakdown, and Rich

Two pairs of best friends - Montel & Clyde and Brandy & Adina meet at the party, where Clyde makes Adina think he is very rich and gets her into bed the same evening. When Adina finds out that she's been fooled, she becomes Clyde's w

In the world where Igor grew up at the age of 15, there was no serious harm to evil and underground trading was normal order. One day, an illegal West African worker employed by his father fell down and was in danger; In order to get rid of the official, his father had to let him bleed to death and tried to hide the truth. Before the hired worker died, Igor promised to take care of his orphans and widows. Since then, his carefree world collapsed, his pure loyalty to his father was no longer, his sense of guilt and justice were sunny and cloudy. The dadenne brothers take the current disadvantages in Europe as the plot framework: Immigration tide, multi-ethnic mixed living, illegal labor, etc. A simple moral awakening, through strong texture, details and smooth hand photography, leads the audience into the marginal world on the Belgian border and radiates the glory of realism again.
François, a young carpenter, lives a happy, uncomplicated life with his wife Thérèse and their two small children. One day he meets Emilie, a clerk in the local post office.

Gregory invites seven friends to spend the summer at his large, secluded 19th-century home in upstate New York. The seven are: Bobby, Gregory's "significant other," who is blind but who loves to explore the home's garden using his se
A successful but unhappy Japanese accountant finds the missing passion in his life when he begins to secretly take ballroom dance lessons.

The story of Mowgli, a young boy abandoned in the wilds of India. Raised by a panther, an elephant and a bear, Mowgli must learn civilization's ways when his long-lost uncle and a circus scout from Barnum and Bailey come looking for
Julian and Jeremy, two brothers prefer to spend their time on drugs and joyriding. When their father, Fatty Lewis, they show up demanding compensation.
Maggie's and Sam's former partners are in love; she wants revenge and he wants his lost love back, so they work together to break up the happy couple.
The coal mine in a northern English village may be closing, which would also mean the end of the miners' brass band.

Jack and Judy are husband and wife, and Howard is Judys father. They live in some fictional undemocratic and repressive country, and tell us a story about their lives, mostly from Jack's point of view.
A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there, while an InGen team approaches with another agenda.
A four-year-old girl tries to come to terms with the sudden death of her mother.
Fletcher Munson, the lethargic employee of a pseudo-religious self help company, and his doppelganger, the friendly but dull dentist Dr. Jeffrey Korchek.

The protagonist of the story is a lovely hound, but the gentle dog can't hunt, so he was abused by his owner. Finally, the unbearable dog decided to run away from home. Fortunately, he met a boy named Marty (Blake Heron). Marty likes the smart and lovely dog very much and named it Charlotte. Marty found Charlotte's old owner and hoped to adopt the dog. However, the greedy and cruel man fired a little boy for tens of dollars. Helpless Marty had to leave Charlotte in place and leave himself. However, Marty didn't give up the idea of adopting Charlotte. In order for Charlotte to get out of trouble as soon as possible, he worked hard every day to make money, and he was willing to do all the work that could bring money.
Haunted by his experiences in the Vietnam War, a young man returns home and has trouble adjusting back to civilian life, his family and his stern father.

Set in the 1950s, Rough Magic tells the story of what happens when a pretty apprentice magician goes to Mexico to escape her fiancé, a wealthy politician, and to find a Mayan shaman who will teach her ancient principles of magic. She
An actor poses as a lawyer to help his sick friend, and problems develop.
A depiction of the true life story of Gertrude Lintz, an eccentric 1920's socialite who tries to raise a gorilla, like many chimps before him, as part of her family.
Newly paroled ex-con and former U.S. Ranger Cameron Poe finds himself trapped in a prisoner transport plane when the passengers seize control.
High School basketball coach, Dinah Groshardt, falls for the school secretary, Carly Lumpkin, and upsets the entire school in the process.
A woman with a body writing fetish seeks to find a combined lover and calligrapher.

Bao Jia plays a yacht owner who specializes in receiving tourists for sea fishing. Originally, his life was superior. Later, when I went to the hotel to collect money, I met Bacall, a mysterious and sexy female pickpocket, who was suddenly distracted. After a series of events, Bogart decided to risk transporting Bacall and French underground elements to the United States
A computer hacker breaks into the computer system of the Seabourn Legend cruise liner and sets it speeding on a collision course into a gigantic oil tanker.

Benny, a lonely drifter, is thrown off a train after cheating at cards, and into the life of Tanya, a lovely bartender. Tanya has been supporting her husband, a former ballplayer, since his accident, waiting for an insurance settleme
Donna witnesses identical murders on the same street on different days. Is this a supernatural conspiracy or is she merely cracking up?
Charlene Prickett does a step workout video for an hour.A backstage Broadway Dance film.

Three women are apartment mates: one is about to be married, another discovers she is pregnant by her longtime boyfriend, and the third has an endless queue of men in and out of her bedroom. Sudden jiltings lead them to Vegas.
Batman and Robin try to keep their relationship together even as they must stop Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy from freezing Gotham City.
Terry is a suicidal voyeur who treats a dying addict to a final binge, but Terry will only do this if he promises to kill him.

Roseanna is dying of a heart condition, and all she wants is to be buried next to her daughter, in a cemetery that is getting full fast. The cemetery can't expand because Capestro, the man who owns the land next to the cemetery, won'
A prominent judge, his wife, her ex-lover, and their neighbor encounter a dead body that complicates their lives.
The son of Zeus and Hera is stripped of his immortality as an infant and must become a true hero in order to reclaim it.

In 1946 Denver, an aspiring writer who enjoys irresponsible adventures with his friend, writes a letter about his life before and after the suicide attempt by his sad girlfriend who wants a commitment.

Mildred and Doris are two middle-aged white women, from very different backgrounds, who become lovers and set up house together. Film explores the pleasures and uncertainties of later-life emotional attachment and lesbian identity in
When a woman's long-time friend reveals he's engaged, she realizes she loves him herself and sets out to get him, with only days before the wedding.

When metal-worshipping fanatics abduct his son, a father unleashes his dormant destructive power, as his naked rage transforms the once-feeble flesh into a grisly symbiosis of metal and tissue. Who dares to defy the ultimate body-ham

Chloe, a young woman, is going on holidays. She entrusts her beloved cat to Madame Renée's care. But one day Madame Renée (an old lady of the neighborhood) can not find the cat. Chloe starts searching the neighborhood... This is the
Screenwriter Paul Javal's marriage to his wife Camille disintegrates during movie production as she spends time with the producer. Layered conflicts between art and business ensue.

To foil a terrorist plot, an FBI agent undergoes facial transplant surgery to assume the identity of the criminal mastermind who murdered his only son, but the criminal wakes up prematurely and seeks revenge.
Cab driver Michael and supermodel Sarah fall in love while her gorgeous husband Phillippe is in Madrid for two months.
When an old couple washes their gabbeh - a type of Persian rug - a young woman magically appears and tells them her life story.

A fable unfolds. One summer day, a boy of about ten appears on the streets of Nice - no family, no possessions, no schooling, but with a brilliant smile. Mondo's most at home in gardens, fields, and at the seashore. The bustle of the city can seem to overwhelm him. He has good survival instincts, running from police and from threatening adults, and he is looking for a family. Over time, people come to know him - he helps out a street magician, befriends an old man who keeps doves in his suitcase, and finds a mother, herself an outsider. That smile is always at hand. Yet, no vagabond child sits well with the authorities. Can Nice keep this treasure of the spirit?

The young, bright, and decent London tramp Alan Terry (Rupert Graves) accidentally witnesses a mob execution. He gets away, but leaves enough evidence for them to come looking for him amongst the homeless, and most violently: his old

Jean-Luc Godard's densely packed rumination on the need to create order and beauty in a world ruled by chaos is divided into four distinct but tangentially related stories, including the attempts by a young group of idealists to stag
A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.
A failed gambler, intent on meeting a rich widow, tricks his widowed brother-in-law into boarding a cruise ship as dance hosts.
Three brothers who are obsessed with animals are given permission from their parents to travel around America with a camera documenting wildlife.
A bumbling fairy godfather tries to grant a girl's wish that her cabby father lands a Broadway role.
Dr. Ellie Arroway, after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of extraterrestrial intelligence, sending plans for a mysterious machine.

In Sunray, a backwater town on Australia's Murray River, there's little to do but fish or listen to the local radio station. D.J. Ken Sherry arrives from the hustle of Brisbane to run the station; he's mid-40s, detached, thrice divor
A female Senator succeeds in enrolling a woman into Combined Reconnaissance Team training where everyone expects her to fail.

A young boy, Conan, becomes a slave after his parents are killed and tribe destroyed by a savage warlord and sorcerer, Thulsa Doom. When he grows up he becomes a fearless, invincible fighter. Set free, he plots revenge against Thulsa
A man raised in the jungle by apes falls in love with a wealthy American heiress.
The Sheriff of a suburban New Jersey community, populated by New York City police officers, slowly discovers the town is a front for mob connections and corruption.
A rescue crew investigates a spaceship that disappeared into a black hole and has now returned...with someone or something new on-board.
An elite mercenary is killed, but comes back from Hell as a reluctant soldier of the Devil.
An unexpected player joins the school basketball team - a circus dog who escaped from a cruel master.
A young advertising executive's life becomes increasingly complicated when, in order to impress her boss, she pretends to be engaged to a man she has just met.

Two business executives--one an avowed misogynist, the other recently emotionally wounded by his love interest--set out to exact revenge on the female gender by seeking out the most innocent, uncorrupted girl they can find and ruinin
16-year-old Jesse and old friend Randolph try to foil an illegal whaler threatening Willy and his pregnant mate.
2 young women reunite and rekindle their friendship after having said goodbye at their college graduation, six years earlier.
A taxi driver with a penchant for conspiracy theories becomes a target after one of these theories turns out to be true. Unfortunately, to save himself, he has to figure out which theory it is.
Frank Conner is an honest police officer who desperately needs to save his son's life. However, after losing all hope, he finds out that a criminal Peter McCabe in jail is his only savior.
A scientist for the military turns himself into a cartoon-like superhero when a version of one of his own weapons is being used against enemies.
After being released from a psychiatric institution, a man tries to redeem himself in the eyes of his now-ex wife from the events that led up to his incarceration.
Black gangsters in 1930 Harlem fights Dutch Schultz who is trying to horn in on their numbers racket.
The several misadventures and life-lessons learned by 8-year-old Theodore "Beaver" Cleaver in an entertaining and hilarious tale of a small-town Ohio family and the daily trials and tribunes of life.
Three years ago, entomologist Dr. Susan Tyler genetically created an insect to kill cockroaches carrying a virulent disease. Now, the insects are out to destroy their only predator, mankind.
Sought by police and criminals, a small-time huckster makes a deal with a TV newsman for protection.
A bratty teenager fakes her own kidnapping, but gets mistakenly kidnapped for real instead.
A barbarian warrior becomes a king when he defeats a king in armed combat and the king's heir conspire to overthrow him and reclaim the throne by resurrecting an evil sorceress.

Communist Radicals hijack Air Force One with The U.S. President and his family on board. The Vice President negotiates from Washington D.C., while the President, a Veteran, fights to rescue the hostages on board.
15 months after being stabbed 9 times by a student at work as a high school teacher in NYC, Mr. Garfield is working in LA as a substitute teacher come full-time. He refuses to be a victim anymore.

In November 1984, the Soviet Union's best submarine captain, in a new undetectable sub, violates orders and heads for the U.S. The American CIA and military must quickly determine: Is he trying to defect, or to start a war?
Two best friends living on the streets of Portland as hustlers embark on a journey of self discovery and find their relationship stumbling along the way.

Warren has an extra room in his apartment (and is five months behind on the rent) after his lover moves out, so a friend places an ad on his behalf for a GWM roommate. Frankie, a pizza baker (and aspiring actor), decides to move out

Only in America. Only in Hollywood. Only in Beverly Hills could a young man with a dream make his way to the stars. Carlos is a precocious 18 year-old who returns to America from Mexico with dreams of becoming a movie star.

Howard (Kevin Klein, Kevin Kline) is a teacher who teaches in high school. He has been diligent in teaching and educating people all his life and won the respect of friends and students. Howard's long-distance love run with his girlfriend Emily (Joan Cusack) is finally going to blossom and bear fruit. In a short time, they will enter the palace of marriage hand in hand and make a promise to keep each other for life. One day, Howard was at Emily's house, watching the Academy Awards ceremony with his fiancee. He felt incredible that the honor of the film emperor was awarded to his former students. While deeply proud, the award-winning speech of the new film emperor knocked Howard to the bottom. Howard was "out" in front of thousands of audiences. Sure enough, Emily was so angry that Howard couldn't clear his grievances by jumping into the Yellow River.
An intellectual billionaire and two other men struggle to band together and survive after getting stranded in the Alaskan wilderness with a blood-thirsty Kodiak Bear hunting them down.
A US Army colonel and a civilian woman supervising him must track down stolen Russian nuclear weapons before they're used by terrorists.
As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.
True story of Heinrich Harrer, an Austrian mountain climber who became friends with the Dalai Lama at the time of China's takeover of Tibet.
Police hunting for a serial kidnapper are helped when a victim manages to escape for the first time.
One person can keep a family together and, when that one person is gone, a family can be torn apart.
Redmond is on a spiritual quest in NYC. Uncle Sam gives him a bag to deliver. That and his friend Stretch bring him in the middle of shoot-outs - not good for his angst. He meets a cute stewardess.
A demonic djinn attempts to grant its owner three wishes, which will allow him to summon his brethren to Earth.
A family is torn apart after a father gives his valuable farm land to his daughters.

After a wealthy San Francisco banker is given an opportunity to participate in a mysterious game, his life is turned upside down as he begins to question if it might really be a concealed conspiracy to destroy him.
A federal agent uncovers lucrative toxic waste dumps in Appalachia and must deal with the locals who want to keep their 'gold mine' secret.
A man heading to Vegas to pay off his gambling debt before the Russian mafia kills him is forced to stop in an Arizona town where everything that can go wrong does go wrong.

A drifter enters a small town looking for employment. While working at the local cattle ranch, he meets and falls in love with the beautiful Kitty and becomes involved in a deadly yet erotic love triangle.

Marcy is an assistant to Senator John McGlory, who is having problems with a re-election campaign. Desperate for Irish votes, McGlory's chief of staff Nick sends Marcy to Ireland to trace McGlory's relatives or ancestors. Marcy arriv

Harvey Dankworth is having an affair on the side, and the problems in his family life with wife Mary Jane arise. But she is also not interested in sex with him.. They start going to psychiatrists and Mary Jane starts to have wild sexual fantasies at these sessions that include her shrink Dr. Guttmacher.
An American naval officer is recruited for an operation to eliminate his lookalike, the infamous terrorist Carlos The Jackal.
Greg Kinnear plays a carriage-shy husband in a romantic comedy about a couple trying to conceive a child.
A reclusive beekeeper slowly pulls his dysfunctional family back together, but not without having to fight his son's previous dastardly cohorts.
In suburban New Canaan, Connecticut, 1973, middle-class families experimenting with casual sex and substance abuse find their lives beyond their control.

Victor Mallick returned to his home and found out that all of his friends have arranged a surprise bachelor/stag party for him. Two strippers were hired to cheer up the party. However, when some of the men accidentally killed one of

Holden and Banky are comic book artists. Everything's going good for them until they meet Alyssa, also a comic book artist. Holden falls for her, but his hopes are crushed when he finds out she's a lesbian.
A playboy gets the tables turned on him when a party is arranged with all of the women he has been two-timing are in attendance.
Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act. The women cheer them on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity.
Seven friends reunite for a week-long reunion at a summer camp in Ontario they used to attend as children which is now threatened with being closed down.
When Queen Victoria's husband Prince Albert dies, she finds solace in her trusted servant, Mr. John Brown, but their relationship also brings scandal and turmoil.
Four young friends bound by a tragic accident are reunited when they find themselves being stalked by a hook-wielding maniac in their small seaside town.
An exceptionally adept Florida lawyer is offered a job at a high-end New York City law firm with a high-end boss - the biggest opportunity of his career to date.
Fred Z. Randall is a geeky spacecraft designer who gets the chance to make his dream come true and travel to Mars.
A disgraced surgeon leaves his former life and reinvents himself as a gunshot doctor in the criminal underworld.
A mentally unbalanced young woman - who is convinced she is Jackie Kennedy - flies into a murderous rage when her brother returns home to reveal he is engaged.
An exploration of the careers of four unrelated professionals: a lion tamer, a robotics expert, a topiary gardener, and a naked mole rat specialist.
In this adaptation of the Henry James novel set in 19th-century New York City, a wealthy spinster with an overbearing father is pursued by a handsome fortune hunter who may be only after her money.
A loner befriends a local celebrity, Billy Magic, but he soon begins to tell lies in order to maintain the friendship and the newfound status.
This film documents Neil Young and Crazy Horse's 1996 concert tour. Jim Jarmusch interviews the band about their long history, and we see backstage footage from the 1970s and 1980s.
A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.
In 1917, two children take a photograph, which is soon believed by some to be the first scientific evidence of the existence of fairies.
In the peaceful town of Snowfield, Colorado something evil has wiped out the community. And now, its up to a group of people to stop it, or at least get out of Snowfield alive.

The story of Russian emigrant Yanko Goorall and servant Amy Foster in the end of nineteenth century. When Yanko enters a farm, sick and hungry after a shipwreck, everyone is afraid of him, except for Amy.

John O’Hagan's film 'Wonderland' provides a tender and brutal dissection of the suburban dream. Filmed in Levittown, New York, on its 50th anniversary, Hagan presents a motley crew of residents pursuing their own visions of happiness in the first mass-produced suburbia. The karaoke regular who strives to be a successful soul singer; the local girl that becomes a state beauty queen; the widower chasing the elusive 300 point ten-pin game; the couple who long to live in a 'real wood' world. Varied as they appear, the dreams of the Levittown residents rarely extend beyond the options immediately available. Hence the apparent popularity of wife swapping, a suburban alternative to the more urbane affair.
Upon being fired, a desperate guy kidnaps a daughter of his former boss. Two angels are sent to Earth to check if love is possible in this case.
A teenage petty criminal dreams of escaping his increasingly unlawful lifestyle when he meets a sweet girl who hopes to one day travel to Alaska.

What did little Eve see--and how will it haunt her? Husband, father and womanizer Louis Batiste is the head of an affluent family, but it's the women who rule this gothic world of secrets, lies and mystic forces.
An FBI agent tries to catch a serial killer who kidnapped his son.
After murdering an undercover DEA agent, two corrupt cops scramble to cover up what they've done.
Two friends who are dissatisfied with their jobs decide to join the army for a bit of fun.

For a long time, the relationship between Bonnie (Gregoire Colin) and his father has been very indifferent. After his mother died, Bonnie never saw his father again. He and his friends came to Marseille port, where he ate with his hands. The sexy and beautiful landlady of the bakery (Valeria bunoni tetechi, Valeria Bruni Tedeschi) is Bonnie's only emotional sustenance. One day, Bonnie's 15-year-old sister Nini (Alice houri) suddenly appeared in front of her brother. When she ran away from home, she wanted to stay here for a while. What Bonnie didn't expect was that although Nini was only 15 years old, she was pregnant with a child. What's more absurd, Nini didn't know and didn't want to know who the child's biological father was. Nini in distress aroused Bonnie's desire to protect. In order to protect his sister, he did not hesitate to make enemies with the whole world.
The bumbling Mr. Bean travels to America when he is given the responsibility of bringing a highly valuable painting to a Los Angeles museum.
Hugo Pool is a quirky tale of a Los Angeles pool cleaner who falls in love with a young man dying of Lou Gerhig's Disease.
A distraught man inadvertently takes a group of children hostage in a museum while a hungry, seasoned reporter tries to resurrect his career covering the story.

Max/W.Snipes has a one night stand with Karen/N.Kinski in NYC. He returns to his wife, 2 kids and career in LA but is affected. A year later, Max and Karen meet again by chance, but this time they're with their spouses.
A scriptwriter comes to Paris to work on her film. There she takes up tango lessons and forms a relationship with the dancer.

Journalist Flynn from the U.S., Michael Henderson from the U.K., and their teams meet at the beginning of the Bosnian war in Sarajevo. During their reports, they find an orphanage run by the devoted Mrs. Savic near the frontline. Hen
A hooker is found cut in two. Two cops give polygraph tests to the only suspect, James Wayland (Tim Roth), an unstable genius. After some time, the roles change.
An underdog lawyer takes on a fraudulent insurance company.
Back when sex was safe, pleasure was a business and business was booming, an idealistic porn producer aspires to elevate his craft to an art when he discovers a hot young talent.
When a young Amish boy is sole witness to a murder, policeman John Book goes into hiding in Amish country to protect him until the trial.

Harry Donovan is an art forger who paints a fake Rembrandt picture for five hundred thousand dollars. Marieke, the woman he meets in Paris and gets into bed with, turns out to be the art expert whom Harry's clients are using to check
Humans in a fascist, militaristic future wage war with giant alien bugs.

A hospital resident is put in the middle of a legal battle between two half-sisters on whether to pull their comatose dad's life support. But more seems to be at stake than dad's life - his inheritance.
The life histories of four East Asian women and their daughters reflect and guide each other.
A surfer becomes the head of a major company.
A London woman's love life and career both hinge, unknown to her, on whether or not she catches a train. We see it both ways, in parallel.
A group of martial arts warriors have only six days to save the Earth from an extra-dimensional invasion.
An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

An impoverished woman who has been forced to choose between a privileged life with her wealthy aunt and her journalist lover, befriends an American heiress. When she discovers the heiress is attracted to her own lover and is dying, s
In 1923 London, socialite Clarissa Dalloway's (Vanessa Redgrave's) well-planned party is overshadowed by the return of an old suitor she had known thirty-three years earlier.

Prep school student Daisy and her European-born grandmother Nana share the sad stories of their lives: Daisy tells Nana of her romance with young Ethan and problems in school because she's Jewish; and Nana tells of her young years un
An American attorney on business in China is wrongfully arrested and put on trial for murder, with a female defense lawyer from the country the only key to proving his innocence.
An imprisoned I.R.A. fighter is freed to help stop a brutal, seemingly "faceless" assassin from completing his next job.
The last surviving child of the Russian Royal Family joins two con men to reunite with her grandmother, the Dowager Empress, while the undead Rasputin seeks her death.
Wallace Ritchie is mistaken for a spy and must stop a plot to assassinate international leaders at a banquet.

200 years after her death, Ellen Ripley is revived as a powerful human/alien hybrid clone. Along with a crew of space pirates, she must again battle the deadly aliens and stop them from reaching Earth.

An alien vessel crashes on Earth and is discovered by Cindy, Shauna and Becky, three friends beginning what they think to be a casual vacation in the mountains. The alien creatures, escaping a death sentence on their own world, are motivated only by death, destruction and a taste for blood. Ultimately, nothing stands in the way of their gruesome carnage except Cindy, aided by Matt, another visitor from beyond the stars, sent to recover the ship and bring them to justice. Together, they set out to destroy the ship, though its destruction could strand Matt on Earth forever.

In 1839, the revolt of Mende captives aboard a Spanish owned ship causes a major controversy in the United States when the ship is captured off the coast of Long Island. The courts must decide whether the Mende are slaves or legally
After his happy life spins out of control, a preacher from Texas changes his name, goes to Louisiana and starts preaching on the radio.

Artemisia Gentileschi (1593-1653) was one of the first well-known female painters. The movie tells the story of her youth, when she was guided and protected by her father, the painter Orazio Gentileschi. Her professional curiosity ab
In 1930s Berlin, a gay Jew is sent to a concentration camp under the Nazi regime.
A woman who moves into an apartment across the hall from two brilliant but socially awkward physicists shows them how little they know about life outside of the laboratory.
Ever wanted to know what guys say when they get together? This light- hearted comedy explores the male world through an amateur hockey team. Every male stereotype is analyzed, comically of course.
The antisocial son of an alcoholic father and a bipolar mother grows up in 1960s Ireland.

Suffering from writer's block and eagerly awaiting his writing award, Harry Block remembers events from his past and scenes from his best-selling books as characters, real and fictional, come back to haunt him.
An absent-minded professor discovers "flubber," a rubber-like super-bouncy substance.
An unhappily married Manhattan socialite couple flee from the I.R.S. and end up in Amish country where they pretend to be visiting relatives.
Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.
A young woman with a camera follows a man around to make a documentary about him, something he is not very happy with.

First time on CD for this 1970 album by Eddie Palmieri's supergroup, the first to really merge black and Latin styles and musicians, resulting in a free-form brew of salsa, funk, soul, jazz, and fusion. The band also featured Charlie Palmieri, Victor Venegas, Andy Gonsalez, Bernard "Pretty" Purdie and Ronnie Cuber. Stateside.
Alex Pruitt, an 8-year-old boy living in Chicago, must fend off international spies who seek a top-secret computer chip in his toy car.
WEST AFRICA 1869 - Slave trade is illegal. There is a revolt on a slave ship - twenty four men fight for their lives. Out-gunned, the revolt fails but a second uprising is planned.

Sydney Banks learns the hard way that being driven and educated is not the path to success. With the help of Todd Hunter her career takes off. Sydney gets pulled into corporate blackmail and murder. With the help of boyfriend Derek,

After suspecting her husband is playing the field, a jittery woman finds a sympathetic ear in the form of a strange man. The drawback is that her sensitive new-found friend is an obsessive psychopath.
A visiting city reporter's assignment suddenly revolves around the murder trial of a local millionaire, whom he befriends.

When his father died, Ernie (Nathan Lane) and Lars (Lee Evans) inherited a wire factory and an old house. Lars was driven out of his house by his snobbish wife because he refused to sell the off-line factory, and Ernie's restaurant was suddenly hit by a catastrophe and forced to live on the streets. Nike's brothers had to move to the old house left by their father. By chance, the two brothers learned that the old house they lived in was the handed down work of an architect, very artistic and worth millions. The brothers decided to decorate the house and sell it, but they found a mouse living in the house all the year round. The smart mouse had feelings for the house and didn't want the brothers to sell it, so around the ancient house, a war between man and mouse was about to begin

A gay thirty year old lives at home and is in the midst of a serious creative funk. Rejected by numerous art schools and lacking romantic prospects, he looks to his charismatic Uncle Alfred for inspiration.
A mousy office worker accidentally kills one of her coworkers, then proceeds to bump off a few others.
Other Voices, Other Rooms
Two years after the first series of murders, as Sidney acclimates to college life, someone donning the Ghostface costume begins a new string of killings.
A botched diamond burglary and a dead publishing company executive set off a string of murders and betrayal in this suspensful, nonstop thriller!
A bus crash in a small town brings a lawyer to the town to defend the families, but he discovers that everything is not what it seems.

When the discovery of a five-thousand year old artifact of a humanoid reptile leads an investigative reporter to the Kronos Project, he uncovers an experimental device created to send humans through time, controlled by a ruthless mul
A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
James Bond sets out to stop a media mogul's plan to induce war between China and the UK in order to obtain exclusive global media coverage.
A retelling of Charles Dickens' classic novel Oliver Twist set in a New York City contemporary underground populated by drag queens, drug abuse and prostitution.

A brief extract of four kids' lives somewhere in France. Quentin, who won a writers contest and now pays more attention to his career as an author than to his friends, beautiful Julie, his girl-friend, much more mature than she looks
Little Tree is an 8-year-old Cherokee boy who loses his parents during The Great Depression and begins living with his Indian grandparents and learning the Cherokee way of life.
A nameless drifter dons a postman's uniform and bag of mail as he begins a quest to inspire hope to the survivors living in post-apocalyptic America.
The mother of a severely traumatized daughter enlists the aid of a unique horse trainer to help the girl's equally injured horse.
A recent widow, who is determined to leave Scotland for Australia with her son, gets an unexpected visit from her aging mother.

A flight attendant with a criminal past gets nabbed by the FBI for smuggling. Under pressure to become an informant against the drug dealer she works for, she must find a way to secure her future without getting killed.
From childhood to adulthood, Tibet's fourteenth Dalai Lama deals with Chinese oppression and other problems.
The myopic millionaire defeats jewel smugglers in his usual bumbling manner.
Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.
A handyman with marital problems meets a housewife with the same.
Ludovic is an innocent seven-year-old child who provokes horror in his community when he dresses in girls clothes and insists he's a girl.
Modernization of Charles Dickens' classic story finds the hapless Finn as a painter in New York City pursuing his unrequited and haughty childhood love.
A woman gets a flat tire in the desert and is abducted by a trio of desert-rat losers.
The three unstoppable Ninja brothers fight to save their hero (Hulk Hogan) and Mega Mountain Amusement Park from the vicious kid-hating Medusa (Loni Anderson).

In a world where two men in close proximity will eventually draw guns, Rico "BULLET" Burke finds himself at a crossroads. Having long ago ruined his brilliant collegiate football career through his own folly, Rico must now decide whe

A middle-aged bar owner named lutio caused a family storm because of his homosexual tendency. His son Chava was bent on going to the United States to search for gold and invest in the land, and tried to encourage his good friend Abbe to go to the United States to search for gold with him, but Abbe had fallen in love with his neighbor daughter aimita and had no intention to go to the United States with him. One day, Chava couldn't bear it and hurt a little white face put together by his father. He fled in panic and begged his good friend Abbe to sneak into the United States to search for gold with him. Abbe also sneaked into the United States with Chava in order to get some money to marry his lover. Under the coercion of her mother, who was greedy for money, After Abe went to the United States to search for gold, he was forced to promise to marry a rich old man, but unexpectedly, the old man suddenly died on the eve of his marriage
Daryl wants to go straight after years in prison. He meets a cute girl who helps him find an honest job driving. He wants to save up and open a nightclub. But then gems and mayhem pop up.
A true story of four Jewish intellectuals born in New York and educated at City College during the 1930s, and their divergent paths over the next six decades.

Firefighter Jesse Graves has to save ornithologist Jennifer and other people caught in a forest fire, which was set up by the lawyer of convicted killer Earl Shaye, who escaped from the prison with several of his inmates posing as fi
A student gets his senses enhanced by an experimental drug. But abuse is not an option.
Shortly before an election, a spin-doctor and a Hollywood producer join efforts to fabricate a war in order to cover up a Presidential sex scandal.
A man struggles with memories of his past, which include a wife he cannot remember and a nightmarish world no one else ever seems to wake up from.

A successful playwright falls in love with his new actress Hilary (Thandie Newton) and, in an attempt to leave his wife Elena (Anna Galiena) without incident, recruits a handsome Hollywood actor (Jon Bon Jovi) to seduce her.

Spencer Griffith's life changes when a meteor falls into a local junkyard, and he finds a Cybersuit, an exoskeleton with AI from another galaxy. When Spencer puts on the Cybersuit he becomes a different kind of person.
The partner and nephew of an armored-truck driver tries to prevent three million dollars from being taken by a gang during a catastrophic flooding caused by a severe storm.
The story of three not so bright men who come up with a series of crazy schemes to get a friend out of jail.
Homicide detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of serial killer Edgar Reese. Soon after the execution, the killings start again, and they are very similar to Reese's style.
Two con artists' plan to steal enough for a house are twisted when a pretty girl enters the picture.
