The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.
A compassionate young man, raised in an orphanage and trained to be a doctor there, decides to leave to see the world.
Mystery about an ex-prizefighter who embarks on a journey to find 13 missing diamonds.
An alienated teenager, saddened that he has moved away from London, must find a way to deal with a dark family secret.
A master criminal terrorizes the occupants of an isolated country mansion.
In 1951, a group of high schoolers come of age in a bleak, isolated, atrophied North Texas town that is slowly dying, both culturally and economically.
When a princess is shrunken by an evil wizard, Sinbad must undertake a quest to an island of monsters to cure her and prevent a war.
A dedicated American reporter in 1930s Japan is determined to expose that government's plan for world domination.
The story of the romance between the King of Siam and widowed British schoolteacher, Anna Leonowens, during the 1860s.
An android endeavors to become human as he gradually acquires emotions.
The Little family adopt a charming young mouse named Stuart, but the family cat wants rid of him.
In pre-unified China, the King of Qin sends his concubine to a rival kingdom to produce an assassin for a political plot, but as the king's cruelty mounts she finds her loyalty faltering.
An update of the original film with new interpretations of great works of classical music.
An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

Russia, 1820s: Onegin inherits his uncle's country estate and moves there from St. Petersburg. He befriends his neighbor, Lensky, and meets Tatyana through him. She falls in love with Onegin but he just wants friendship.
After scams at horse races and making lots of money, 3 young people split. 20 years later, one of them, a drunk, creates chaos with photos from back then.

Set in the 1880s, the story of how, during a creative dry spell, the partnership of the legendary musical/theatrical writers Gilbert and Sullivan almost dissolves, before they turn it all around and write the Mikado.
A couple about to be married are both having affairs, with women. This campy sex-romp takes place in some European city where everyone appears to be sex crazed and speaks with a different accent.
A pair of sociopath killers take on the police and the mob in order to make one last big score.
A comic book artist struggling with his "Brenda Starr" strip decides to draw himself into it when his comic book character is disappointed and leaves the strip.
Chronicling the lifelong sexual development of two men who meet and become friends in college.
Two bikers head from L.A. to New Orleans through the open country and desert lands, and along the way they meet a man who bridges a counter-culture gap of which they had been unaware.
The true story of a disillusioned military contractor employee and his drug pusher childhood friend who became walk-in spies for the Soviet Union.
Edited version of the 1938 Republic serial "The Lone Ranger."
An ambitious young accountant plots to wed a wealthy factory owner's daughter despite falling in love with a married older woman.
A movie adaptation of Homer's second epic, that depicts Ulysses' efforts to return to his home after the end of ten years of war.
A behind-the-scenes look at the life-and-death struggles of modern-day gladiators and those who lead them.
The life and career of legendary comedian Andy Kaufman.

The alumni cast of a space opera television series have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help. However, they also have to defend both Earth and the alien race from a reptilian warlord.

In late 1950s New York, Tom Ripley, a young underachiever, is sent to Italy to retrieve Dickie Greenleaf, a rich and spoiled millionaire playboy. But when the errand fails, Ripley takes extreme measures.

Gregor still lives in Los Angeles with his friends. Now, he is looking for a new job. Dipo, who had a grudge against Gregor four years ago, is looking for him and taking revenge. For his son's safety, Gregor's father sent him to his uncle's house. Gregor is under the same roof as his eccentric uncle Eloy and cousin ray. However, Gregor soon found that trouble always comes to your door, no matter where you live
The story of Rubin 'Hurricane' Carter, a boxer wrongly imprisoned for murder, and the people who aided in his fight to prove his innocence.

Based on the best-selling autobiography by Irish expatriate Frank McCourt, Angela's Ashes follows the experiences of young Frankie and his family as they try against all odds to escape the poverty endemic in the slums of pre-war Lime
Two best friends and former middleweight contenders travel to Las Vegas to fight each other for the first time.
Titus returns victorious from war, only to plant the seeds of future turmoil for himself and his family.
A cinematic portrait of the life and career of the infamous American execution device designer and holocaust denier.

The Vatican sends a priest to verify some miracles, performed by a woman who has been nominated for sainthood. During his investigation, the priest, who is experiencing a crisis of faith, re-discovers his own purpose in life.
A mob boss has the tough Claire and Nick pick up the guy, who lost money on his watch. Later, boss' Kitty runs away and Claire has to find her. Anyone not scheming? Who's shot next?
A Japanese-American fisherman is accused of killing his neighbor at sea. In the 1950s, race figures into the trial. So does reporter Ishmael.
Based on writer Susanna Kaysen's account of her 18-month stay at a mental hospital in the late 1960s.

Ryan Kazinski, 16, is in juvenile detention in Fort Myers, Florida. He gets away one day, and the world is all before him: where should he go, what should he do? Should he try to find his mom? Should he head for Colorado, where he's
The life and career of Hank Greenberg, the first major Jewish baseball star in the Major Leagues.

Willie (Frankie Muniz) is the only child in the family. At that time, the only child was very rare. Therefore, Willie was bullied and excluded by his peers, and his character became more and more withdrawn. Only DINK (Luke Wilson) who lives next door can make Willie feel happy and safe. He even asked DINK for advice on how to become a baseball pitcher. But before long, the trusted friend left Willie and went to the battlefield. In order to comfort the sad Willie, his mother gave him a puppy named skip. Skip was smart and obedient. With his help, Willie gradually opened his heart and had a group of friends. DINK came back, but he was charged with deserting. Willie invited DINK to his football game. The latter broke his appointment. Angry Willy vented his anger on skip, which directly led to skip's running away from home. At this time, Willy found that skip was so important to him. He was determined to find it and apologize to it.

At the beginning of the 22nd century, a medical lifeboat "Nightingale 229" was conducting a routine inspection of deep space. Working in this silent and lonely spaceship are six members, including captain A.J. Marley, deputy Nick Van Sant, chief physician Chira Evans, computer engineer Ben sotmojie, medical scientist yelch panarosa, and danik rod. During the inspection, they found that a strange alien substance was exploding from a star millions of light-years away. Several people didn't know how to deal with it. At this time, they received an emergency signal for help. Although it was very dangerous, the members of the rescue team had no choice but to go to the rescue. The stumbling spacecraft finally approached the center of the explosion, and immediately they were restrained by the gravity of a huge blue star. Here, they rescued Carl Larsen, a mysterious and unpredictable young man. What made everyone uneasy was that they felt that this man might cause danger to the members of the spacecraft at any time. In addition, the members of the Nightingale have to fight against the huge cosmic gravity. The people on the spacecraft are facing death. The survivors must get rid of the gravity of the star and return to the Milky Way galaxy, because the explosion of this huge supernova may happen at any time

This thriller investigates the mysterious assassination of a gay pastor in rural South Africa. Without witnesses or explanations, the crime appears to the police and others as a jigsaw puzzle without enough pieces. The police then su
A young female terrorist was sent to complete the assassination mission. The leader of the organization ordered her to commit suicide after completing the mission, but she did not yield to fate

Kyle Dean was a misfit in her North Carolina school. She was called "Creature" because she was a boy who knew she was a girl in part of the country where such things were not understood or tolerated. As soon as she could she left Nor
In pre-WWII, McCarthyism, a diametrically opposed couple come together only to find out that geniune friendship and physical attraction is not enough to overcome fundamental societal beliefs.

Wealthy Elias Graves builds his home on the top of a hill, where a group of squatters have taken up residence at the bottom. Many of the men in the squatters' village have their eyes on young Tess, and one of them, Ben Letts, frames
When two escaping American World War II prisoners are killed, the German P.O.W. camp barracks black marketeer, J.J. Sefton, is suspected of being an informer.
A San Francisco civilian police detective is forced to work on a series of murders with his former enemy commanding officer while dating his daughter.

A French convict in the 1930s befriends a fellow criminal as the two of them begin serving their sentence in the South American penal colony on Devil's Island, which inspires the man to plot his escape.

Joey Evans' a charming, handsome, funny, talented a-1st class, A-N°.1 - heel. When Joey meets the former chorus girl and now is the rich widow, Vera Simpson, the pair of lecherous souls seem made for each other.
Two Navy men are ordered to bring a young offender to prison, but decide to show him one last good time along the way.
A dropout from upper-class America picks up work along the way on oil rigs when his life isn't spent in a squalid succession of bars, motels, and other points of interest.
A group of dwarfs at a correctional facility erupt in anarchy.
After a tragedy, John Ingram and his wife Rae are spending some time isolated at sea, when they come across a stranger who has abandoned a sinking ship.
A Nazi hunter in Paraguay discovers a sinister and bizarre plot to rekindle the Third Reich.

A vengeful witch and her fiendish servant return from the grave and begin a bloody campaign to possess the body of the witch's beautiful look-alike descendant, with only the girl's brother and a handsome doctor standing in her way.
A gangster hires an ex-football player to find his girlfriend. When he finds her, they fall in love, and the twists start to appear.
Writer Harry Street reflects on his life as he lies dying from an infection while on safari in the shadow of Mount Kilamanjaro.
A spoof on Lethal Weapon (1987), other movies, TV commercials etc. 2 unlike LA cops investigate a cocaine in girl scout cookies case.
A beautiful but amoral gypsy girl entices a young dragoon to betray his honor and get cashiered from the service, and for her sake he soon turns to a life of crime.
A group of Southern California high school students are enjoying their most important subjects: sex, drugs, and rock n' roll.
A mother whose child was killed in a dingo attack in the Australian Outback fights to prove her innocence when she is accused of murder.
A smart-mouthed junkie and loser known as J.J. (George Segal) spends his days looking for just "one more fix".
Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.

Marcus takes his kid brother, David, with him for a physical test and a brain scan, suspecting cerebral aneurysm like their dad died of. They head off on bikes for the big Rockies bike race with Marcus' Sarah driving the van.
The tragic 1939 voyage of SS St. Louis carrying hundreds of German Jewish refugees from Nazi Germany that seemingly no nation is willing to save from certain doom.
An erotic horror tale about a vixen vampiress seducing and killing women to appease her insatiable thirst for female blood.
A young woman comes to Hollywood with dreams of stardom, and achieves them only with the help of an alcoholic leading man whose best days are behind him.
A boy shoots his father and flies out the window. A man falls in love with a fellow inmate in prison. A doctor accidentally ingests his experimental sex serum, wreaking havoc on the community.
A couple work hard to renovate their dream house and become landlords to pay for it. Unfortunately, one of their tenants has plans of his own.

A young sailor falls in love with a mysterious woman, performing as a mermaid at the local carnival. He soon comes to suspect the girl might be a real mermaid, who draws men to a watery death during the full moon.
A young artist is commissioned by the wife of a wealthy landowner to make a series of drawings of the estate while her husband is away.

In 1820s Spain the soldier Don José falls in love with the fiery and charismatic factory worker Carmen. Conflicts and grievances multiply, however, as it becomes apparent their views on love and commitment are fundamentally incompati
Twin zoologists lose their wives in a car accident and become obsessed with decomposing animals.
An entomologist on vacation is trapped by local villagers into living with a woman whose life task is shoveling sand for them.

A young man wins and loses the first serious love of his life. Al Connelly falls in love with the girl of his dreams. After the summer she breaks up with him. As he tries to recover Al goes to desperate measures.
This music documentary looks at the life and legend of singer and guitarist Robert Johnson, arguably the most important figure in the history of the blues.

A whimsical look back at the life of a man who is nervous about his upcoming wedding.
A mystery writer becomes involved in a tangled web of murderous deception not unlike the plots of her novels.

Following the suicide of an elderly Jewish man, a journalist in possession of the man's diary investigates the alleged sighting of a former S.S. Captain, who commanded a concentration camp during World War II.
The simple-minded son of a rich financier must find his own way in the world.
A man learns he will inherit a fortune if he marries by 7 p.m. that same day.
Two young women arrive in London to make it big in show business, and become corrupted by money and fame in the process.

Harry Williams, of the r&b band, Bloodstone, is about to go onstage, when he's hit on the head. We follow his dream, as the other band members become conductors aboard a train filled with characters - from the 1930s, including W.C. F
Semi-biographical film based on the experiences of gonzo journalist Hunter S. Thompson.
Two gunfighters separate and experience surreal visions on their journey through the west.

Filmed over several years, it is a wonder-filled portrait of a family of kestrels (European falcons) who live in a church tower above a small Swedish town. The amazing cinematography, nominated for a Swedish Oscar.
A private eye shadows a female serial killer of men all over the U.S. without her knowing as he, strangely enough, occasionally acts as her guardian angel.
Bette Midler and Nathan Lane star in this comedy about Jacqueline Susann, the ambitious woman of dubious talent who wrote Valley of the Dolls, a best-selling novel that became a sensation.
The Big Tease is big fun, a fish-out-of-water tale teeming with charm and a hilariously satiric view of life in L. A.

While the soccer World Cup is being played in France, two young Tibetan refugees arrive at a monastery/boarding school in exile in India. Its atmosphere of serene contemplation is somewhat disrupted by soccer fever, the chief instiga
A beautiful widow believed that her dead daughter was still alive. In the process of looking around, she found her love
When they find a frozen caveman in their back yard, two high school outcasts thaw him and introduce him to modern life while he in turn gets them to actually enjoy life.
After being dumped by her live-in boyfriend, an unemployed dancer and her 10-year-old daughter are reluctantly forced to live with a struggling off-Broadway actor.
Four vignettes about the lives of the Cuban people set during the pre-revolutionary era.
Biographical epic of the controversial and influential Black Nationalist leader, from his early life and career as a small-time gangster, to his ministry as a member of the Nation of Islam.

When a nightclub singer is forced to take refuge from the mob in a convent, she ends up turning the convent choir into a soulful chorus complete with a Motown repertoire, until the sudden celebrity of the choir jeopardizes her identi
Showgirl Deloris Van Cartier returns as Sister Mary Clarence to teach music to a group of Catholic students whose run-down school is slated for closure.
After her humiliated husband kills himself, an embittered pregnant widow loses her child, and embarks on a mission of vengeance against a woman and her family.
A Uruguayan rugby team stranded in the snow swept Andes are forced to use desperate measures to survive after a plane crash.
When a naive novice nun is discovered with a dead newborn in her convent quarters, a court-appointed psychiatrist investigates her case.
A prep school student needing money agrees to "babysit" a blind man, but the job is not at all what he anticipated.
Two slacker friends try to promote their public-access cable show.
The inseparable duo try to organize a rock concert while Wayne must fend off a record producer who has an eye for his girlfriend.
Two sisters join the first female professional baseball league and struggle to help it succeed amidst their own growing rivalry.
When CIA analyst Jack Ryan interferes with an IRA assassination, a renegade faction targets him and his family for revenge.
A former Secret Service agent takes on the job of bodyguard to an R&B singer, whose lifestyle is most unlike a President's.
When a woman learns of an immortality treatment, she sees it as a way to outdo her long-time rival.
A young Irish couple flee to the States, but subsequently struggle to obtain land and prosper freely.
A businessman thwarts his wife's bequest of an estate to another woman.
A group of twenty-something friends search for love and success in grunge-era Seattle.
Laura Palmer's harrowing final days are chronicled one year after the murder of Teresa Banks, a resident of Twin Peaks' neighboring town.
Black and white basketball hustlers join forces to double their chances of winning money on the street courts and in a basketball tournament.
Flighty teenage girl Buffy Summers learns that she is her generation's destined battler of vampires.

Yuan Haoyun is an anti-traditional detective. He always hates evil like hatred and is very loyal to his friends. Undercover detective Jiang Lang is mixed in the illegal arms smuggling group. He is the right hand of Uncle Hai, the leader of the underworld. He is highly valued by Uncle Hai and intends to cultivate him as his successor. Because Uncle Hai is old, his position in the Jianghu has been replaced by the newly rising Wang. Wang also appreciates lang. in order to further master the correct information of the arms group, Lang laid his heart on him and killed Uncle Hai in order to prove his heart for Wang Buer. Wang Daxi, absorbing waves as his number one horse. Yuan didn't know Lang's real identity and chased lang. they fought to death. Yuan felt that this person's identity was very suspicious. Later, he learned that Lang was an undercover detective, so he tried to contact Lang and hoped to destroy Wang's crime together.
A film crew follows a ruthless thief and heartless killer as he goes about his daily routine. But complications set in when the film crew lose their objectivity and begin lending a hand.
A traveling mariachi is mistaken for a murderous criminal and must hide from a gang bent on killing him.
A tough police sergeant's overbearing mother comes to visit him and begins to meddle in his life and career.
During a cryogenics test, a pilot frozen in 1939 awakes in 1992 but time is running out, as his body starts to age rapidly.
A temperamental figure skater and a former hockey player try to win Olympic gold as a figure skating pairs team.
A nomadic farm worker looks after his dimwitted, gentle-giant friend during the Great Depression.
While investigating a young nun's rape, a corrupt New York City police detective, with a serious drug and gambling addiction, tries to change his ways and find forgiveness and redemption.
While Sidney and her friends visit the Hollywood set of Stab 3, the third film based on the Woodsboro murders, another Ghostface killer rises to terrorize them.
A woman advertising for a new roommate finds that something very strange is going on with the tenant who decides to move in.
Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.
An undercover DEA agent brings down the Mafia.
Jaume, a sick professor of literature, decides to leave his heritage "an essay on the book of Ramón Llull" to his best student David, a hustler.

In 2009, the streets of Mumbai, India. Bach, a successful, well-dressed man, conducted a secret transaction in a telephone booth. He is a small accomplished banker. From top to bottom, he is a famous brand, his wife is beautiful, and his daughter is well-behaved. Although he has an enviable family business, he is arrogant and unconcerned. He does not hesitate to dye his hands black for wealth and honor. . Just as he was about to leave the phone booth, an unfamiliar call came in. The other party knew of all his criminal activities and was hiding in a nearby building to monitor him, and he would be sniped if he acted rashly.Soon after, an addict died in front of the phone booth. The panic Bach began to attract the attention of passersby. The police, the media, politicians and even the people of the whole country focused on this little phone booth. Bach was forced to reveal his disguise to the people of the whole country and the unknown shocking behind the country’s political arena. scandal

A social worker, still reeling from the loss of her architect husband, investigates the eccentric, psychedelic Wadsworth Family, consisting of a mother, two daughters, and an adult son with the apparent mental capacity of an infant.
Documentary about a multiple murder in rural Nebraska in 1993.
Karl Foyle and Paul Prentice were best mates at school in the Seventies. But when they meet again in present-day London things are definitely not the same.
A museum curator falls in love with a crazy parking attendant.
In a Manhattan psychiatric hospital a man, convinced he is Sherlock Holmes, is treated by a female doctor who happens to be named Watson.

Richard (Leonardo DiCaprio) is an American young man who loves Internet surfing and adventure. One day, he came to Bangkok, Thailand to find the paradise on earth beach he learned on the Internet. In the cheap hotel where he stayed, he met the French girl franoise (Virginia ledoyen) and her boyfriend. They became friends. Soon Richard fell in love with franoise. Richard got some strange secrets from the strange bald man. Then the bald man left a mysterious map and died unexpectedly, which aroused Richard's curiosity. He followed the map. He was sure that the beach did exist and began to persuade franoise and his boyfriend to go to find the beach with him, and copied a map for other American friends to explore. After overcoming all kinds of difficulties, Richard three came to the suspected beach paradise, but only a large area of marijuana land and Thai Farmers with guns appeared in front of them. When they ran for their lives, they finally entered the dream paradise. The people there lived a worry free and simple life similar to the primitive society under the leadership of SAL (Tilda Swinton). Richard's arrival made Thai Farmers warn Sal: no more people are allowed on the beach. This sentence then became a prophecy
When a school in upstate New York is snowed in, a group of students hi-jack a plow to keep the school closed.
Tigger goes looking through the hundred-acre-wood to find his family.
A British family is trapped between culture, tradition, and the colonial sins of the past.

In a remote mountain village, the teacher must leave for a month, and the mayor can find only a 13-year old girl, Wei Minzhi, to substitute. The teacher leaves one stick of chalk for each day and promises her an extra 10 yuan if ther

Arne buys a house in suburban Los Angeles, only to discover that the previous owner died in a grisly manner. Then he gets a visit from the dead woman's best friend, who is convinced that she didn't commit suicide. Together, they inve
Trouble erupts when a happily married couple bring in a third party to spice things up.

A police lt. is ordered to stop investigating deadly crime boss Mr. Brown, because he hasn't been able to get any hard evidence against him. He then goes after Brown's girlfriend who despises him, for information instead.

A psychotic redneck, who owns a dilapidated hotel in rural East Texas, kills various people who upset him or his business, and he feeds their bodies to a large crocodile that he keeps as a pet in the swamp beside his hotel.

This Ken Loach film tells the story of a man devoted to his family and his religion. Proud, though poor, Bob wants his little girl to have a beautiful (and costly) brand-new dress for her First Communion. His stubbornness and determi
Idealistic engineer-trainee and his experiences in teaching a group of rambunctious white high school students from the slums of London's East End.
Account of Admiral Byrd's 1928 expedition to the South Pole. Academy award winning cinematography.

A college dropout, attempting to live up to his father's high standards, gets a job as a broker for a suburban investment firm which puts him on the fast track to success. But the job might not be as legitimate as it first appeared t
A trio of sisters bond over their ambivalence toward the approaching death of their curmudgeonly father, to whom none of them was particularly close.

A commercial transport ship and its crew are marooned on a planet full of bloodthirsty creatures that only come out to feast at night. But then, they learn that a month-long eclipse is about to occur.
A struggling dentist's life is turned upside down when a famous gangster moves in next door, and his wife convinces him to inform a notorious mob boss about the gangster's whereabouts.

This documentary follows the lives of a number of heroin addicts in the U.S.A. It shows their heroin life stories.
When three workers try to steal from the local union, they instead discover corruption and decide to use this information for blackmail.
In Paris, an artist hires portrait models, and after he finishes their portraits, he strangles them.
The Tramp finds work and the girl of his dreams at a circus.
With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.
A recent high school graduate unsure of his future gets a summer job at the Flamingo beach club, and meets the charismatic Phil Brody.

Chaplin is the first national film company " Chaplin's first film is three volumes long. In this film, Chaplin makes an interesting comparison between the life of tramps and the life of dogs. He and Chaplin have to struggle to survive and endure being kicked around by all sectors of society. Chaplin began to think about the structure of comedy from this film, and each paragraph is related to each other to form a whole. Due to the integrity of the structure, this film In terms of content, it is still a comedy showing that Charlotte is chased around by the police in slums and hotels, which seems to have tears in his smile.
The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put that relationship in jeopardy.
Newcomer Will Lockhart defies the local cattle baron and his sadistic son by working for one of his oldest rivals.
A Story about the rich McCulloch Family, their overbearing father and the children's misguided blaming him for everything that doesn't go right.

It's been 10 years since Lizzie Borden High School's class of '72 graduated, and the preppies, the hippies and the in-crowd has returned to reminisce over good times past. But classmate Walter Baylor has returned too with a vengeance
A Quaker colony tries to save the giant sequoias from a timber baron.

A chorus girl gets a ride from millionaire Bruno's driver. The cash-strapped theater director thinks, she's Bruno's girlfriend and makes her the lead. She meets Bruno, thinking he's a reporter. More confusion follows.
After assuming his dead cell-mate's identity to get with the other man's girlfriend, an ex-convict finds himself a reluctant participant in a casino heist.

An English Professor tries to deal with his wife leaving him, the arrival of his editor who has been waiting for his book for seven years, and the various problems that his friends and associates involve him in.
The President of the United States must deal with an international military crisis while confined to a Colorado diner during a freak snowstorm

A lonely, but talented teacher enjoys a flirtation with the (married) principal of the school, who returns her affections, but is hampered by his family members. Whilst the teacher and principal can steal their fleeting moments durin

Kresten's dad dies and he returns to the farm on Lolland to take care of things incl. his retarded brother. He employs a hooker as maid. He loses wife and job due to lies. The maid's kid brother moves in and they're a family of 4.

An engaged woman, who has an art gallery with a friend, receives a package from Mexico sent by her uncle. A lot of people seem to be interested in this package, including a handsome man. Who can be trusted?
Rob has 2 strikes and 3 strikes now means 25 to life. Leaving prison, he's picked up in a stolen car later stopped by the police. Can he prove his innocence before he's caught?
Salma Hayek plays an avid detective assigned to the heist of a batch of precious coins that end up in the hands of a suicidal barber.
When a woman drives a car into the river to her death, everyone in town becomes a suspect.
Abbie, tired of failed relationships, has a one-night-stand with her gay friend; they agree to raise the resulting baby together.

A human-looking alien from a highly advanced but emotionless all-male society is sent to Earth to impregnate a woman and bring the child back to their planet. The alien ends up falling in love there. A suspicious F.A.A. Agent targets
A heartfelt documentary focusing on the day-to-day lives of professional wrestlers, some on the rise, some on the wane, and others fighting for their lives.
An African-American Mafia hit man who models himself after the samurai of old finds himself targeted for death by the mob.
In rural 1960s Australia, a boy watches helplessly as his best friend falls in love with a small-time criminal, setting off a violent chain of events.
A fragile Kansas girl's love for a handsome young man from the town's most powerful family drives her to heartbreak and madness.
A rich father hires a tutor for his son. The son is a horny teenager and the tutor is a gorgeous blonde. Complications ensue.
When both parents are killed by man, the wolf Lobo learns the ways of the hunter.
The life of a soap opera actress begins to unravel as she fears her character will be written out of the series.
A man visits his war buddy's family hotel and finds a gangster running things. As a hurricane approaches, the two end up confronting each other.
Vic Brady draws young Don Gregor into a life of crime. He then blackmails Gregor's plastic surgeon father into fixing up his face so he can evade the cops.

In 1940, the Nazis invade Britain and transform it into a fascist state where some Britons collaborate and others resist. In 1944, an apolitical Irish nurse becomes a reluctant player in the fight between the two sides.
The professional and romantic misadventures of an advertising executive in 1960s swinging London.
An in-depth look at various NASA moon landing missions, starting with Apollo 8.
German commander Hauptmann Stransky (Maximilian Schell) places a squad in extreme danger after Sergeant Rolf Steiner (James Coburn) refuses to lie for him.
A mad doctor attempts to create atomic supermen.
A tycoon hires a tutor to teach his lover proper etiquette, with unexpected results.
After two friends return home from the Vietnam War one becomes mentally unstable and obsesses with becoming a bird.

Aspiring and incarcerated rock singer, Robin Shea (Rebecca De Mornay) seduces prison guard Billy Moran (Vincent Spano). Robin marries Billy to get out of jail, but Robin's concerns are on politician James Tiernan (Frank Langella).
An Egyptian caterer kills various women in suburban Miami to use their body parts to revive a dormant Egyptian goddess while an inept police detective tries to track him down.
When a cougar raised by a group of loggers in the Pacific Northwest reverts to its natural instincts, the consequence could threaten its life.
A crackpot artist kills various people to use their blood as his new crimson red color for his paintings.
A government researcher, sent to research the "menace" of wolves in the north, learns about the true beneficial and positive nature of the species.
In a Scandinavian insane asylum, murderer Salem sneaks out at night to exact his revenge on those who he deems responsible for his predicament.
The real life story of actress Pearl White during her rise to fame in silent serials.
A substantial insurance payment could mean either financial salvation or personal ruin for a poor black family.
Six people are lured into a small Deep South town for a Centennial celebration where the residents proceed to kill them one by one as revenge for the town's destruction during the Civil War.

When the first manned mission to Mars meets with a catastrophic and mysterious disaster after reporting an unidentified structure, a rescue mission is launched to investigate the tragedy and bring back any survivors.
A rare book dealer, while seeking out the last two copies of a demon text, gets drawn into a conspiracy with supernatural overtones.

George Condo is a modern master of antipodal psychedelia .Often misunderstood by the mainstream surface dweller crowd unschooled in the finer aspects of cosmic consciousness.In this film you will be bedazzled by george's interpetations of what lies just below the surface of human consciousness.Jewel encrusted antipodol beings from dimensions uncharted by western pseudo-science.A must see for those interested in furthering one's own understanding of the transcendental aspects of psychedelic art.At first I had no idea of what to expect a film about a guy painting condminiums,not my idea of a good time.I was actually instore for quite a surprise a psychedelic master I had never had the oppuortunity to gaze upon.Vibrant textures and special appearances by some of New York City's beat generation top this documentary off.
East West 101 is set around the Major Crime Squad in metropolitan Sydney. It is based upon the experiences of actual detectives in a crime unit in Sydney's western suburbs.
In an afterlife way station resembling a major city, the lives of the recently-deceased are examined in a court-like setting.
A working-class Indiana teen obsessed with the Italian cycling team vies for the affections of a college girl while searching for life goals with his friends.
A coach with a checkered past and a local drunk train a small town high school basketball team to become a top contender for the championship.
A fan who has an affair with one minor-league baseball player each season meets an up-and-coming pitcher and the experienced catcher assigned to him.

A couple of high school grads spend one final night cruising the strip with their buddies before they go off to college.
A major heist goes off as planned, but then double crosses, bad luck and solid police work cause everything to unravel.
An American Civil War veteran embarks on a years-long journey to rescue his niece from the Comanches after the rest of his brother's family is massacred in a raid on their Texas farm.
Allied agents stage a daring raid on a castle where the Nazis are holding American brigadier general George Carnaby prisoner, but that's not all that's really going on.
A US Army Colonel is tasked with forming an elite commando-style unit from crack Canadian troops and the dregs of the US Army.
A New England sea captain in the 1880s arrives at his fiancée's sprawling Texas ranch, where he becomes embroiled in a feud between two families over a valuable patch of land.

An FBI agent posing as a combine driver becomes romantically involved with a Midwest farmer who lives a double life as a white supremacist.
The early life of Woody Guthrie as a vagabond folk singer.
As the Allied armies close in, the Germans decide to blow up the last Rhine bridge, trapping their own men on the wrong side. But will it happen?
A wagon master and a con-man preacher help freed slaves dogged by cheap-labor agents out West.

Languid look at the Gullah culture of the sea islands off the coast of South Carolina and Georgia where African folk-ways were maintained well into the 20th Century and was one of the last bastions of these mores in America. Set in 1

Denis is distracted: he's studying all day for philosophy exams and working all night at the flower market; plus, whenever he closes his eyes, he dreams of a mysterious woman in white. His girlfriend Nina is annoyed at him for his inattention, so she steps out behind his back with a friend of his. One night, while napping at the flower mart, he pursues the mystery woman in what he thinks is a dream, and finds himself with her in a restaurant with her father and her fiancé, then on to a magic shop, the Louvre, a nightclub, and a mental asylum. During the night, he discovers a plot against her, and still believing it's a dream, goes to great lengths to try to save her.
After the Nazi administrator of Czechoslovakia is shot, his assassin tries to elude the Gestapo and struggles with his impulse to give himself up as hostages are executed.

Frenchman Abel Tiffauges likes children, and wants to protect them against the grown-ups. Falsely suspected as child molester, he's recruited as a soldier in the 2nd World War, but very soon he is taken prisoner of war. After shortly
After a global nuclear war, the residents of Australia must come to terms with the fact that all life will be destroyed in a matter of months.
A beautician and her crooked boyfriend attempt to rob the bookie operation located in the back room, but when the plan goes wrong, they frame an innocent man.

Seattle: The grunge girl band "No Exits" is just about to get a record deal. At this time Jimmy is appearing again, the former boy-friend of the band guitarist Shelly. She had left him because his friend had raped her. But he doesn't
A black British dockworker named Johnny Zinga becomes a famous singer and learns that he is the rightful king of the African island of Casanga.

In this musical comedy, Paul Robeson stars as Joe, a Marseilles docker hired by a wealthy English couple to find their missing son. When Joe finds him, he learns he escaped of his own will, and takes him to stay with a local singer.
Four armed men hijack a New York City subway car and demand a ransom for the passengers. The city's police are faced with a conundrum: Even if it's paid, how could they get away?

1962, after Yale graduation, womanizing Lawrence flees a gambling debt that his rich dad won't pay. He takes his roomie's place as Peace Corps Volunteer in Thai Golden Triangle with 2 other PCVs. Will he survive 2 years?
New Orleans District Attorney Jim Garrison discovers there's more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.

Harry Crumb is a bumbling and inept private investigator who is hired to solve the kidnapping of a young heiress which he's not expected to solve because his employer is the mastermind behind the kidnapping.
The Henderson family adopt a friendly Sasquatch but have a hard time trying to keep the legend of 'Bigfoot' a secret.
When Colombian revolutionaries kidnap an American engineer, his brother and friends, faced with official inaction, hire a mercenary and mount the rescue operation themselves.
Shanghai, 1938: A missionary woman hires a fortune hunter to help her find 1100 lbs. opium lost, as wounded need the morphine. Adventure and romance follows.
The life of an uptight tax lawyer turns chaotic when he is asked to escort a young woman newly released from prison, who persuades him to help prove her innocence.
A surprisingly resourceful housewife vows revenge on her husband when he begins an affair with a wealthy romance novelist.

An aspiring composer discovers a broken-winged, beautiful angel in his swimming pool. When everyone finds out, he must deal with his jealous fiancé, his future father-in-law, and his friends who have a business plan.
A workaholic needs a date for a dinner with new important clientele, but who his brother sets him up with could lead to disaster.
In 1950s Texas, a woman trying to recover sexy photos of herself and divorce her husband witnesses a murder and uncovers corrupt land dealings.
Kermit and his newfound friends trek across America to find success in Hollywood, but a frog legs merchant is after Kermit.
Kermit the Frog, The Great Gonzo, and Fozzie Bear are reporters who travel to Britain to interview a rich victim of jewel thieves and help her along with her secretary, Miss Piggy.
Kermit and his friends go to New York City to get their musical on Broadway only to find it's a more difficult task than they anticipated.

Big Bird is sent to live far from Sesame Street by a pesky social worker named Miss Finch. Unhappy, he runs away from there, prompting the rest of the Sesame Street gang to go on a cross-country journey to find him.

A time traveling scientist goes back to prehistoric times and feeds dinosaurs a magic cereal that increases their intelligence - next they land in modern New York City for a series of comic adventures.
A paleontologist and her husband discover a mother and baby brontosaurus in Africa, and try to protect them from a group of hunters intent on capturing the dinosaurs.

Two separate people, a man and a woman, find something very stirring about the sea turtles in their tank at the London Zoo. They meet and form an odd, but sympathetic camaraderie as they plan to steal two of the turtles and free them

Once they said God himself couldn't sink her. Then they said no man on Earth could reach her. But an underwater research agency, headed by Admiral James Sandecker, is assigned the job of finding the doomed ship in her North Atlantic
An unhappily married couple struggle to deal with their problems while on board the ill-fated ship.
On its maiden voyage in April 1912, the supposedly unsinkable RMS Titanic hits an iceberg in the Atlantic Ocean.
During the Napoleonic wars, a British Navy Captain has adventures in Central American waters.
Dreaming of more than his routine life, a father pushes his 15 years old son to break a world record: opening and closing a door 40,000 times in 24 hours.
An unemployed single mother becomes a legal assistant and almost single-handedly brings down a California power company accused of polluting a city's water supply.

Alex Browning is among a group of high school students readying themselves for a trip to Europe. When he suddenly has a premonition their airplane will crash, he screams to warn the others but instead he is thrown off of the plane.
Three sisters and their ex-con brother return home to nurse their mother, who is dying of cancer.

A single mother determined to make it as a singer puts together an all girl reggae group named Neeta, Sweeta, & Nastie with her friends. Living in a housing project with little support, the odds are obviously against her. Emotionally
An orphan bear cub hooks up with an adult male as they try to dodge human hunters.
A unfaithful wife plots with her lover to kill her husband, but the lover is accidentally killed instead. The husband stays in hiding, and lets his wife be charged with conspiracy.
A widowed Chinese-English doctor falls in love with a married American correspondent in Hong Kong during China's Communist revolution.
A dying man in his forties remembers his past. His childhood, his mother, the war, personal moments and things that tell of the recent history of all the Russian nation.

Anthony Bergens, who became famous in shocking (1960), plays the exotic character "K". As soon as he woke up, he found the police nearby and said he would be tried, but no one told him what crime he committed. In order to show his innocence, K tried to challenge the judicial system, but the tragic characters could not escape the Kafka claustrophobia.

During the 1700s, pirate Captain Vallo seizes a British warship and gets involved in various money-making schemes involving Caribbean rebels led by El Libre, British envoy Baron Jose Gruda, and a beautiful courtesan named Consuelo.
Two best friends set out on an adventure, but it soon turns around to a terrifying escape from being hunted by the police, as these two girls escape for the crimes they committed.

In post-war Austria, young, handsome country lad, Konrad Ludwig (Michael York), charms his way into a butler position at the castle of the widowed (and destitute) countess von Ornstein (Angela Lansbury). Soon, the young man's running
A lawyer is forced to defend a guilty judge, while defending other innocent clients, and trying to find punishment for the guilty and provide justice for the innocent.

There is a student organization in Fibo School Park, which is full of rich people from the white English department. Few people can stand them. Only tinvolmore can get along with hypocritical them. What does volmore use to convince them?
Story of a woman and her three lovers.
A not so popular young man wants to pledge to a popular fraternity at his historically black college.
On the hottest day of the year on a street in the Bedford-Stuyvesant section of Brooklyn, everyone's hate and bigotry smolders and builds until it explodes into violence.
Jazz trumpeter Bleek Gilliam makes questionable decisions in his professional and romantic lives.
Friends and family of a married black architect react in different ways to his affair with an Italian secretary.
Arizona Deputy Sheriff Coogan (Clint Eastwood) is sent to New York City to escort an escaped fugitive back for trial.

Billy Flynn is an ex-champion boxer who was KO'd by booze and gambling. When the wealthy, estranged mother of his young son begins trying to lure the boy away from him, Flynn must return to the ring to provide for his child.

Stop-motion animated series with a cast of animals, sound-biting on a specific topic each episode, such as creatures' sporting adventures, Christmas, and visits to veterinarians. The show satirizes modern man on the street and docume
A New York City architect becomes a one-man vigilante squad after his wife is murdered by street punks. In self-defense, the vengeful man kills muggers on the mean streets after dark.
Architect Paul Kersey once again becomes a vigilante when he tries to find the five street punks who murdered his daughter and housekeeper, this time on the dark streets of Los Angeles.
Architect/vigilante Paul Kersey arrives back in New York City and is forcibly recruited by a crooked police chief to fight street crime caused by a large gang terrorizing the neighborhoods.
Architect/vigilante Paul Kersey takes on the members of a vicious Los Angeles drug cartel to stop the flow of drugs after his girlfriend's daughter dies from an overdose.
Paul Kersey is back at working vigilante justice when his fiancée, Olivia, has her business threatened by mobsters.
A Los Angeles insurance representative lets an alluring housewife seduce him into a scheme of insurance fraud and murder that arouses the suspicion of his colleague, an insurance investigator.
A nurse falls in love with a terminally ill man.
A rapper gets stuck in a small town and falls for a local girl whose family is in witness protection.

Four small turtles and a small mouse in New York sewer were transformed into giant humanized creatures by touching the gel containing radioactive substances. Fiery, impulsive but passionate Raphael (Josh PAIs), humorous Michelangelo (Michelin Siti), calm Donatello (Leif Tilden) and their leader Da Vinci (David Forman), These four Kung Fu Ninja Turtles shoulder the sacred mission of eliminating violence and bringing peace to New York City. They were extremely brave and matched. After many times of upholding justice, they became angry with a mysterious organization in the city. The mysterious organization launched a raid. Because they were outnumbered, the Ninja Turtle was seriously injured. At the same time, their teacher was also caught by the mysterious organization.
The Turtles and the Shredder battle once again, this time for the last canister of the ooze that created the Turtles, with which Shredder wants to unleash an army of new mutants.
Ninja Turtles were sent to 17th century Japan by a magic wand. They will fight the evil Lord Norinaga there and take back the wand to save New York City!
It is the dawn of World War III. In the west mountains of America, a group of teenagers band together to defend their town, and their country, from invading Soviet forces.

Five juvenile lost causes are sent to the Everglades where a war veteran tries to reform them using survival tactics. Their new skills and resolve are tested when a Miami drug lord targets them for trying to clean up their neighborho
A trio of vacationing American students cross the border from Finland to the USSR during the Cold War and are soon imprisoned after a skirmish with Soviet soldiers.

"Bloodsport" follows Frank Dux, an American martial artist serving in the military, who decides to leave the army to compete in a martial arts tournament in Hong Kong where fights to the death can occur.
A famous fashion photographer develops a disturbing ability to see through the eyes of a killer.
An unsuccessful comedian uncovers a family secret and learns the true price of letting inherent talent shine.
Although married Chinese farmers Wang and O-Lan initially experience success, their lives are complicated by declining fortunes and lean times, as well as the arrival of the beautiful young Lotus.
In 1965, an unorthodox and irreverent DJ named Adrian Cronauer begins to shake up things when he is assigned to the U.S. Armed Services radio station in Vietnam.
A divorced mother may lose custody of her young daughter to her ex-husband after he learns that the little girl crawled into bed with the mother and her boyfriend.
A lifelong feud between two neighbors since childhood only gets worse when a new female neighbor moves across the street.
A couple's attitudes are challenged when their daughter introduces them to her African-American fiancé.
An avenging cop seeks out his brother's killer and falls for the daughter of a businessman who is involved in a money-deal with his father.
A rich college kid is taught a lesson after a joy ride ends up destroying a country restaurant.
A modern-day remake of the Cyrano DeBergerac tale.
An introvert relieves the tedium of caring for his invalid mother by spying on his neighbor.

The story of Mohammed, a blind Iranian boy and his father, Hashem, who is always oscillating between accepting his son as he is and abandoning him, as he represents a burden for him, after the loss of his wife.
Detective Superintendent Peter Boyd is the leader of a Police team which investigates unsolved murders using modern technology.

Juan is a young Spanish man whose dream is to become one of the famous toreros. When he was caught making an illegal (and in fact for the real torero life endangering) night bullfight with one of the destinated bulls for the corridas
The Shelleys visit Lord Byron and compete to write a horror story.
A trio of country singers becomes stranded at a haunted mansion and gets mixed up with spies.
Schoolboys marooned on a Pacific island create their own savage civilization.
The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

Sam and Dave are living the boring life until they are beckoned to Sam's uncle's Island. When they get there (still not quite sure how that worked) they are compelled by beautiful women and a dastardly enemy of the Island. After accidentally convincing Sam's uncle to sign away rights to his island, they must somehow fix the problem. eb2 Written by Jennifer

A huge Solar flare is predicted to fry Earth. Astronauts must fly to the sun to drop a talking bomb (Freddy) at the right time so the flare will point somewhere else. Giant IXL Corp C.E.O. Teague thinks the flare won't happen and wan
A wealthy yet depressed architect and his sympathetic wife strive to conquer their life issues in anticipation of Harvey Fairchild's (Jack Lemmon's) 60th birthday party.
An unhappy businessman finds a new sense of purpose after he's tasked with helping a quartet of ghosts fulfill their last wishes before moving on to the afterlife.

Honest and hard-working Texas rancher Homer Bannon has a conflict with his unscrupulous, selfish, arrogant and egotistical son Hud, who sank into alcoholism after accidentally killing his brother in a car crash.
An up-and-coming pool player plays a long-time champion in a single high-stakes match.
Based on a real-life case in 1925, two great lawyers argue the case for and against a Tennessee science teacher accused of the crime of teaching evolution.

"Dersu uzara" is adapted from the geographical investigation report "in the mang forest of Wusuli: dersu uzara" by Russian \/ Soviet Explorer arseniev. It is Kurosawa's "dream for 30 years". This story is about the friendship between a Russian soldier from the city, an explorer and a hunter from the mountains. In the film, Kurosawa deals with the relationship between man and nature with exquisite long scenes. The unique color from the film industry system of the Soviet Union has shown infinite charm under the emperor Kurosawa. The severe winter and Midsummer in Wusuli, the red, green and yellow mottled woods, bonfires, wind and snow, footprints, rivers, of course, and the kind that will never be forgotten and shock people. It seems to be a frozen moment and eternal grand scene - the intersection of sun and moon Wind, snow and ice fields, these noble, silent and great pictures, can only be completed by harsh directors such as emperor Kurosawa in the Soviet film system.

Roy Neary, an Indiana electric lineman, finds his quiet and ordinary daily life turned upside down after a close encounter with a UFO, spurring him to an obsessed cross-country quest for answers as a momentous event approaches.

On the recommendation of Professor Alan Driscoll (Christopher Lee), a young female student, Nan Barlow (Virginia Stevenson), went to the fictional masachus Etz town of whitewood to study witchcraft. She found that the town was occupied by the reincarnation of a notorious witch, Mrs. Elizabeth selwin \/ newlis (Patricia Jessel), who was burned at the stake in the 17th century. In order to preserve her immortality, virgins must be sacrificed to Witches every year - and this year, the student is the chosen victim.

The European equivalent of "The Return of the Secaucus 7," this Swiss film looks at the lives of several men and women in their 30s as they confront the slim gains of the "revolutionary" sixties. Max, a dissatisfied copy editor; Myri
A psychiatrist makes multiple trips through time to save a woman that was murdered by her brutal husband.
A poor boy gets a job working for his rich uncle and ends up falling in love with two women.

Mourning his dead child, a haunted Vietnam War veteran attempts to uncover his past while suffering from a severe case of dissociation. To do so, he must decipher reality and life from his own dreams, delusions, and perceptions of de

Twenty-four hours in the lives of the young employees at Empire Records when they all grow up and become young adults thanks to each other and the manager. They all face the store joining a chain store with strict rules.
Biographical story of the rise from nowhere of early rock and roll singer Ritchie Valens who died at age 17 in a plane crash with Buddy Holly and The Big Bopper.

The thief Gaston escapes the dungeon of medieval Aquila through the latrine. Soldiers are about to kill him when Navarre saves him. Navarre, traveling with his spirited hawk, plans to kill the bishop of Aquila with help from Gaston.

A socially inept fourteen-year-old experiences heartbreak for the first time when his two best friends - Cappie, an older-brother figure, and Maggie, the new girl with whom he is in love - fall for each other.
Rob, a record store owner and compulsive list maker, recounts his top five breakups, including the one in progress.

A father whose boxing career was derailed channels his love of the sport into coaching his three sons - but when an outside manager offers to take over, the family threatens to split in this hard-hitting drama.
Two swindlers get their hands on a map to the fabled city of gold, El Dorado.

A senior at an ivy league college, who depends on scholarships and working on the side, gets accepted into the secret society The Skulls. He hopes it betters chances at Harvard but The Skulls is not what he thought and comes at a pri
A young pathology doctor interning in a morgue tries to cope with a wave of suicides. A woman she just met kills herself, but she suspects someone close to her might have killed her.
An uptight, leather-clad female alien, armed with a ray gun and accompanied by a menacing robot, comes to Earth to collect Earth's men as breeding stock.
Cole Thornton, a gunfighter for hire, joins forces with an old friend,……
After exposure to radiation, an atomic research scientist finds himself changing into a murderous, lizard-like creature every time he is exposed to sunlight.
When Captain James Hook kidnaps his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and reclaim his youthful spirit in order to challenge his old enemy.

While travelling on the Trans-Siberian Express, an anthropologist and his rival must contain the threat posed by the former's cargo: a prehistoric ape which is the host for a lifeform that is absorbing the minds of the passengers and
A free-spirited young woman (Deborah Foreman) upsets the status quo at a stuffy Brentwood limousine service.
The son of the sheik and a dancing girl fall in love, but when he is made to believe she has betrayed him he seeks revenge.
A string of appalling lust murders shocks the University of Perugia as a sadistic serial killer strangles to death beautiful college girls with a red and black scarf.
A drunken, hard-nosed U.S. Marshal and a Texas Ranger help a stubborn teenager track down her father's murderer in Indian Territory.
Two strangers meet on the road and travel through Nevada on motorcycle to find an elusive spot where they can dump another man's ashes.

Renowned Russian piano teacher Irina Sousatzka gets a new student - Bengali piano prodigy Manek. They are both immigrants in the UK and bond quickly. When Manek's single mother's business fails, he must make a career decision.
An English teacher and struggling single mother has her life disrupted when the father who abandoned her as a child comes back into her life.
Billy Hayes, an American college student, is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and thrown into prison.
After a famous author is rescued from a car crash by a fan of his novels, he comes to realize that the care he is receiving is only the beginning of a nightmare of captivity and abuse.
The life of Buddy Young, a comic legend in flashbacks but an old man looking for work in the present.
Emma moves to a ranch with her son after a divorce and befriends the older Murphy, but things turn complicated when her ex shows up.
A terminally ill man prepares for his death.
A psychologist is sent to a station orbiting a distant planet in order to discover what has caused the crew to go insane.
A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about the news media for its own profit, but finds that his message may be difficult to control.
A coverup and witchhunt occur after a politician accidentally kills his mistress.
A satire of American professional football in which a veteran pass-catcher's individuality and refusal to become part of the team family is bitterly resented by his disciplinarian coaches.
A New Yorker newly separated from his wife moves in with his best friend, a divorced sportswriter, but their ideas of housekeeping and lifestyles are as different as night and day.
Missouri farmer Josey Wales joins a Confederate guerrilla unit and winds up on the run from the Union soldiers who murdered his family.

Thriller starring Gina Gershon as hard-edged, experienced cop Nora 'Hugs' Hugosian, who is assigned a new partner--rookie cop Chris O'Brien (Rory Cochrane)--to help her with the serial-killer case she is working on. The two begin a passionate affair, but it isn't long before Chris has suspicions about Nora's real involvement with the murders.
An accidental cross-time radio link connects father and son across 30 years. The son tries to save his father's life, but then must fix the consequences.
Two slacker wrestling fans are devastated by the ousting of their favorite character by an unscrupulous promoter.
A man who falls in love with the woman who received his wife's heart must decide which woman it is who holds his heart.
An attorney defends an officer on trial for ordering his troops to fire on civilians after they stormed a U.S. embassy in a Middle Eastern country.

Around 1940, The New Yorker staff writer Joe Mitchell meets Joe Gould, a Greenwich Village character, who is writing a voluminous Oral History of the World, a record of twenty thousand conversations he's overheard.
A nice-guy cop with Dissociative Identity Disorder must protect a woman on the run from a corrupt ex-boyfriend and his associates.
A modern-day witch likes her neighbor but despises his fiancée, so she enchants him to love her instead.
An innkeeper murders a wealthy guest to pay off his debt, but his conscience will not allow him to get away with the crime so easily.
Mike is a successful Hollywood producer of violent movies. Then he himself experiences extreme violence, goes missing, joins some Latino gardeners and reviews his life.
During World War II, several oddly assorted military experts are teamed in a mission to raid and destroy a bridge vital to enemy strategy.

Frankie, on naval-reserve duty in Tahiti, doesn't trust Dee Dee to stay faithful, so he hires Bwana, a witch doctor, to help. Bwana conjures up a floating bikini, "stuffs" it with Cassandra, and sends her to distract advertising exec
Three stories are connected by a Memphis hotel and the spirit of Elvis Presley.
The story of two anarchists who were charged and unfairly tried for murder when it was really for their political convictions.

An Irish tough-guy debt collector is asked by his local community to help rid the town of developers bent on building a chemical plant on the outskirts of town. The developers are ruthless and have sent their heavies into town to kee

Alcoholic billionaire playboy Arthur Bach must marry a woman he does not love, or he will be cut off from his $750,000,000 fortune. But when Arthur falls in love with a poor waitress, he must decide if he wants to choose love or mone
A soon-to-be-married man's friends throw him the ultimate bachelor party.
The Buckmans are a midwestern family all dealing with their lives: estranged relatives, raising children, pressures of the job, and learning to be a good parent and spouse.
A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.
A troubled man talks to his suicidal sister's psychiatrist about their family history and falls in love with her in the process.
The sensuous wife of a lunch wagon proprietor and a rootless drifter begin a sordidly steamy affair and conspire to murder her Greek husband.
An examination of the possible consequences of a certain event.
Anna, a French actress, is approached by financial broker Mark in the Vermeer room of a New York gallery. However, romance does not ensue.

Claire's social satire before emigrating to Hollywood reveals the bourgeois society's mechanical control and exploitation of workers. It has a light comedy style. It is an early classic. The film tells about the different experiences of two tramps in the wave of industrialization and automation. One has become a rich man, and the other is only obsessed with nature. After the protagonist escaped from prison, he built a record factory (allusion to EMI), and the assembly line production made the whole atmosphere almost the same as that of the prison.

Yukinojo, a Kabuki actor, seeks revenge by destroying the three men who caused the deaths of his parents. Also involved are the daughter of one of Yukinojo's targets, two master thieves, and a swordsman who himself is out to kill Yuk
A big-city newspaper columnist is forced to enter a drug and alcohol rehab center after ruining her sister's wedding and crashing a stolen limousine.
A wealthy New York City investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.
Two friends, a priest and a rabbi, fall in love with the same woman they knew in their youth, but the religious position of both men denies them romance.

Old bank robber Henry, paralyzed from a stroke, is moved from a prison hospital to a retirement home, where Carol is a nurse. She doesn't believe he's paralyzed and sees him as a way out of her boring life.
In early 1970s England, a Pakistani father finds the authority he has previously maintained challenged by his increasingly Anglicized children.
A film about the career of the notorious punk rock band, the Sex Pistols.
A psychological romantic thriller where fantasy and reality become indistinguishable for a woman leading a double life in her dreams.

A police officer returns to his neighborhood in Kingston, Jamaica to find himself in conflict with his childhood friend who is now the right-hand-man of the local gang-lord in a gun-running racket. Jamaica's highest-grossing film to
Psychiatrist installs a concealed movie camera in his apartment to record the screwed-up lives of the women who visit him.
A group of college-age buddies struggle with their imminent passage into adulthood in 1959 Baltimore.
Shakes is good at his job as party clown - when he's sober and shows up. Five druggy clowns frame him for the murder of his boss.
A female girlie club entertainer in Weimar Republic era Berlin romances two men while the Nazi Party rises to power around them.
A former child star torments her paraplegic sister in their decaying Hollywood mansion.

Biographer John Lahr is writing a book about playwright Joe Orton. Joe and Kenneth meet at drama school and live together for ten years as lovers and collaborators. Both want to be writers, but only one of them is successful.
An orphan goes to live with his free-spirited aunt. Conflict ensues when the executor of his father's estate objects to the aunt's lifestyle.
In New York, a gambler is challenged to take a cold female missionary to Havana, but they fall for each other, and the bet has a hidden motive to finance a crap game.
A love triangle develops between a beautiful yet dangerous vampire, her cellist companion, and a gerontologist.

After the shocking murder of his older brother, a New York history student finds himself inexplicably hounded by shadowy government agents on the trail of a Nazi war criminal who is trying to retrieve smuggled diamonds.
An exclusive golf course has to deal with a brash new member and a destructive dancing gopher.

Derrick, Cathy, and Travis, three students and fellow roommates, decide to do a class project on gossip. Derrick witnesses couple Naomi and Beau making out at a night club, but then she passes out and Beau leaves. Cathy spreads the rumor that well-known ice princess Naomi had sex with Beau at the club that night, which quickly evolves until the gossip mill is saying that Beau went ahead and had sex with Naomi after she passed out. Cathy has regrets when Naomi cries rape and Beau is being arrested.

Quincy Mike and Monica white have been rivals since childhood. They are very talented athletes. They both love basketball and each other. When they struggle to realize their dream of entering the professional basketball world, they need to overcome different difficulties. The story begins when Monica and Quincy were teenagers. Monica moved next door to Quincy's house. Quincy was soon attracted by Monica's exquisite skills and the two became friends. Later, they were promoted to high school and University, and the ball played better and better. The feelings between the two are also growing day by day. But one day, Quincy suddenly announced that he would drop out of school to play professional basketball. Monica began to think about how she should choose between basketball and love
A German submarine is boarded by disguised American submariners trying to capture their Enigma cipher machine.
A group of male friends become obsessed with five mysterious sisters who are sheltered by their strict, religious parents in suburban Detroit in the mid 1970s.
John Berlin, a former Los Angeles homicide detective, investigates a multiple murder case in San Diego. The only witness is a blind girl to whom he is immediately attracted.
Judge Jim Scott must contend with the vicious relatives of a murderer he's about to sentence...and his unfaithful fiancee.
A fading comedian and a suicidally despondent ballet dancer must look to each other to find purpose and hope in their lives.
A gothic romance novelist desperate for inspiration travels to Paris and reads a diary relating a tale of romance from the 18th century.
Two young gamblers are on a non-stop roll, but soon the casino wants to even the odds and bring their winning streak to a close.
A young woman goes in search of her midlife crisis suffering husband who left her.
Alex Corvis returns to the world of the living to solve the murder of a young woman that he was wrongly accused of.
In this live-action prequel to The Flintstones (1994), the Flintstones and the Rubbles go on a trip to Rock Vegas, where Wilma Slaghoople is pursued by playboy Chip Rockefeller.
A pregnant seventeen-year-old rebuilds her life after being abandoned by her boyfriend at a Walmart in Sequoyah, Oklahoma.
Two veteran salesmen dissect a sales pitch to a particular client, through their young protégé.
A separated attorney in Rio sees an English teaching American widow and tries to woo her.

Two brothers share a house in the Fairfax district of LA: Tony a feckless actor, Chris an accountant. Both have relationships on rocky ground. As these emotions swirl, Tony meets his letter carrier, a single-mom named Kathy who's com
The group of people gather at the house in Copenhagen suburb to break all the limitations and to bring out the "inner idiot" in themselves.
In the heart of a young woman, lies a secret that divides a nation.
Four frames of simultaneous action that alternately follow a smitten lesbian lover as she obsesses over her partner's dalliances and the tense goings-on of a Hollywood film production company.

A genetically manipulated and very hungry dinosaur escapes from a bioengineering company and reeks havoc on the local desert town. A security guard and a girl environmentalist try to stop both it and the company's doomsday bioweapon.
A team of scientists go to a nuclear mining facility to investigate a possible meltdown and instead find a large amount of cloned dinosaurs.

International terrorists get a surprise when their cargo turns out to contain living dinosaurs. The army commando team now have to think fast, if they want to prevent the extinction of the human species, instead of the reptiles.
Griff wants to maintain just a superficial relationship with his all-gay boyfriend, who gets seriously wounded in a gay bashing.
A cop and an FBI agent race for answers after law abiding people suddenly become violent criminals.
A young Southern débutante temporarily abandons her posh lifestyle and upcoming, semi-arranged marriage to have a lustful and erotic fling with a rugged drifter who works at a local carnival.
A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

A bored Italian socialite (Kim Basinger) abandons her jet-set lifestyle for the rigors and rewards of rural Kenya in this true story, based on the best-selling memoir by Kuki Gallmann. Directed by Hugh Hudson (Chariots of Fire).
A widow finds choosing a new husband might not be her choice at all, as the actions of her various prospects confine her freedom.
Five friends spend one lost weekend in a mix of music, love and club culture.

From the mind of Brooklyn actor, performance artist and Hip-Hop activist Danny Hoch, this film spins out the stories of ten lives shocked by global Hip-Hop, the prison system and life in general. Moving masterfully in and out of the

Live scenes of Paris and a continuity Narrator link together four dramatic re-enactments of original ballet creations by Roland Petit and his ensemble, Ballets de Paris: Carmen (1949), La croqueuse de diamants (1950), Deuil en 24 heu
When Jesse Lujack steals a car in Las Vegas and drives down to LA, his criminal ways only escalate - but when will it end?
During the Civil War Union spy Andrews and his men volunteer to steal a Confederate train and drive it to Union territory while destroying the Confederate railway system along the way.
Based on the life of rock promoter/producer Bob Marcucci, who discovered, among others, Frankie Avalon and Fabian.
An American college student in Rome and his sister in New York investigate a series of killings in both locations where their resident addresses are the domain of two covens of witches.
A daydreamer convinces his radio personality brother to help fund one of his get-rich-quick schemes.
A Carpathian village is haunted by the ghost of a murderous little girl, prompting a coroner and a medical student to uncover her secrets while a witch attempts to protect the villagers.
Two members of a social club in 1950s Brooklyn have more interest in romance than in rumbles.
After he's laid off, a husband switches roles with his wife. She returns to the workforce, and he becomes a stay-at-home dad, a job he has no clue how to do.

Piel, a 7 or 8 year old boy, is alone on the desert planet Perdide, only survivor of an attack by giant hornets. Calling for help, Piel's father's friend Jaffar keeps contact with the kid and hurries across space toward Perdide.

It's the year 3000 A.D., and the Earth is lost to the alien race of Psychlos. Humanity is enslaved by these gold-thirsty tyrants, who are unaware that their 'man-animals' are about to ignite the rebellion of a lifetime.

A group of 12 teenagers from various backgrounds enroll at the American Ballet Academy in New York to make it as ballet dancers and each one deals with the problems and stress of training and getting ahead in the world of dance.

What should have been a romantic getaway turns into one hilarious debacle after another when Michael's woman dumps him in the desert where he gets carjacked by a teenager and he is taken hostage in a stickup at the local Sip and Zip.
A chauffeur kidnaps his rich boss's dog to hold it for ransom, but when she accidentally gets the dog back, she thinks that it's the chauffeur who's been kidnapped.
Three egotistical swingers, who think they're God's gift to women, end up having their friendships tested when all three of them pick up and start dating the same woman.
Modern-day New York City adaptation of Shakespeare's immortal story about Hamlet's plight to avenge his father's murder.
A pair of sailors on leave try to help a movie extra become a singing star.

After arriving back in Hawaii from the Army, Chad Gates (Elvis Presley) defies his parents' wishes for him to work at the family business and instead goes to work as a tour guide at his girlfriend's agency.
A Texas cowboy is rescued at sea by a 12-year-old boy. While he waits to return home, he decides to help out his rescuer's family.

Tulsa, a soldier with dreams of running his own nightclub, places a bet with his friend Dynamite that he can win the heart of an untouchable dancer...but when Dynamite is transferred, Tulsa must replace him in the bet.
Danny and Elliot avoid military service by pretending to be gay, but they have to act the part when the recruiting officer doesn't buy it.
Based on the Broadway hit about the life and times of burlesque dancer Gypsy Rose Lee and her aggressive stage mother, Mama Rose.

A troubled youth's singing sets New Orleans rockin'. With a sweet girl to love him and nightclubbers cheering, it seems he will shake off his past and head for the top. But will a mobster and his man-trap moll snare him in a life of
Three sailors wreak havoc as they search for love during a whirlwind 24-hour leave in New York City.
On the run from the Cavalry, a man tries to disappear while accompanied by two camels and a runaway boy. His escape is made harder when he meets a widow and her daughter who may turn him in.
When eccentric man-child Pee-wee Herman gets his beloved bike stolen in broad daylight, he sets out across the U.S. on the adventure of his life.

In this film made over ten years, filmmaker Barbara Sonneborn goes on a pilgrimage to the Vietnamese countryside where her husband was killed. She and translator (and fellow war widow) Xuan Ngoc Nguyen explore the meaning of war and
After a singer loses his job at a coffee shop, he finds employment at a struggling carnival, but his attempted romance with a teenager leads to friction with her father.
Disney animators tour South America and present four animated shorts inspired by their trip.
A musical retelling of the classic tale of Cinderella. In the tiny kingdom of Euphrania, the King and his court are anxious to get Prince Edward wed. But Edward wants to marry for love.
Shoe-shiner Gino is hired to take the rap for a mafia murder. Two-bit gangster Jerry watches over Gino and gives him a weekend to remember.

Jack loses $65,000 in poker in Las Vegas, where he's marrying Betsy. The wedding will have to wait as the poker winner wants the weekend with Betsy to cancel the debt. She accepts. Whom will she marry?
An orphaned dinosaur raised by lemurs joins an arduous trek to a sanctuary after a meteorite shower destroys his family home.
