A college student, branded a loser by his roommates and booted from the dorm, falls in love with a coed who has eyes for their condescending professor.
Four college buddies embark on a road trip to retrieve an illicit tape mistakenly mailed to a female friend.
A loser of a crook and his wife strike it rich when a botched bank job's cover business becomes a spectacular success.
Led by their comedic leader, Turk, the Hollywood Knights car club raise hell throughout Beverly Hills on Halloween Night, 1965.
A few days spent in close proximity to each other soon leads to family secrets and old resentments being revealed, which threaten to splinter an already dysfunctional family.
A woman starts exhibiting increasingly disturbing behavior after asking her husband for a divorce. Suspicions of infidelity soon give way to something much more sinister.
In 1920s Soviet Russia, a fallen aristocrat, a priest and a con artist search for a treasure of jewels hidden inside one of twelve dining chairs, lost during the revolution.
IMF agent Ethan Hunt is sent to Sydney to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera".
A Chinese man travels to the Wild West to rescue a kidnapped Princess. After teaming up with a train robber, the unlikely duo takes on a Chinese traitor and his corrupt boss.

This is a documentary film about the history of the U.S. rave scene which includes a fantastic soundtrack. Both the film and soundtrack capture the people and the music that shaped the underground subculture around electronic music i
Following the death of a mother, a father and son open up a brothel in their Genevan estate after watching 8½ (1963).
After a traumatic accident, a woman becomes drawn to a mysterious abandoned carnival.
Capt. Jim Gordon's command of the famed American mercenary fighter group in China is complicated by the recruitment of an old friend who is a reckless hotshot.
A prospector goes to the Klondike during the 1890s gold rush in hopes of making his fortune, and is smitten with a girl he sees in a dance hall.

In this re-edit of Lisa e il diavolo (1973), a troubled priest attempts to exorcise the soul of an American tourist who has been possessed by the Devil after witnessing supernatural events at a Spanish villa.
Residents of the fictional town of Azalea Springs, Texas go into a panic after a gay local says the town's water supply is what made him gay.
A suave but cynical man supports his family by marrying and murdering rich women for their money, but the job has some occupational hazards.
James Bond woos a mob boss' daughter and goes undercover to uncover the true reason for Ernst Stavro Blofeld's allergy research in the Swiss Alps involving beautiful women from around the world.
United States military leaders plot to overthrow the President because he supports a nuclear disarmament treaty and they fear a Soviet sneak attack.
James Bond investigates the hijacking of British and Russian submarines carrying nuclear warheads, with the help of a K.G.B. agent whose lover he killed.
Friends of a recently deceased minor painter Jean-Baptiste take a train in Paris for Limoges, where he wished to be buried, and all the people on the train have their problems.
A young woman's body is found frozen in a ditch. Through flashbacks and interviews, we see the events that led to her inevitable death.
James Bond investigates the mid-air theft of a space shuttle, and discovers a plot to commit global genocide.
James Bond is targeted by the world's most expensive assassin, while he attempts to recover sensitive solar cell technology that is being sold to the highest bidder.
A recently-deposed European monarch seeks shelter in New York City, where he becomes an accidental television celebrity and is later wrongly accused of being a Communist.
A kept woman runs into her former fiancé and finds herself torn between love and comfort.
During the California Gold Rush, Boston pharmacist Tom Craig sets up shop in Sacramento where he clashes with local town crook Britt Dawson.
During WW2, the U.S. Navy implements a new idea of forming construction battalions that also are fighting units, in case of Japanese attack.
In Kansas, during the Civil War opposing pro-Union and pro-Confederate camps clash and visiting Texan Bob Seton runs afoul of William Cantrell's Raiders.
Cleo, a singer and hypochondriac, becomes increasingly worried that she might have cancer while awaiting test results from her doctor.
In order to protect a beautiful woman and her son from a robber, a male FBI agent disguises himself as a large grandmother.
The tale of the extraordinary life and times of Lucky, a horse that was born in captivity but achieves his dream of running free with the help of a stableboy.
A kindly English botanist and a gruff American scientist lead an expedition to the Himalayas in search of the legendary Yeti.
A Los Angeles male escort, who mostly caters to an older female clientèle, is accused of a murder which he did not commit.
A controlling mother uses telepathic powers to send her middle-aged son on a killing spree.
Newlywed Susan is haunted by visions of Mircalla Karnstein, a centuries-old bride who murdered her husband on their wedding night.
A reporter and a psychic race to close the Gates of Hell after the suicide of a clergyman caused them to open, allowing the dead to rise from their graves.

The crown jewel to ten years of Bruce Brown surfing documentaries. Brown follows two young surfers around the world in search of the perfect wave, and ends up finding quite a few in addition to some colorful local characters.

A team of Allied saboteurs are assigned an impossible mission: infiltrate an impregnable Nazi-held Greek island and destroy the two enormous long-range field guns that prevent the rescue of 2,000 trapped British soldiers.
A group of men go to a villa in the French countryside where they resolve to eat themselves to death.
British police are after a serial killer who lures his female victims through newspaper personal ads and sends cryptic-poem clues to the cops.
A seductive woman falls in love with a mysterious ship's captain.
A mysterious artifact is unearthed in London, and famous scientist Bernard Quatermass is called into to divine its origins and explain its strange effects on people.

Professor Quatermass is trying to perfect a dangerously unstable nuclear-powered rocket engine. After a disastrous test firing in Australia, his soon-to-be son-in-law, Captain John Dillon, draws the Professor's attention to a strange
Psychics find themselves plotted against by a former colleague, who committed suicide after discovering animated, murderous puppets.
The puppets return and hunt paranormal researchers in an attempt to take their brain fluid for their master, Andre Toulon.
A puppeteer's ability to bring inanimate objects to life attracts the attention of the Nazis during World War II.
A young scientist and his friends, upon being attacked by demons, are protected by a gang of animated puppets.
The puppets battle their most powerful enemy yet as they protect their new master from the demon God that created the Secret of Life.
A scientist attempts to master the art of transferring people's souls into puppets.
In the late nineteenth century, an Ancient Egyptian sorcerer discovers the art of transferring the souls of the dead into inanimate objects.
Chicago critics Gene Siskel and Roger Ebert rate new movies with a thumbs up, or a thumbs down.
When two young members of feuding families meet, forbidden love ensues.
A husband and wife are sucked into a hellish television set and have to survive a gauntlet of twisted versions of shows they find themselves in.
At the close of WWII, Pulitzer Prize-winning war correspondent Ernie Pyle travels with the U.S. Army's Company C Division during their liberation of Italy.
In order to ruin a western town, a corrupt politician appoints a black Sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.
A stray dog saves two kidnapped children.
Benji is left in the wilderness after an accident. Can he survive?
Benji sniffs out a bogus CIA agent in Athens, Greece.
A successful song-and-dance team become romantically involved with a sister act and team up to save the failing Vermont inn of their former commanding general.
Henry Spencer tries to survive his industrial environment, his angry girlfriend, and the unbearable screams of his newly born mutant child.
A collection of expertly photographed scenes of human life and religion.
A junkie must face his true self to kick his drug addiction.
A look into the Los Angeles punk rock scene, that was largely ignored by the rock music press of the time.
Documentary showcase, what life was like for the music artists living during the Los Angeles Heavy Metal scene in the mid and late 1980s.
Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down a Western outlaw.
San Francisco Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan is on the trail of vigilante Police Officers who are not above going beyond the law to kill the city's undesirables.

The owner of a seedy small-town Texas bar discovers that one of his employees is having an affair with his wife. A chaotic chain of misunderstandings, lies and mischief ensues after he devises a plot to have them murdered.
The lives of two struggling musicians, who happen to be brothers, inevitably change when they team up with a beautiful, up-and-coming singer.
Two professional assassins fall in love.
Five medical students experiment with "near death" experiences, until the dark consequences of past tragedies begin to jeopardize their lives.

Rose longs to see mum, but nobody will take her. Ever. Dad disappears to work. Sister waits for a boy on a damp golf course while their brother communes with spirits online. But Rose reckons a familys like a constellation - connected up there in the infinite. Stars feel each other, even if they've died millions of years ago, even if theyre light years apart. Taking destiny into her hands, Rose slips out at dawn into Englands forgotten edge lands. Her departure provokes a family to change, to search for Rose and each other, until discovering the truth of their own awesome inheritance.

In 1954, a group of Florida high-school guys try to help their buddy lose his virginity, which leads them to seek revenge on a sleazy nightclub owner and his redneck sheriff brother for harassing them.

The naughty high schoolers of Angel Beach High now seek revenge on a group of KKK religious fanatics and corrupt politicians who want to shut down their Shakespeare production after they cast a Seminole transfer student in the lead.

As graduation nears for the class of 1955 at Angel Beach High, the gang once again faces off against their old enemy, Porky, who wants them to throw the school's championship basketball game because he's betting on the opposing team.
Chris from a girls' boarding school loves Jim from a nearby boys' boarding school. Jordan also wants Jim and plays dirty. Jim and two friends visit the girls' school posing as girls.
The pupils at a high school next to a nuclear power plant start acting and looking strange after buying contaminated drugs from a plant worker.
Tromaville has a monstrous new hero. The Toxic Avenger is born when meek mop boy Melvin falls into a vat of toxic waste. Now evildoers will have a lot to lose.
The Toxic Avenger is tricked into traveling to Tokyo to search for his estranged father, leaving Tromaville open to complete domination by an evil corporation.
Toxie finds he has nothing to do as a superhero, as he has ridden his city of evil. He decides to go to work for a major corporation, which he discovers may be the evilest of all his adversaries.
Alien brain parasites, entering humans through the mouth, turn their host into a killing zombie. Some teenagers start to fight against them.
The Predator returns to Earth, this time to stake a claim on the war-torn streets of a dystopian Los Angeles.
In a dystopian America, a falsely convicted policeman gets his shot at freedom when he must forcibly participate in a TV game show where convicts, runners, must battle killers for their freedom.

An alien takes the form of a young Wisconsin widow's husband and makes her drive him to his departure point in Arizona. Distrustful government agents, along with a more ambivalent scientist, give pursuit in hopes of intercepting them
A mute alien with the appearance of a black human is chased by outer-space bounty hunters through the streets of Harlem.
In 1988, Earth makes the first contact with an alien civilization. In 1991, these aliens, known as Newcomers, slowly begin to be integrated into human society after three years of quarantine.
In a self-destructing world, a vengeful Australian policeman sets out to stop a violent motorcycle gang.
In the post-apocalyptic Australian wasteland, a cynical drifter agrees to help a small, gasoline-rich community escape a horde of bandits.
After being exiled from the most advanced town in post apocalyptic Australia, a drifter travels with a group of abandoned children to rebel against the town's queen.
An old flame discovers her ex-boyfriend from the past is a relocated FBI informant out to stop the bad guys.
A private investigator is hired by a man who calls himself Louis Cyphre to track down a singer named Johnny Favorite. But the investigation takes an unexpected and somber turn.
A woman becomes involved with a man she barely knows. Complications develop during their sexual escapades.
A couple who participated in a potent medical experiment gain telepathic ability and then have a child who is pyrokinetic.
A mother-and-son team of strange supernatural creatures move to a small town to seek out a young virgin to feed on.
Vengence drives a tough Detroit cop to stay on the trail of a power hungry auto magnate who's systematically eliminating his competition.
South African teenagers fight against apartheid in the Soweto Uprising.
An ambitious television soap actress connives with her producer to scuttle the career of the show's long-time star, but nothing works as they plan.
Two women, black and white, in 1955 Montgomery Alabama, must decide what they are going to do in response to the famous bus boycott led by Martin Luther King.
A Jamaican woman becomes the housekeeper for a rich Baltimore family and bonds with a disillusioned teenage boy.

A retired cop blackmails ex burglar Bernice into paying him $20,000 - thus burgling. Paid to get a dentist's jewelry back from her ex's apartment, someone murders the ex and Bernice is a suspect. She investigates.

Rita is a tough narc cop with a wig for every occasion. Outside a drug heist scene with several bodies and a hardly cut fatal drug, Fatal Beauty, she finds a Kroll Construction van with a dead Kroll employee in it. Who is Kroll?
A retired master car thief must come back to the industry and steal fifty cars with his crew in one night to save his brother's life.

Street pimps, all of them African-American, discuss their lives and work: getting started, being flamboyant, pimping in various U.S. cities, bringing a woman into their group, taking a woman from another pimp, and the rules and regul
An update of the classic Shakespeare story, director Kenneth Branagh shot the film like a classic 1930s musical. It tells the story of four best friends who swear off love.
The fate of a Hungarian Jewish family throughout the 20th century.
An eccentric, unconventional woman whose naive aspirations to rise from her job as a security guard to full-fledged private eye lead her into a tangled PL: mess.
A woman, fed up with her father's double standards, decides to lose her virginity.
Hamlet, Prince of Denmark, finds out that his uncle Claudius killed his father to obtain the throne, and plans revenge.
A woman whose husband is fighting in Vietnam falls in love with another man who suffered a paralyzing combat injury there.
The story of four generations of a Russian Jewish immigrant family of musicians whose careers parallel the history of American popular music in the 20th century.

An unlikely partnership between a Highway Patrol Officer, two criminals and a station secretary is formed to defend a defunct Los Angeles precinct office against a siege by a bloodthirsty street gang.
A small-town farmer's son reluctantly joins a traveling group of vampires after he is bitten by a beautiful drifter.
A small town police chief awaits the arrival of a gang of killers.
Cool black private eye John Shaft is hired by a crime lord to find and retrieve his kidnapped daughter.
A paranoid, secretive surveillance expert has a crisis of conscience when he suspects that the couple he is spying on will be murdered.
Richard spots a man dumping a body, and decides to expose the man he thinks is the culprit with his friend Alex Cutter.
A former CIA agent uses the talents of a young psychic to help retrieve his telekinetic son from terrorists, who want to use his mental powers for evil.
A first-year law student at Harvard Law School struggles with balancing his coursework and his relationship with the daughter of his sternest professor.
A New York City narcotics detective reluctantly agrees to cooperate with a special commission investigating police corruption, and soon realises he's in over his head, and nobody can be trusted.
An honest New York cop named Frank Serpico blows the whistle on rampant corruption in the force only to have his comrades turn against him.

A frustrated former big-city journalist now stuck working for an Albuquerque newspaper exploits a story about a man trapped in a cave to rekindle his career, but the situation quickly escalates into an out-of-control circus.
A fiercely independent cowboy gets himself locked up in prison to escape with an old friend.

A woman attempts to reunite her family by helping her husband escape prison and together kidnapping their son. But things don't go as planned when they are forced to take a police hostage on the road.
A gentleman thief and a lady pickpocket join forces to con a beautiful perfume company owner. Romantic entanglements and jealousies confuse the scheme.
A rough-and-tumble trucker helps rescue his friend's fiancée from an ancient sorcerer in a supernatural battle beneath Chinatown.
An impressionable teenage girl from a dead-end town and her older greaser boyfriend embark on a killing spree in the South Dakota badlands.

In the midst of the Russian Revolution of 1905, the crew of the battleship Potemkin mutiny against the brutal, tyrannical regime of the vessel's officers. The resulting street demonstration in Odessa brings on a police massacre.
A friendship is put to the ultimate test when two best friends wind up in bed together.

New York City police detective John Shaft (nephew of the original 1970s detective) goes on a personal mission to make sure the son of a real estate tycoon is brought to justice after a racially-motivated murder.
A young man learns that he has to find a hidden Earth ship before an enemy alien species does in order to secure the survival of humanity.
This documentary, which first aired on public television in 2000, chronicles environmental activist Julia "Butterfly" Hill's 738 day tree-sit in the ancient redwood tree she named Luna.
A young man turns from drug addiction and petty crime to a life redeemed by a discovery of compassion.
Two Scottish pub football teams play each other in order to resolve a century-old grudge, with the prize for the winning team being the other team's pub.
A lush, elegant epic taking us on a time-swirling trip down the infinitely complex labyrinth that is Marcel Proust's memory lane.

Can a young person in the South Bronx pursue a dream that isn't tied to crime, gang-banging, prostitution, violence, and racism? Tommy is a natural leader and a gifted artist. When Allen, a white kid, moves into the neighborhood with
When a cockerel apparently flies into a chicken farm, the chickens see him as an opportunity to escape their evil owners.

Charlie (Kim Carey) is a kind patrolman. His wife had an affair with others and eloped with her lover after giving birth to three sons. But Charlie still regarded his three sons as his own, and the sons respected the father very much. People in the town bully Charlie's kindness, and finally another cruel character hidden in Charlie's body, ah Qing, appears. Ah Qing is quite different from Charlie. He makes trouble everywhere. The police examined Charlie and found that he was suffering from schizophrenia and needed medication. At this time, Charlie wants to escort Elaine (Renee Zellweger) back to New York, but the illegal things done by Dick, Elaine's former boss, are reported. He thinks the informant is Elaine, so Dick bribes the police and others and vows to kill Elaine. Elaine asks Charlie for help, so they and ah Qing go on a desperate journey together. Charlie's medicine was left in the hotel, so Charlie and ah Qing changed all the way without warning. What's more complicated is that both Charlie and ah Qing fell in love with Elaine. Charlie and ah Qing were jealous and fought constantly. And the police and Dick have been chasing Charlie and them
Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.
When enemies Boris, Natasha, and Fearless Leader escape into the real world with a nefarious scheme, Rocky and Bullwinkle do the same, and team up with a young F.B.I. Agent to stop the trio.
An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.
A man marries an heiress for her money even though he is actually in love with her friend.
In order to secure a job at a mental institution, a young psychiatrist must interview four patients inside the asylum.

Oct.4 and Dec.26 the Strieber family drives from NYC to their cabin in the woods. Both nights there are some powerful lights outside and maybe aliens. The dad is mentally affected by the "bad dream", goes to the shrink and is hypnoti
Jiminy Cricket hosts two Disney animated shorts: "Bongo," about a circus bear escaping to the wild, and "Mickey and the Beanstalk," a take on the famous fairy tale.
A series of short, highly irreverent, and often tasteless skits.
Based on the true life experiences of poet Jimmy Santiago Baca, the film focuses on step-brothers Paco and Cruz, and their bi-racial cousin Miklo.
A young woman discovers she is the daughter of the infamous Dr. Jekyll, and begins to believe that she may also have a split personality, one of whom is a ruthless killer.
A movie special effects man is hired to fake a real-life mob killing for a witness protection plan, but finds his own life in danger.
An in-depth look at the culture of Los Angeles in the ten years leading up to the 1992 uprising that erupted after the verdict of police officers cleared of beating Rodney King.
Upon arriving to a small town, a drifter quickly gets into trouble with the local authorities - and the local women - after he robs a bank.
Colonel Braddock launches a mission deep into the jungles of Vietnam to find the POW camp that he escaped from and free the Americans still held captive there.

Prequel to the first Missing In Action, set in the early 1980s it shows the capture of Colonel Braddock during the Vietnam war in the 1970s, and his captivity with other American POWs in a brutal prison camp, and his plans to escape.
Braddock mounts a one-man assault to free his wife and son who are still being held in a Vietnam prison camp.
With the help of an irreverent young sidekick, a bank robber gets his old gang back together to organize a daring new heist.

A young psychic on the run from himself is recruited by a government agency experimenting with the use of the dream-sharing technology and is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of the U.S. president.
Sinbad and the vizier of Marabia, followed by evil magician Koura, seek the three golden tablets that can gain them access to the ancient temple of the Oracle of All Knowledge.
A cleaver-wielding bridal designer murders various young brides-to-be in an attempt to unlock a repressed childhood trauma.
Kid decides to go to his friend Play's house party, but neither of them can predict what's in store for them on what could be the wildest night of their lives.
When Kid's college money is stolen by a crooked music promoter, Play's solution is to stage the 'mutha' of all pajama parties. Starring Kid 'n Play and Martin Lawrence.
Animation done to contemporary popular music.
An anthology of animated vignettes set to contemporary music.
A street sweeper who cleans up after grisly accidents brings home a full corpse for him and his wife to enjoy sexually, but is dismayed to see that his wife prefers the corpse over him.
Three short stories revolving around the topic of the daily question posed by the roving reporter to the readers of a daily newspaper.
A saboteur posing as a scientist strives to destroy the world's first space station.
An astronaut crew on their way to the Moon are unexpectedly propelled by gravitational forces and end up on Mars instead.
Private investigator John Shaft is recruited to go undercover to break up a modern slavery ring where young Africans are lured to Paris to do chain-gang work.
Shaft is back to find the murderer of an old friend on the cold hard city streets with a little help from his new friends.
An aspiring writer is hired as a croupier at a casino, where he realizes that his life as a croupier would make a great novel.
An unhappy and disliked image consultant gets a second shot at life when he is mysteriously confronted by an eight-year-old version of himself.
A year after disposing of the body of a man they accidentally killed, a group of dumb teenagers are stalked by a bumbling serial killer.
A naive teenager is sent to rehab camp when her straitlaced parents and friends suspect her of being a lesbian.

A young wealthy businessman's icy attitude toward his working-class background is about to thaw as he is forced to reconnect with his elderly father and mentally challenged younger brother, who together run a public bathhouse.
A fashion photographer unknowingly captures a death on film after following two lovers in a park.
A Jewish pawnbroker, victim of Nazi persecution, loses all faith in his fellow man until he realizes too late the tragedy of his actions.
An inside look into one night in the San Francisco underground rave scene.
A city teenager moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.
Beautiful, biracial, Pearl Chavez becomes the ward of her dead father's first love and finds herself torn between her sons, one good and the other bad.
In a world where mutants (evolved super-powered humans) exist and are discriminated against, two groups form for an inevitable clash: the supremacist Brotherhood, and the pacifist X-Men.

When a twenty-something computer geek inadvertently downloads critical government secrets into his brain, the C.I.A. and the N.S.A. assign two agents to protect him and exploit such knowledge, turning his life upside down.

Interconnected stories examine situations involving the five senses. Touch is represented by a massage therapist who is treating a woman, while her daughter accidentally loses the woman's pre-school daughter in the park. The older da

Steven (Jude Law, Jude Law) lives by constantly sucking women's blood. His charming and attractive temperament has made countless women as obedient as moths to the fire and become his Chinese food. But when a hunter falls in love with his prey, his doom often begins. Steven meets Anne (Elina rownson, Elina L ö wensohn) and is deeply attracted by her. At the moment, he is contradictory. Bloodthirsty is the foundation of his life, but the woman in front of him makes him want to cherish it. On the other hand, one bizarre homicide after another attracted the investigation of the detective. He turned his suspicious eyes on Stephen, but he gradually deceived him. As a doctor with noble medical ethics and a kind man who has the courage to help others, Stephen is unlikely to be a murderer. Who will end Stephen's story

A mentally disturbed young woman takes a job at a posh country club and falls in with a clique of wealthy college kids where she's taken under the wing of the clique's twisted leader, who harbors some dark secrets too terrifying to t
The wife of a university research scientist believes that her lakeside Vermont home is haunted by a ghost - or that she is losing her mind.

Xiaozhi, Xiaoxia, Xiaojian and Pikachu came to the orange islands. On their way, they encountered a storm and blew them to Asia island. When they came here, the villagers were holding a ceremony. At the ceremony, Xiaozhi heard an ancient legend from flora, "The God of fire, the God of thunder and the God of ice cannot be touched without authorization, otherwise the anger of heaven and earth will lead the world to destruction." At this time, in order to achieve their goal of catching rocky, the bad guys did not hesitate to destroy this ancient legend. At the sacrifice, flora asked Xiaozhi to become a person to save the world, but she had to get three treasures, which were in the island of fire, the island of thunder and the island of ice. Xiaozhi encountered a storm on his way to the island of fire. At this time, flora thought she made Xiaozhi dangerous So flora, Xiaoxia and Xiaojian decided to go to find Xiaozhi. At this time, when Xiaozhi and Pikachu on the island of fire were about to leave, they met the Rockets. Just when the Rockets were about to seize Pikachu, flora and her party just came. While flora was talking to Xiaozhi, the lightning bird appeared on the island of fire. When Pikachu spoke to the lightning bird with his electric shock, the bad man appeared, After absorbing the lightning bird's energy, he caught the lightning bird, together with Xiaozhi and his party. What will happen to Xiaozhi and others?

Modern retelling of Hansel and Gretel. After committing a murder, a young couple on the run find refuge in a remote cottage in the woods, where they become trapped by the perverse hermit who lives there.
An upstate Michigan lawyer defends a soldier who claims he killed an innkeeper due to temporary insanity after the victim raped his wife. What is the truth, and will he win his case?
Bounty hunters from the future transport a doomed race car driver to New York City in 2009, where his mind will be replaced with that of a dead billionaire.
A parable based on the life of Christ. This ain't your father's Bible story, full of references about the destruction of the world through massive constipation and a New Mexican setting.

College exploitation film focusing on the wild escapades of the women of H.O.T.S. Sorority. The antics include but are certainly not limited to a wet t-shirt contest, a sky-diving episode, plenty of fraternity boys and even a house-k

A medieval reenactment troupe find it increasingly difficult to keep their family-like group together, with pressure from local law enforcement, interest from entertainment agents and a growing sense of delusion from their leader.
A bandit kidnaps a Marshal who has seen a map showing a gold vein on Indian lands, but other groups are looking for it too, while the Apache try to keep the secret location undisturbed.
Sinbad The Sailor sails to deliver a cursed prince to a dangerous island in the face of deadly opposition from a powerful witch.

During World War II, Cecilia and her 13-year-old daughter losetta had to leave Rome where they had lived for many years to take shelter in the rural town of Cicero, where Cecilia lived as a child. Life here seems very calm, but the tension and trouble under the appearance often appear. At this time, Cecilia also met Michel, a young man who had not gone to the front to fight, but was relieved to study at home and was ready to be a doctor. Michel was a communist and rescued two British paratroopers. Michel taught losetta to read poetry. Losetta was impressed by his knowledge and demeanor and fell in love with him. But Michelle seems to love Cecilia, who only worries about filling her stomach every day. Her reality and courage deeply moved Michelle. Michel helped Cecilia to get some food at his father's friend's house, but he accidentally met a German officer who was eating in the house. The officer thought it was a shame that Michel didn't go to the front line, but he was about to take him away when the air raid alarm sounded. Michel and Cecilia escaped the aircraft's fire together. After the Allied landing, the remnants of the German army were ready to retreat, but the place where Sisera was still not trampled by the German army. The officers who had met wanted to take away their little bread and water, and took Michel away as a guide to go out. Cecilia decided to take losetta away from the town and return to Rome, but they were raped by Moroccans on the way, and losetta collapsed. Cecilia was also very painful after learning that Michel was killed by the Germans. But the two women returned to Rome tenaciously. Cecilia started her own grocery store again and sold American Coca Cola. Her daughter losetta walked out of the shadow of sadness because her lover who went to the army also came back to her.
A successful psychotherapist loses his mind after one of his most dependent patients, an obsessive-compulsive neurotic, tracks him down during his family vacation.
A small southwestern town Sheriff finds a body in the desert with a suitcase and five hundred thousand dollars. He impersonates the man and stumbles into an F.B.I. investigation.

This is based on a true story. During the Boer War, Captain Morant and several of his friends served in the British army in South Africa. During an operation to encircle and suppress the Boer guerrillas, Captain hunter was injured, caught and brutally killed by the Boer people. Morant pursued the guerrillas and shot and killed all the prisoners at the command of his boss, This triggered a series of retaliation and retaliation. The leaders of both sides pushed Morant and his friends out as scapegoats in the final stage of the war, so as to shirk the responsibility in the war.
Seven stories are trying to answer the question: what is sex? Or maybe they are not trying.
Three sisters find their lives spinning out of control in the wake of their parents' sudden, unexpected divorce.
In czarist Russia, a neurotic soldier and his distant cousin formulate a plot to assassinate Napoleon.
During the final months of Argentinian Military Dictatorship in 1983, a high school teacher sets out to find out who the mother of her adopted daughter is.

The Other Side of Sunday criticizes the small, and often tight church community. We follow the Preachers Daughter; Maria, in her journey to liberate herself from the stiff church community and her strict religious father.

Jimmy goes to work with his uncle, the owner of a food factory. Before he gets there, he befriends an Irish family who happens to be his uncle's worst enemy because of their love for music and in-house band who constantly practices.

Dandelion (shinko Miyamoto), a single mother, ran a ramen restaurant called lailaixuan alone after her husband died, but her craft was really poor, so that there were few diners and the store was struggling. Long distance freight drivers heilang (Yamazaki nu) and gun (Watanabe Qian) settled in lailaixuan on a rainstorm night. Heilang bluntly pointed out the problems of ramen. The eager dandelion asked heilang to take her as an apprentice to improve her cooking. Out of sympathy for the situation of mother and son, heilang carried out devil training for dandelion, and took her to visit the nearby Ramen restaurant to learn from the experience of her peers. In this process, famous teachers and enthusiastic friends in the industry have constantly joined in to help dandelion develop delicious Ramen that can attract thousands of diners

Thomas the Tank Engine's feature film debut follows Thomas and Mr. Conductor (Alec Baldwin) as they cross between the real world and the fictional Island of Sodor, in an attempt to recover lost gold dust.
Scientist Sherman Klump's inventions, his upcoming marriage to his pretty colleague Denise Gaines and his reputation are threatened by his evil clone Buddy Love.
One night, a fading entertainer intervenes when a woman contemplates suicide, beginning a strange, unpredictable relationship.

There's little wonder in the working-class lives of Bill, Eileen, and their three grown daughters. They're lonely Londoners. Nadia, a café waitress, places personal ads, looking for love; Debbie, a single mother, entertains men at th
Romantic drama about an aging playboy who falls for a sweet, but terminally ill, young woman.
Aspiring songwriter Violet Sanford, after getting a job at a women-run NYC bar that teases its male patrons, comes out of her shell.
A brilliant scientist's discovery renders him invisible, but transforms him into an omnipotent, dangerous megalomaniac.
When retired engineer Frank Corvin (Clint Eastwood) is called upon to rescue a failing satellite, he insists that his equally old teammates accompany him into space.

Three grown daughters try to find their own personal ways to deal with their dysfunctional parents. The mother is an unorthodox woman with out-of-the-ordinary ideas, including one where she takes a jackhammer to the basement floor of
A Catholic high school student, trying to perfect his soccer timing by practicing dance, falls in love with his dance partner.

Chicklet is a sixteen-year old tomboy who's desperate to be part of the in-crowd of Malibu beach surfers. She's the typical American girl - except for one little problem: her personality is split into more slices than a pepperoni piz
A small-town English widow, facing financial troubles after her husband's suicide, turns to agriculture of an illegal kind.
Boris Karloff hosts a trio of horror stories concerning a stalked call girl, a vampire-like monster who preys on his family, and a nurse who is haunted by her ring's rightful owner.
A doctor experimenting with transplant techniques keeps his girlfriend's head alive when she is decapitated in a car crash, then goes hunting for a new body.
An idealistic, modern-day cowboy struggles to keep his Wild West show afloat in the face of hard luck and waning interest.
A journalist becomes the unwanted center of attention for a 14-year-old girl, who proceeds to sabotage his life after he refuses her sexual advances.
A group of U.S. soldiers sneaks across enemy lines to get their hands on a secret stash of Nazi treasure.

Mike, now released from a psychiatric hospital, meets with Reggie, and discover his dreams ( the events of the original film) are real, and they both journey to find and stop the evil Tall Man from his grim work.
Mike and Reggie continue to hunt the mysterious Tall Man, discovering along the way that the invasion has already begun.
Mike travels through time and dimensions to find the Tall Man's origins.
After a tragic accident, a man conjures up a towering, vengeful demon called Pumpkinhead to destroy a group of unsuspecting teenagers.
A young pilot finds himself recruited unwittingly into a covert and corrupt C.I.A. airlift organization operating in Vietnam War-era Laos.

The story is about three young people who went to the Amazon Valley of Paraguay in South America to find the whereabouts of the legendary cannibals, and to prove that there are no cannibals in the world. The spread of cannibals is just a slander of Western civilization. They met two white men while looking for their people in the forest. The two white men said they were almost eaten by cannibals. In fact, the two white men once killed the so-called cannibals. People used to be kind and innocent. Now they want revenge

Angela Baker, a shy, traumatized young girl, is sent to summer camp with her cousin. Shortly after her arrival, anyone with sinister or less than honorable intentions toward her gets their comeuppance.
A young beautician, newly arrived in a small Louisiana town, finds work at the local salon, where a small group of women share a close bond of friendship, and welcome her into the fold.
In sunny St. Tropez, a young sexpot loves one brother but marries the other.
To inherit his mother-in-law's colossal fortune, a hard-living gambling addict must change his unhealthy ways before they get the best of him.

Ilsa is an evil Nazi warden at a death camp that conducts "medical experiments." Ilsa's goal is to prove women can withstand more pain and suffering than men, and therefore should be allowed to fight on the front lines.
An autistic boy witnesses his parents' double murder. A controversial therapist seeks to probe the child's mind in order to solve the case.
In 1916, a shadowy serial killer is targeting women with "afflictions"; one night during a thunderstorm, the mute Helen feels menaced.
An aging widow hides a deadly secret which she will do anything to keep buried.

November, 1999, Margaret Cho is home in San Francisco at the Warfield Theater. Cho structures her monologue loosely on her professional life's trajectory: doing stand-up, cast in an ABC-TV sitcom, losing 30 pounds in two weeks for the part, the show's cancellation, a descent into booze, pills, and self-loathing, and a resurrection into her own voice, her own shape, and being the one she wants. Along the way we visit Karl Langerfeld in jail, a lesbian cruise ship, a TV Guide photo shoot, a hospital, bars, and her family's Polk Street bookshop. Takes on being a fag hag, speeding up felatio, casual daily racism, and her mother's phone messages highlight a scabrous, brilliant performance.
Underachieving, overweight kindergarten teacher Dex finds a woman who forces him to reexamine his Zen-like system of seduction.

A 10 year old gifted boy wants to be a jazz pianist much to the chagrin of his more classical oriented piano instructor. With his mother's help, he is an underage regular at a local nightspot, where he is teamed up with a sax superst

Based on real people and real events, the film tells a lesbian love story that took place under the flames of war. Berlin in 1943 was during the Nazi period of World War II. The married Lily (Juliane Köhler played by Juliane Köhler) lived a life without passion until she met the Jewish woman Phyllis (played by Maria Schrader) at a concert. A passionate fire of love was instantly ignited. They called each other's nicknames Amy and Gaguya, and loved each other deeply. Phyllis had been collecting information for anti-Nazi organizations until one day in 1944, when he was killed and died young by the Nazis. Love under the flames of war, who can escape life and parting.When true love transcends race and gender, is there really a heavenly and beautiful Garden of Eden?
A woman puts an ad in a magazine looking for a man to fulfill her fantasy of a stringless, anonymous pornographic affair.

When a school bus driving woman (Tyne Daly) has a heart attack, she makes one request of her three daughters (Ally Sheedy, Marla Sucharetza, Marceline Hugo) - she wants them to find their long lost brother, who was taken away by thei

Cody, a little girl abandoned by her mother and raised by her aunt, a nurse, is kidnapped. The girl's guardian, aided by an F.B.I. agent, learn that Cody has supernatural abilities, and the abductees are a Satanic cult willing to do
An insane independent film director and his renegade group of teenage filmmakers kidnap an A-list Hollywood actress and force her to star in their underground film.

Twelve years after the dramatic collapse of the Christian empire of Jim and Tammy Faye Bakker, this documentary tells for the first time what really happened when they lost control of the first and most successful TV ministry of its
A struggling auto mechanic with a criminal past agrees to one last heist to pay off his debts.
During a pro football strike, the owners hire substitute players.
A waitress falls for a handsome customer who seduces her, her two sisters, her brother, and her brother's girlfriend.

An F.B.I. Agent persuades a social worker, who is adept with a new experimental technology, to enter the mind of a comatose serial killer in order to learn where he has hidden his latest kidnap victim.
An independent group of researchers actively track Godzilla as a giant meteor is discovered. The mysterious rock begins to levitate as its true intentions for the world and Godzilla are revealed.
A concert film featuring four major African American stand up comedians.
A comedy that takes place over twenty-four hours on the Sunset Strip, in 1972.

Handguns figure in the intertwining lives of nine people. Warren shoots his wife Helen's lover and his defense is that he thought he was shooting an intruder. She leaves him; the lawyer helps her get a job with a nutty, reclusive com
Incompetent police Detective Frank Drebin must foil an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.
Lieutenant Frank Drebin discovers that his ex-girlfriend's new beau is involved in a plot to kidnap a scientist who advocates solar energy.
Change comes slowly to a small New Hampshire town in the early 20th century.
A weary gunfighter in 1880s Wyoming begins to envision a quieter life after befriending a homestead family with a young son who idolizes him, but a smoldering range war forces him to act.
A surgeon is assigned the case of a young woman whose aunt wants her lobotomized to cover up a family secret.
A young schoolteacher turns into an outlaw to avenge her murdered father.
A psychoanalyst in NYC exchanges apartment with a woman in Paris. When his patients show up, they talk to her and then pay. He returns early to NYC and becomes a patient.
Devil worshipers plan to convert two new victims.

Tom and Jerry are two killers. They work for a third rate used car dealer every day. In the business of killers, Tom and Jerry are novices and veterans. They have many different understandings of their professional attitude. When Tom had to kill his old friend Carl
After losing a powerful orb, Kara Zor-El, Superman's cousin, comes to Earth to retrieve it and instead finds herself up against a wicked witch.
A radioactive, mud-like creature terrorizes a Scottish village.

UN's secretary general uses covert operations to help diplomacy along. Shaw's called back 6 months after one such operation. He witnesses the murder of Chinese UN ambassador at UN, NYC, chases the assassin and ends up a suspect.

With the help of her mother, family, friends, and fellow musicians, Aiyana Elliott reaches for her father, legendary cowboy troubadour, Ramblin' Jack Elliott. She explores who he is and how he got there, working back and forth betwee
Bittersweet Motel is a documentary about the popular rock band Phish. The film focuses on Phish's music, with little emphasis on their die-hard fan base.
A champion high school cheerleading squad discovers its previous captain stole all their best routines from an inner-city school and must scramble to compete at this year's championships.
A Vietnamese brother and sister, raised by an African American couple, are reunited with their birth mother after 22 years.
Four retired mobsters plan one last crime to save their retirement home.

Kate wells is a beautiful young journalist who met Adam. She thinks she is her "Prince Charming". Adam is talented and eccentric. One of his shortcomings is his fear of commitment. His leaving Kate was the biggest mistake of his life. Three years later, they became best friends
After years of hiding, the notorious American leftist radical, Abbie Hoffman, discusses his life, his cause and the opposition he endured.

Two young men (Jon Cryer, Rick Stear) who have been friends since early childhood decide to go on a trip to find a third friend (Rafael Baez) who has long since disappeared. Stories they have heard indicate that the friend has been s
An ungrounded young mother and her thoughtful teenage son are banished to a remote provincial town by her domineering father.
Immortals Connor and Duncan MacLeod must join forces against Kell, an evil immortal who has become too strong for anyone to face alone.

If you ever wanted to know what really goes on backstage, this is the definitive inside look - uncut and uncensored. Complete with on-stage performances you'll see an intimate view of what life is like at one of the biggest Rap Concert tours of all time. It shows life on the road, in hotels and off stage in a way you've never seen before.
Turn It Up is an explosive contemporary drama about a gifted musician's struggle to rise above the crime-plagued urban streets and realize his dream.
A cute med student starts a summer course at Heidelberg University. David's on her dissection table. She met him the day before on the train. Something's wrong.
Comedy about a widow's post-traumatic obsession with a soap star.

While waiting for her husband to recover in a hospital, a mother stays with her estranged daughter, Maria, who fled her parents rural home in Andalusia because she could no longer bear her father's abusiveness and her mother's passiv

David Allen Griffin is a cool killer- time and time again, he chooses a female victim, studies her for weeks till he knows her routine to the smallest detail, makes meticulous preparations using his forensic knowledge to gain entry w
Two criminal drifters without sympathy get more than they bargained for after kidnapping and holding for ransom the surrogate mother of a powerful and shady man.
A high-school boy in the early 1970s is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies them on their concert tour.
An ex-con is used by police to lure a criminal out of hiding.

Conman Leo Garfield is in hot water after accepting a contract to murder businessman Julius Harvey's alleged wife, Gloria. Leo's wife Lily brings trouble too when her old flame Elmo pops up again, years after she abandoned him mid-he
A darkly romantic story of murder and redemption, set against an eerily familiar American landscape.
A professional karaoke hustler reconnects with his daughter and a bored suburban businessman turns outlaw karaoke singer, among other plotlines.

Francisco Goya (1746-1828), deaf and ill, lives the last years of his life in voluntary exile in Bordeaux, a Liberal protesting the oppressive rule of Ferdinand VII. He's living with his much younger wife Leocadia and their daughter
A series of urban legends take place around the life of a troubled man who is searching New York City for a mysterious stranger.
When a Black man is viciously assaulted by police right outside their window, all of the guests at a dinner party seem to consider the attack unremarkable except for one.
The sixth or seventh best superhero team in the world pursue their rightful place in the harshly competitive world of toy tie-ins and fighting evil.

A wealthy attorney in San Juan comes to the police station for "10 minutes" of follow-up questions to finding a 12-year-old girl's body in a park. Another young girl was also raped and murdered weeks earlier and the evidence points t

A teenage boy and his younger sister flee from an abusive foster mother into Central Park, where they make their home in a treehouse they find. Along the way, they butt heads against a young hoodlum and befriend a lonely elderly woma
A film school is the center of a fresh spate of killings based on urban legends.
Brazilian chef Isabella Oliveira moves to San Francisco when her husband, frustrated by her motion sickness, cheats on her.
An East European girl travels to the United States with her young son, expecting it to be like a Hollywood film.
A behind-the-scenes look into the highly competitive and cut-throat world of dog shows through the eyes of a group of ruthless dog owners.
Mona sacrifices everything, including family, in pursuit of a beauty pageant victory. Her friend Ruby helps her to an amazing degree.
A rockumentary about the Canadian rock band Barenaked Ladies's life, in a nutshell.

On Dennis's birthday (Timothy Olyphant), a grand party was held at home and many friends were invited to attend. Among them, a young man named Kevin (Andrew Keegan) was very eye-catching. Dennis and Cole (Dean Cain) both wanted to kiss him. However, Dennis suddenly found that, He lost interest in this fast-food relationship, and Cole took advantage of it and hit it off with Kevin. A few days later, the easygoing Cole soon fell in love and Kevin was dumped. The kind Dennis accompanied the sad Kevin, and they gradually had sincere feelings. However, until this time, Kevin refused to admit that he was a homosexual. Dennis decided to wait patiently for his lover to find his heart.
Diana, without her father knowing it, trains as a boxer and achieves impressive success, blazing new trails for female boxers.
The true story of a newly appointed African-American coach and his high school team on their first season as a racially integrated unit.

A woman discovers the newly resurrected, partially formed, body of her brother-in-law. She starts killing for him to revitalize his body so he can escape the demonic beings that are pursuing him after he escaped their sadistic underw
Kirsty is brought to an institution after the horrible events of Hellraiser (1987), where the occult-obsessive head doctor resurrects Julia and unleashes the Cenobites and their demonic underworld.
An investigative reporter must send the newly unbound Pinhead and his legions back to Hell.
A group of angels in the German capital look longingly upon the life of humans.

The first of the five official American-International "Beach Party" movies. Anthropology Professor Robert Orwell Sutwell and his secretary Marianne are studying the sex habits of teenagers. The surfing teens led by Frankie and Dee De
A millionaire sets out to prove his theory that his pet chimpanzee is as intelligent as the teenagers who hang out on the local beach, where he is intending to build a retirement home.
Philippe Delambre, the now-adult son of "The Fly", does some transportation experimentation of his own.
Sent to Earth to prepare for an invasion, a Martian scout lands amidst a swim party and tries to convince everyone that he really is who he says.
A New Yorker's life is thrown into a tailspin when his younger cousin surprise-visits him, starting a strange, unpredictable adventure.

When the Earth is threatened by a burning Van Allen Radiation Belt, U.S. Navy Admiral Harriman Nelson plans to shoot a nuclear missile at the Belt, using his experimental atomic submarine, the Seaview.

A scientist is nearly assassinated. In order to save him, a submarine is shrunken to microscopic size and injected into his bloodstream with a small crew. Problems arise almost as soon as they enter it.
The Wolf Man tries to warn a dimwitted porter that Dracula wants his brain for Frankenstein monster's body.
Henpecked Egbert Sousé has comic adventures as a substitute film director and unlikely bank guard.
A strange prehistoric beast lurks in the depths of the Amazonian jungle. A group of scientists try to capture the animal and bring it back to civilization for study.
A giant lizard terrorizes a rural Texas community and a heroic teenager attempts to destroy the creature.
A scientist finds a way of becoming invisible, but in doing so, he becomes murderously insane.
On an isolated island, a small group of people are terrorized by giant voracious shrews in the midst of a hurricane.
Aliens from another world send a huge robotic accumulator to invade the Earth and absorb all energy it comes in contact with.

A mysterious asteroid approaches the earth and falls into the sea. I don't want it to be actually an alien automatic aggression weapon, which specializes in absorbing the earth's resources and electricity. What's more, if this weapon can't be destroyed, more alien weapons will come to the earth.
A young soprano becomes the obsession of a disfigured and murderous musical genius who lives beneath the Paris Opéra House.
In the near future, a police officer will specialize in faulty robots. When a robot was programmed to kill, he began to expose a murder plot to make a killing robot... His son became a target.
A female high school student's slumber party turns into a bloodbath, as a newly escaped psychotic serial killer wielding a power drill prowls her neighborhood.

Courtney Bates, the younger sister of Valerie, and her friends go to their condo for a weekend getaway, but Courtney can't get rid of the haunting feeling that a supernatural rockabilly driller killer is coming to murder them all.
The kills in the movie Slumber Party Massacre III (1990) are broken down and analyzed.
College student Beth and her sorority sisters are stalked by an escaped psychopathic killer who shares a strange telepathic link with her.

Five college women buy the old Hokstedter place for their new sorority house. They decide to stay in it for the night to meet the movers in the morning, but begin to get the creeps when the weird neighbor starts poking around.
A frustrated African-American TV writer proposes a blackface minstrel show in protest, but to his chagrin it becomes a hit.

Charismatic tap dancing Sean tries to find a way out of working at the steel mill. When failure brings him home he starts his own dance group wearing hardhats. He must then find inspiration in the steel mill he once tried to escape.
Throughout three different stories, Kari Kamiya and her friends take on explosive adventures involving digital creatures.
A Las Vegas mob enforcer travels back to his hometown to investigate his brother's mysterious death.
When his brother dies under mysterious circumstances in a car accident, London gangster Jack Carter travels to Newcastle to investigate.
Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare.
The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.
A group of recruits go through Advanced Infantry Training at Fort Polk, Louisiana's infamous Tigerland, last stop before Vietnam for tens of thousands of young men in 1971.
A dreamer finds that his wife and friends are binding him to his mediocre existence.
Senator Laine Hanson is a contender for U.S. Vice President, but information and disinformation about her past surfaces that threatens to derail her confirmation.
